src: Duikbote is bote wat ontwerp is om onderwater te beweeg, en daar te bly vir verlengde tydperke. Duikbote is in Wêreldoorlog I en Wêreldoorlog II gebruik. Op daardie stadium was hulle baie stadig en het ‘n baie beperkte skietvaardigheid gehad. Aan die begin van die oorlog het hulle grootendeels bo op die water gereis, maar soos radar begin ontwikkel het en meer akkuraat geraak het, was die duikbote geforseer om onderwater te gaan om te vermy dat hulle gesien word. Duitse duikbote is U-Bote genoem. Die Duitsers was baie goed in die navigeer en opereer van hul duikbote. As gevolg van hul sukses met duikbote, word Duitsers na die oorlog nie het nie.
mt: Submarines are boats designed to move and stay underwater for extended periods of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At that time they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. At the beginning of the war they mostly traveled above the water, but as radar began to develop and became more accurate, the submarines were forced to go underwater to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. As a result of their success with submarines, the Germans were not considered to be the best after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Teen September 17, 1939, was die Poolse verdediging reeds gebreek en die enigste hoop was om te ritireer en te her-organiseer langs die Romeinse brughoof. Hoe dit okal sy het hierdie planne oornag uitgedien geraak, toe 800 000 soldate van die Sowiet Unie se Rooi Weermag Belarussiese en Ukraïeniesee fronte betree en geskep het nadat hulle die oosterlike streke van Polland binne getree het in skending van die Riga Vredesverdrag, die Soviet-Poolse Geen-Agressie Ooreenkoms en internasionale ooreenkomste, beide bilateraal en multilateraal.
mt: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize along the Roman bridgehead. How it was able to thwart these plans overnight, when 800,000 soldiers of the Soviet Union's Red Army Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts crossed the eastern regions of Poland after they had entered the eastern territories of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Agreement and international agreements, both bilateral and multilateral.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Dinge het nie baie goed vir die Italilianers van die begin af gegaan nie. Binne ‘n week van Italië se oorlogsverklaring op 10 Junie 1940, het die Britte se 11de Hussars Fort Capuzzo in Libië oorrompel. In ‘n hinderlaag, oos van Bardia, het die Britte die Italiaanse Tiende Leer se Hoof Ingenieur, Generaal Lastucci, gevang. Op 28 Junie is Marshall Balbo, die Goewerneur-Generaal van Libië en oënskynlike opvolger van Mussolini, deur vriendelike vuur doodgemaak terwyl hy in Tobruk geland het.
mt: Things did not go well for the Italians from the beginning. Within a week of Italy’s declaration of war on 10 June 1940, the British 11th Hussars had captured Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush, east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army’s Chief Engineer, General Lastucci. On 28 June, Marshal Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent successor to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetaanse Boeddhisme is gebaseerd op die leerstellinge van Boeddha, maar is uitgebrei deur die mahayana pad van liefde en deur vele tegnieke uit Indiese Yoga. In beginsel is die Tibetiese Boeddhisme baie eenvoudig. Dit bestaan uit Kundalini Joga, meditasie en die pad van alles-omarmende liefde. Met Kundalini Joga word die Kundalini energie (verligtings energie) aangewakker deur joga posture, asemhalings oefeninge, mantras en visualiserings. Die middelpunt van Tibettaanse meditasie is die Deity Joga. Deur die visualisasie van verskeie gode word die energie kanale skoongemaak, die chakras word geaktiveer en die verligte bewussyn word geskep.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but is expanded by the mahayana path of love and by many techniques from Indian yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-encompassing love. With Kundalini Yoga, the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened by yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is deity yoga. By visualizing various gods, the energy channels can be cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightened consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Die program het om 8:30 n.m. plaaslike tyd begin (15.00 GUT). Beroemde sangers oor die land het bhajane, of toegewyde liedere, aan Shri Shyam se voete kom voordra. Die sanger Sanju Sharma het die aand begin, gevolg deur Jai Shankar Choudhary.esented the chhappan bhog bhajan ook. Sanger Raju Khandelwal het hom vergesel. Toe het Lakkha Sing die hoofrol geneem in die sing van die bhajane. 108 borde van Chhappan Bhog (in Hindoeïsme, 56 verskillende eetbare items, soos lekkers, vrugte, neute, disse ens. wat aan godhede geoffer word) is aan Baba Shyam opgedien. Lakkha Singh het die chappan bhog bhajan ook geoffer. Die sanger, Raju Khandelwal het hom vergesel.
mt: The program began at 8:30 am local time (15.00 GUT). Famous singers across the country came to sing bhajane, or dedicated songs, at Shri Shyam's feet. The singer Sanju Sharma began the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then Lakkha Sing took the lead in singing the bhajane. 108 boards of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. that are offered to gods) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also offered the chappan bhog bhajan. The singer, Raju Khandelwal accompanied him.

Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Die feesvieringe het met ‘n spesiale vertoning deur die wêreldbekende groep Cirque du Soleil begin. Dit is gevolg deur die Staatssimfonieorkes van Istanboel, 'n Janissary-orkes, en die sangers Fatih Erkoç en Müslüm Gürses. Toe het Dwarrelende Derwisse die verhoog betree. Die Turkse diva Sezen Aksu het saam metdie Italiaanse tenoor Alessandro Safina met die Griekse sanger Haris Alexiou opgetree. Ter afsluiting het die Turkse dans groep, Fire of Anatolia, die vertoning van “Troy” opgevoer.
mt: The festivities began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the State Symphony Orchestra of Istanbul, a Janissary orchestra, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then the Whirling Dervishes took the stage. The Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and the Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To close the event, the Turkish dance group, Fire of Anatolia, performed the show “Troy”.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Passasiers het water gekry terwyl hulle in 90 ° F-hitte gewag het. Brandweer kaptein Scott Kouns het gesê dat dit ‘n warm dag in Santa Clara was, met temperature in die 90s. Om die minste te sê, sal enige hoeveelheid tyd vasgevang op ‘n tuimeltrein ongemaklik wees, en dit het meer as ‘n uur geneem om die eerste persoon van die rit af te kry.”
mt: Passengers received water while waiting in 90 ° F heat. Fire Captain Scott Kouns said it was a hot day in Santa Clara, with temperatures in the 90s. To say the least, any amount of time trapped on a melting train would be uncomfortable, and it took more than an hour to get the first person off the train.”
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Volgens die laaste mededeling het seevlakke lesings aangewys dat ‘n tsunami ontwikkel. Daar was sommige definitiewe tsunami aktiwiteite naby Pago Pago en Niue waargeneem. Geen grootskaalse skade of beserings is in Tonga aangemeld nie, maar krag was tydelik verlore, wat volgens oorlewering die Tongaanse owerhede daarvan weerhou het om die tsunami waarskuwing wat deur die PTWC uitgereik is, te ontvang. Veertien skole in Hawaii wat op of naby die kuslyne geplaas is was Woensdag vir die hele dag gesluit ten spyte van die waarskuwings wat opgehef is.
mt: According to the latest reports, sea levels readings have indicated that a tsunami has developed. There were some definite tsunami activity observed near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which according to lore prevented the Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii that are located on or near the coastline were closed for the entire day Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Rid, die mede bestuurder van die A1GP New Zealand span, het vandag geskiedenis gemaak deur wettig die vinnigste oor die 48 jaar oue Auckland Hawe Brug in New Zealand te ry. Mnr Reid het dit reggekry om die Nieu Seelandse A1GP kar, Black Beauty teen ‘n spoed van 160km/h sewe keer oor die brug te ry. Die Nieu-Seelandse polisie het gesukkel om met hul spoedradar-gewere te sien hoe vinnig mnr. Reid gery het omdat Black Beauty so laag is, en die enigste tyd wat die polisie daarin geslaag het om mnr. Reid te meet, was toe hy spoed na 160 km/h verminder het.
mt: Jonny Reid, the co-driver of the A1GP New Zealand team, made history today by legally driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand. Mr. Reid managed to get the New Zealand A1GP car, Black Beauty, up to a speed of 160 km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police struggled to see how fast Mr. Reid was going with their speed radar guns because Black Beauty is so low, and the only time the police managed to catch Mr. Reid was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: 'n Matige aardbewing het die weste van Montana Maandag, om 10:08 n.m., geskud. Geen onmiddellike berigte van skade is deur die Verenigde State se Geologiese Opname (VSGO) en sy Nasionale Aardbewing Informasie Sentrum ontvang nie. Die aardbewing se kern was omtrend 20km (15 myl) noord-noordoos van Dillon, en omtred 65 km (40 myl) suid van Butte.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook the western part of Montana on Monday, at 10:08 a.m. No immediate reports of damage were received by the United States Geological Survey and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake's epicenter was about 20km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Iraak se Abu Ghraib tronk is gedurende ‘n oproer aan die brand gesteek. Die tronk het berug geword nadat daar gevangene mishandeling plaasgevind het nadat US magte oorgevat het.
mt: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison was set on fire during a riot. The prison became notorious after prisoners were abused after US forces took over.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Die groep het die opvoering by Maui’s Oorlog Gedenkteken Stadion gekanselleer wat gereed was om deur 9,000 mense bygewoon te word, en het aan bewonderaars om verskoning gevra. Die orkes se bestuursmaatskappy, HK Management Inc., het geen aanvanklike rede gegee toe hulle op September 20 gekanselleer het nie, maar het teen die volgende dag logistieke redes geblameer.
mt: The group canceled the performance at Maui’s War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The orchestra’s management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason for the cancellation on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons the next day.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Dit word berig dat wydverspreide plundering oornag aangehou het, aangesien wetstoepassingbeamptees nie op die toneel was op Bishkek se strate nie. 'n Waarnemer het gesê dat Bishkek besig is om in ‘n toestand van “anargie” te versink terwyl skares mense in die strate geloop het en winkels vol gebruikersgoedere geplunder het. Verskeie Bishkek inwoners het betogers van die suide blameer vir die wetteloosheid.
mt: It is reported that widespread looting continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not on the streets of Bishkek. A witness said that Bishkek is sinking into a state of “anarchy” as crowds of people roamed the streets and looted shops full of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blame protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Voorheen, het Ring se CEO, Jamie Siminoff, opgemerk dat die maatskappy begin het toe sy deurklokkie nie hoorbaar was van die werkswinkel in sy motorhuis. Hy sê hy het ‘n WiFi deurklokkie gebou. Siminoff het gesê dat verkope die hoogtes ingegaan het na sy 2013 verskyning in die Haaitenk episode waar die vertoning se paneel besluit het om verdere befondsing te staak. In laat 2017, het Siminoff op die televisie koopkanaal QVC verskyn. Ring het ook ‘n regsgeding met ‘n meedingende sekuriteitsmaatskappy, die ADT Korporasie, gevestig.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, noted that the company began when his doorbell was inaudible from the workshop in his garage. He said he built a WiFi doorbell. Siminoff said that sales had gone through the roof after his 2013 appearance on Shark Tank where the show's panel decided to cut off further funding. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the television shopping channel QVC. Ring has also filed a lawsuit against a competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Die PBS het meer as twee dosyn Emmy toekennings en sy lugtyd is net korter as Sesame Street en Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood. Elke episode van die program fokus op ‘n tema in ‘n spesifieke boek en verken daardie tema deur vele verhale. Elke vertoning sou ook aanbevelings voorsien vir boeke waarvoor kinders moet kyk wanneer hulle na hul biblioteek toe gaan. John Grant, van die WNED tv-stasie, Buffalo (Leesreënboog se tuisstasie) het gesê dat, “Leesreënboog kinders geleer het hoekom hulle moet lees,… die liefde vir lees - [die program] het kinders aangemoedig om 'n boek op te tel en te lees.” Dit word deur sommige geglo, insluitend John Grant, dat beide die befondsing en ‘n gedagte skuif in die filosofie van die opvoedkundige televisie-programme bygedra het tot die beïndiging van die reeks.
mt: PBS has won more than two dozen Emmy awards and its airtime is just shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood. Each episode of the program focuses on a theme in a specific book and explores that theme through many stories. Each presentation would also provide recommendations for books for which children should look when they go to their library. John Grant, of the WNED TV station, Buffalo (Rainbow’s home station) said that, “Rainbow taught children why they should read,… the love of reading - [the program] encouraged children to pick up a book and read.” It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding and a shift in the philosophy of the educational television programs contributed to the ending of the series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

Each presentation would also provide recommendations for books for which children should look when they go to their library. John Grant, of the WNED TV station, Buffalo (Rainbow’s home station) said that, “Rainbow taught children why they should read,… the love of reading - [the program] encouraged children to pick up a book and read.” It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding and a shift in the philosophy of the educational television programs contributed to the ending of the series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amptenare vir die stad Amsterdam en die Anne Frank Museum meen dat die boom met ‘n fungus geïnfekteer is en ‘n publieke gesondheidsgevaar is en hulle het redeneer dat dit in dreigende gevaar was om om te val. Dit was geskeduleer om Dinsdag afgesny te word, maar is gered na ‘n nood hof-uitspraak.
mt: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum believe the tree was infected with a fungus and posed a public health hazard and they reasoned that it was in imminent danger of falling. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Die Diere Vryheidsbeweging en die Koninklike Genootskap vir die Voorkoming van Dieremishandeling (RSPCA) doen weer ‘n beroep daarop om die installering van CCTV kameras by alle Australiese abattoirs verpligtend te maak. RSPCA Nieu-Suid Wallis hoofinspekteur Dawid O’shannessy het ABC vertel dat toesig en inspeksies van slagpale alledaags behoort te wees in Australië. “Die CCTV sou sekerlik 'n sterk sein aan daardie mense wat met diere werk stuur dat hul welsyn van die hoogste prioriteite is.”
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the installation of CCTV cameras at all Australian abattoirs to be made mandatory. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that surveillance and inspections of slaughterhouses should be routine in Australia. "CCTV would certainly be a strong signal to those people who work with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Nuus het vandag in die Rooi Meer gemeenskap versprei terwyl begrafnisse vir Jeff Weise en drie van die nege slagoffers gehou is, dat nog 'n student gearresteer is in verband met die skool-skietvoorvalle van 21 Maart. Owerhede het min bekend gemaak behalwe om die arrestasie vandag te bevestig. ‘n Bron met kennis van die ondersoek het egter die Minneapolis Star-Tribune vertel dat dit Louis Jourdain was, ‘n 16-jarige seun van Red Lake Stam Hoofman Floyd Jourdain. Dit is nog nie huidiglik bekend watter aantygings gemaak sal word of wat owerhede na die seun gelei het nie, maar jeugmisdaad-verrigtinge het in die federale hof begin.
mt: News has spread today in the Red Lake community as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held, that another student was arrested in connection with the school shooting incidents of March 21. Authorities have made little known other than to confirm the arrest today. A source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, a 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not currently known what charges will be made or what authorities were led to the boy by, but juvenile crime proceedings have begun in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Organiseerders van die protes sê sowat 100,000 mense het in Duitse stede soos Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, en Hanover opgedaag. In Berlyn het die polisie beraam dat daar 6 500 betogers was. Protesoptogte het ook plaasgevind in Parys, Sofia van Bulgarye, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, en Edinburgh en Glasgow in Skotland. Sowat 200 mense het geprotesteer buite die kantore van sommige groot kopiereghouers se kantore in Londen. Laasmaand was daar grootskaalse proteste in Poland toe die land die ACTA onderteken het, wat gelei het daartoe dat die Poolse regering besluit het om vir nou nie die ooreenkoms te bekragtig nie. Latvië en Slowakië het beide die proses om by die ACTA aan te sluit vertraag.
mt: 100,000 people in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover turned out for the protests. In Berlin, the police estimated that there were 6,500 protesters. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested outside the offices of some major copyright holders in London. Last night there were mass protests in Poland when the country signed the ACTA, which led the Polish government to decide not to ratify the agreement for now. Latvia and Slovakia both delayed the process of joining the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Rondom 60 gevalle van onklaar iPods wat oorverhit is aangemeld, wat ‘n totaal van ses vure veroorsaak en vier mense met ligte brandwonde laat. Die Japanse Ministerie van Ekonomie, Handel en Nywerheid (METI) het gesê dat hy bewus was van 27 ongelukke wat met die toestelle verband hou. METI het lass week gekondig dat Apple hulle ingelig het oor 34 addisionele oorverhitting voorvalle, wat die maatskappy “nie-ernstig” genoem het. Die ministerskantoor het gereageer deur Apple se uitstelling van die verslag “waarlik ‘n jammerte” te noem.
mt: 60 cases of overheating iPods have been reported, causing a total of six fires and four people with light burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said he was aware of 27 accidents involving the devices. METI announced last week that Apple had informed them of an additional 34 overheating incidents, which the company called “non-serious.” The ministry office responded by calling Apple’s display of the report “a real shame.”
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Apple se hoof uitvoerende beampte Steve Jobs het die toestel onthul deur na die verhoog te stap en die iPhone uit sy denimbroeksak te haal. Tydens sy 2 uur toespraak het hy genoem dat, “Vandag gaan Apple die foon herbedink, Ons gaan vandag geskiedenis maak”.
mt: Apple's chief executive Steve Jobs unveiled the device by stepping onto the stage and pulling the iPhone out of his denim jacket pocket. During his two-hour presentation, he said, "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We're going to make history."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Huidige senator en Argentynse Presidentsvrou, Christina Fernandez de Kirchner het haar presidensiële kandidaatskap gisteraand in La Plata, ‘n stad 50 kilometer (31 myl) buite Buenos Aires, aangekondig. Mev. Kirchner het haar intensie aangekondig om vir die presidensie by die Argentynse Teater aansoek te doen, dieselfde plek wat sy gebruik het om in 2005 haar veldtog vir die Senaat te begin, as lid van die Buenos Aires provinsie se afvaardiging.
mt: Current senator and Argentine First Lady, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) outside Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for the presidency at the Argentine Theater, the same place she used to begin her 2005 Senate campaign, as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Die ACMA het ook gevind dat ten spyte dat die video op die Internet gebeeldsend is, het Big Brother nie die aanlyninhoud sensorwette gebreek aangesien die media nog nie op Big Brother se webtuiste gestoor is nie. Die Uitsaai Dienste Akte voorsien vir die regulering van Internet inhoud, maar om as Internet inhoud beskou te word, moet dit fisies op ‘n bediener wees.
mt: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed online, Big Brother had not broken the online content censorship laws as the media was not stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, but for it to be considered Internet content it must be physically on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello, Australiese tesourier en die man wat heel moontlik Eerste Minister John Howard sal opvolg as Liberale partyleier, het sy steun agter die kernkragindustrie in Australië. Mnr. Costello het gesê dat wanneer kernkragopwekking ekonomies lewensvatbaar raak, Australië die gebruik daarvan behoort na te streef. “Indien dit kommersieël beskikbaar word, moet ons dit hê. Dit wil sê, daar’s in beginsel geen besware teen kernkrag nie,” het mnr. Costello gesê.
mt: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man who is most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has voiced his support for the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr. Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. "If it becomes commercially available, we should have it. That is, there are in principle no objections to nuclear power," Mr. Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Met slegs agttien medaljes daagliks beskikbaar, het ‘n aantal lande daarin misluk om die medaljepodium te haal. Hule sluit die Nederlande in, met Anna Jochemsen wat neënde geïndig het in die staande klas in die Super-G gister, en Finland met Katja Saarinen wat tiende in dieselfde aktiwiteit geïndig het. Australië se Mitchell Gourley het elfde in die mans staande Super-G klaargemaak. Die Tjeggiese deelnemer Oldrich Jelinek het sestiende in die mans sittende Super-G geeïndig. Arly Velasquez van Mexiko het vyftiende in die sittende Super-G vir mans geeïndig. Nieu-Seeland se Adam Hall het negende in die staande Super-G vir mans geeïndig. Pole se mans gesiggestremde skieer Maciej Krezel en gids, Anna Ogarzynska het dertiende in die Super-G geeïndig. Suid Korea se Jong Seork Park het vier en twintigste in die mans sittende Super-G geeïndig.
mt: With only eighteen medals available daily, a number of countries failed to make the podium. They include the Dutch, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. The Czech Republic's Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide, Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Die verhoor het by Birmingham Crown Hof plaasgevind en is afgesluit op Augustus 3. Die aanbieder het die aanval ontken toe hy in hegtenis geneem is op die toneel en het beweer hy het die paal gebruik om hom self te beskerm teen bottels wat na hom gegooi is deur tot dertig mense. Blake is ook beskuldig daarvan dat hy ‘n poging aangewend het om die gang van die gereg te verdraai. Die regter het vir Blake gesê dat dit ""byna onverhoedbaar"" was dat hy tronk toe gestuur sou word."
mt: "The hearing took place at Birmingham Crown Court and was concluded on August 3. The defendant denied the attack when he was arrested at the scene and claimed he had used the pole to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by up to 30 people. Blake was also accused of attempting to mislead the court. The judge told Blake that it was ""almost inevitable"" that he would be sent to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: "Die verhoor het by Birmingham Crown Hof plaasgevind en is afgesluit op Augustus 3. Die aanbieder het die aanval ontken toe hy in hegtenis geneem is op die toneel en het beweer hy het die paal gebruik om hom self te beskerm teen bottels wat na hom gegooi is deur tot dertig mense. Blake is ook beskuldig daarvan dat hy ‘n poging aangewend het om die gang van die gereg te verdraai. Die regter het vir Blake gesê dat dit ""byna onverhoedbaar"" was dat hy tronk toe gestuur sou word."
mt: "The hearing took place at Birmingham Crown Court and was concluded on August 3. The defendant denied the attack when he was arrested at the scene and claimed he had used the pole to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by up to 30 people. Blake was also accused of attempting to mislead the court. The judge told Blake that it was ""almost inevitable"" that he would be sent to prison."

src: Ander onderwerpe op die agenda in Bali sluit in die redding van die wêreld se oorblywende woude, en om tegnologieë te deel wat die nasies help om op minder besoedelende maniere te groei. Die V.N. hoop ook om ‘n fonds te finaliseer om lande wat geaffekteer is deur aardverwarming deur om die impak daarvan te hanteer. Die geld kon gebruik word om huise vloed-bestand te maak, water beter te bestuur, of oeste uit te brei.
mt: Other issues on the agenda in Bali include saving the world’s remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help nations grow in less polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by climate change manage its impact. The money could be used to make homes flood-resistant, better manage water, or expand crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigerië het voorheen aangekondig dat dit beplan om by die AfCFTA aan te sluit gedurende die week voor die beraad. AU handel en industrie kommissaris Albert Muchanga het aangekondig dat Benin sou aansluit. Die kommissaris het gesê, “Ons het nog nie op die reëls van die oorsprong en die tarief toelatings besluit nie, maar die raamwerk wat ons het is genoeg om op Julie 1, 2020 te begin handeldryf.
mt: Nigeria had previously announced that it planned to join the AfCFTA during the week before the council. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, “We have not yet decided on the rules of origin and tariff admissions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020.
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Sy het kritiese lof verwerf gedurende haar tyd in Atlanta en is erken vir innoverende stedelike opvoeding. In 2009 het sy die titel van Nasionale Superintendent van die Jaar verwerf. Ten tye van die toekenning, het Atlanta skole ‘n groot verbetering in toetspunte ervaar. Kort daarna, het die Atlanta Journal-Constitution ‘n verslag gepubliseer wat probleme met die toets-resultate bewys. Die verslag het toetspunte getoon wat onwaarskynlik vinnig toegeneem het, en beweer dat die skool intern probleme opgetel het maar nie op die bevindinge reaggeer het nie. Bewyse daarna het aangedui dat daar met eksamen vraestelle gepeuter is deur Hall, en saam met 34 ander opvoedings amptenare is hulle in 2013 beskuldig.
mt: She earned critical praise during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she won the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had experienced a large increase in test scores. Shortly thereafter, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that showed problems with the test results. The report showed test scores that had increased quickly, and alleged that the school internally had problems but did not respond to the findings. Evidence afterwards showed that Hall had cheated on test questions, and along with 34 other education officials was charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Een bom het buite die goewerneur generaal se kantoor ontplof. Drie verdere bomme het naby die goewernment se geboue ontplof binne 'n periode van twee ure. Sommige verslae het die amptelike dodetal op agt gestel, en amptelike verslae bevestig dat tot 30 beseer is; maar finale getalle is nog nie bekend nie.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three further bombs exploded near government buildings within a period of two hours. Some reports have the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 are injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21-jaar oue Jesus het by Manchester City laas jaar in Januarie 2017 aangesluit vanaf die Brasiliaanse sokkerklub Palmeiras, vir ‘n vermelde fooi van £27 miljoen. Sedertien het die Braziliër in 53 wedstryde vir die klub in alle kompetisies verskyn en het 24 doele aangeteken.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from the Brazilian soccer club Palmeiras, for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has appeared in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: ‘n Hostel het in Mekka ineengestort, die heilige stad van Islam, teen sowat 10 uur vanoggend, plaaslike tyd. Die gebou het ‘n aantal pelgrims gehuisves wat die heilige stad op die aand van die Hajj-pelgrimstog kom besoek het. Die koshuis se gaste was meestal burgers van die Vereenigde Arabiese Emirate. Die dodetal is ten minste 15, ‘n figuur wat verwag word om te gaan styg.
mt: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, at around 10 am local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city on the night of the Hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Die sateliete, wat beide meer as 1,000pond weeg, en teen ongeveer 17,500 myl per uur reis, het 491 myl bo aarde gebots. Wetenskaplikes sê dat die ontploffing wat deur die botsing veroorsaak is, massief was. Hulle probeer nog steeds vasstel net hoe groot die botsing was en hoe die Aarde affekteer sal word. Die Vereenigde State Strategiese Opdrag van die VS Departement van Verdediging kantoor hou die puin dop. Die resultaat van beplande analise sal op ‘n publieke webblad geplaas word.
mt: The satellites, which both weigh more than 1,000 pounds, and travel at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how big the collision was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is keeping the debris under wraps. The results of planned analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten is 190ste op die 2008 lys van 400 Rykste Amerikaners gelys met ‘n geskatte fortuin van $2.3 biljoen. Hy het in 1950 gegradueer aan die Kollege van Kunste en Wetenskap van die Universiteit van Virginia en was ‘n beduidende skenker aan die instelling.
mt: Batten is ranked 190th on the 2008 list of 400 Richest Americans with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts and Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a prominent donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Kalifornië se goewerneur Arnold Schwarzenegger het 'n wetsontwerp wat die verkoop of verhuring van gewelddadige rekenaarspeletjies aan minderjariges verban, as wet onderteken. Die wetgewing vereis dat gewelddadige speletjies in die staat van Kalifornië gemerk word met ‘n dekalibreer lesing “18” wat die verkope daarvan aan ‘n minderjarige strafbaar met $1000 per oortreding maak.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger has signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The legislation requires that violent games in the state of California be marked with a "18" decal that makes the sale of such games to a minor punishable with a $1000 fine per offense.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall, wie getroud is met twee volwasse kinders, het nie ‘n groot indruk op Miller, aan wie die storie verwant was, gelaat nie. Toe hy vir kommentaar gevra is, het Miller gesê, “Mike praat baie gedurende die verhoor…Ek het gereed gemaak so ek het nie regtig gehoor wat hy gesê het nie.”
mt: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not make a big impression on Miller, who was related to the story. When asked for comment, Miller said, “Mike talks a lot during the hearing… I was ready so I didn’t really hear what he said.”
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Eersteminister Stephen Harper het daarop ooreengekom om die goewernment se ‘Skoon Lug Wetsontwerp’aan alle party-komitees te stuur om dit na te sien, voor dit ‘n tweede keer gelees word, na Dinsdag se 25 minute vergadering met die NDP leier Jack Layton by die PMO. Layton het vir veranderinge aan die konserwatiewes se omgewingswet gevra tydens die byeenkoms met die EM, en gevra vir 'n ""deeglike en algehele herskryf"" van die Konserwatiewe party se omgewingswet. Vandat die Federale Regering ingetree het om die befondsing van die Mersey hospitaal in Devonport, Tasmania oor te neem, het die staatsregering en sommige federale MPs die aksie gekritiseer as ‘n foefie in die aanloop tot die federale verkiesing wat in November besluit word. Maar Eerste Minister John Howard het gesê dat die akte slegs die hospitaalfasiliteite beskerm van afgegradeer te word deur die Tasmaniese regering, en sodoende ‘n ekstra AUD$45 miljoen te gee."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to all party committees to review, before it is read a second time, after Tuesday's 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton asked for changes to the Conservatives' environment bill during the meeting with the PM, and asked for a ""thorough and complete rewrite"" of the Conservative party's environment bill. Since the federal government took over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized the action as a stunt in the lead-up to the federal election which will be decided in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said the act only protects the hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, and thus gives an extra AUD$45 million."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Beide sianuriensuur en melamien is in urinemonsters gevind van troeteldiere wat dood is nadat hulle besmette troeteldierkos geëet het. Die twee verbindings reageer met mekaar om kristalle te vorm wat nier funksie mag blokkeer, het navorsers by die Universiteit gesê. Die navorsers het kristalle opgemerk wat in kat urine gevorm is deur die toevoeging van melamien en sianuriensuur. Die samestelling van hierdie kristalle is dieselfde as dié wat gevind word in die uriene van aangetaste troeteldiere wanneer dit vergelyk word onder infrarooi-spektroskopie (FITR).
mt: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of animals that died after eating contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with each other to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the University said. The researchers noted crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals is the same as those found in the urine of affected pets when compared under infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Xinhua berig dat die staat se ondersoekspan op Woensdag twee ‘black box’-vlugopnemers verhaal het. Mense stoeiers het ook hulde gebring aan Luna. Tommy Dreamer het gesê “Luna was die eerste Koningin van Uiterstes. My eerste bestuurder Luna het gesterf op die nag van twee mane. Baie uniek net soos sy. Sterk vrou.” Dustin “Goldust” Runnels het kommentaar gelewer dat “Luna was net so vreemd soos ek… dalk selfs meer…lief vir haar en sal haar mis…hopelik is sy in ‘n beter plek.”
mt: Xinhua reports that the state's investigation team on Wednesday recovered two "black box" flight recorders. People mourners also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extremes. My first driver Luna died on the night of two moons. Very unique just like her. Strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was just as weird as I... maybe even more... loved her and will miss her... hopefully she is in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Alhoewel drie mense in die huis was toe die motor daarmee impak gemaak het, was nie een van hulle beseer nie. Derhalwe het die bestuurder ernstige kopbeserings opgedoen. Die pad waar die botsing plaasgevind het is tydelik toegemaak terwyl nooddienste die drywer uit die rooi Audi TT verlos het. Hy is aanvanklik in die James Paget Hospitaal in Groot Yarmouth gehospitaliseer. Hy is daarna oorgeplaas na die Addenbrook Hospitaal in Cambridge.
mt: Although three people were in the house when the car crashed into it, none of them were injured. Therefore the driver sustained serious head injuries. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed while emergency services extricated the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalized in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to the Addenbrooke Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Die spele het teen 10:00vm afgeskop met goeie weer behalwe vir 'n ligte oggend reënbui wat gou opgeklaar het, was dit 'n perfekte dag vir 7's rugby. Toernooi topgekeurde Suid Afrika het op die regte noot afgeskop met ‘n gemaklike 26 – 00 wen teen 5de gekeurde Zambië. Al het sy beslis uit oefening teen haar suiderlike susters gelyk, het Suid-Afrika steeds stadig maar seker verbeter soos die toernooi gevorder het. Hulle gedissiplineerde verdedeging, balbeheervermoë en uitstekende spanwerk het hulle laat uitblink, en dit was duidelik dat dit nie moeilik sou wees om hierdie span te klop nie.
mt: 7's rugby games kicked off at 10:00am with good weather except for a light morning shower that cleared up quickly, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top-ranked South Africa kicked off on the right note with an easy 26 – 00 win over 5th ranked Zambia. Although she had certainly looked the part in practice against her southern sisters, South Africa had still slowly but surely improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defense, ball control and excellent teamwork had them stand out, and it was clear that it would not be easy to beat this team.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Tydens die laaste drie dekades, tenspyte dat dit offisieël ‘n kommunistiese staat gebly het, het Sjina ‘n markekonomie ontwikkel. Die eerste ekonomiese hervormings is gemaak onder die leierskap van Deng Xiaoping. Sedertdien het Sjina se ekonomie 90 keer gegroei in grootte. Laas jaar het China vir die eerste keer meer motors as Duitsland vervaardig en die Verenigde State as die grootste mark in hierdie industrie verbygesteek. China se GDP kan groter as die Verenigde State s’n wees binne twee dekades.
mt: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown 90 times in size. Last year, China produced more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market in this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States' within two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: “Ons sal ‘n poging maak om koolstofdioksiedvrystellings per eenheid BBP te sny teen ‘n noemenswaardige marge teen 2020 vanaf die 2005 vlak,” het Hu gesê. Hy het nie 'n bedrag daargestel vir die inperkings nie, maar het gesê dat hulle gemaak sal word gebaseer op China se ekonomiese uitset. Hu het ontwikkelende lande aangemoedig om die ou pad van eers besoedel en later opruim te vermy. Hy het bygevoeg, “Hulle behoort nietemin nie gevra te word om verpligtinge aan te neem wat buite hul ontwikkelingstadium, verantwoordelikheidsin en vermoëns is nie.”
mt: “ We will try to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,” Hu said. He did not give a figure for the restrictions, but said they would be made based on China’s economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries to avoid the old path of first pollute and then clean up. He added, “They should not be asked to take on responsibilities that are beyond their development stage, responsibility and ability.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Die mediese weldadigheidsorganisasie, Mangola, Medisyne Sonder Grense en die Wêreld Gesondheidsorganisasie sê dat dit die ergste uitbraak is wat al in die land opgeteken is. Die woordvoerder vir Medecines Sans Frontiere, Richard Veerman het gesê: “Angola is op pad na sy ergste uitbraak ooit, en die situasie in Angola bly baie erg.”
mt: The medical charity, Mangola, Medecins Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. The spokesman for Medecins Sans Frontieres, Richard Veerman said: “Angola is on its way to its worst outbreak ever, and the situation in Angola remains very serious.”
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Die Direkteur van Openbare Vervolging, Kier Starmer QC, het vanoggend 'n rede gevoer wat die vervolging van beide Huhne en Pryce aangekondig het. Huhne het bedank en sal in die kabinet deur Ed Davey MP vervang word. Norman Lamb MP sal na verwagting die Besigheidsminister se werk, waaruit Davey tree, opneem. Huhne en Pryce sal na verwagting op 16 Februarie in die Westminster-landdroshof verskyn.
mt: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, gave a speech this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and will be replaced in the cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over the Business Secretary's role, from which Davey is stepping down. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Die storie wat in die Franse opera, deur Camille Saint Saens, aangebied is, is van ‘n kunstenaar “wie se lewe gedikteer word deur ‘n liefde vir dwelms en Japan.” As gevolg daarvan rook die kunstenaars dagga zolle op die verhoog, en die teater self moedig die gehoor aan om deel te neem.
mt: The story told in the French opera, by Camille Saint Saens, is of an artist “whose life is dictated by a love of drugs and Japan.” As a result, the artists smoke marijuana pellets on stage, and the theater itself encourages the audience to participate.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, ook bekend as “ruimtevaarder Nr. 11”, was deel van die Soviet Unie se oorspronklike span ruimtevaarders. Op 18 Maart, 1965, het hy die eerste bemande buitevoertuig aktiwiteit (EVA), of “ruimtewandeling”, ondergaan en buite die ruimtetuig gebly vir net oor die twaalf minute. Hy het die “Held van die Sowjet Unie”, die Sowjet Unie se hoogste eer, vir sy werk ontvang. Tien jaar later,het hy die Sowjet deel van die Apollo-Soyuz missie gelei om te simboliseer dat die Ruimte Resies verby was.
mt: Leonov, also known as “Cosmonaut No. 11,” was part of the Soviet Union’s original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or “spacewalk,” and remained outside the spacecraft for just over 12 minutes. He received the “Hero of the Soviet Union,” the Soviet Union’s highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet portion of the Apollo-Soyuz mission to symbolize that the Space Race was over.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Ná die ongeluk is Gibson na die hospitaal geneem, maar het kort daarná gesterf. Die trokbestuurder, wat 64 jaar oud is, is nie in die botsing beseer nie. Die voertuig is opsigself van die toneel van die ongeluk ontruim om ongeveer 1200 GMT op dieselfde dag. ‘n Mens wat in ‘n vulstasie werk waar die ongeluk gebeur het, het gesê: “Daar was kinders wat gewag het om die pad oor te steek en hulle het almal geskree en gehuil.” Hulle het almal teruggehardloop van waar die ongeluk gebeur het.
mt: After the accident Gibson was taken to the hospital, but died shortly thereafter. The truck driver, who is 64 years old, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was removed from the scene of the accident around 1200 GMT on the same day. A person who works in a gas station where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they all screamed and cried." They all ran back from where the accident occurred.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Die werk wat gedoen word is meestal teoreties, maar die program is geskryf om observasies wat gemaak is van die Sagittarius sterrestelsel te simuleer. Die effek waarna die span gesoek het, sou veroorsaak word deur getykragte tussen die melkweg se donker materie en die Melkweg se donker materie. Net soos die maan ‘n aantrekking op die aarde uitvoer, wat die getye veroorsaak, so voer die Melkweg ook ‘n aantrekking op die Boogskutter sterrestelsel uit. Die wetenskaplikes kon tot die gevolgtrekking kom dat die donker materie ander donker materie beïnvloed op dieselfde manier as wat gewone materiaal doen. Hierdie teorie sê dat die meeste donker materie om ‘n sterreselsel word gevind in ‘n tipe stralekrans, en bestaan uit baie klein deeltjies.
mt: The work being done is mostly theoretical, but the program is written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the Milky Way's dark matter and the Sagittarius galaxy's dark matter. Just as the moon exerts a pull on the Earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a pull on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that dark matter influences other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does. This theory says that most dark matter found around a galaxy is in a type of radiation belt, and consists of very small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Die debat is aangevuur deur kontroversie oor die besteding van verligtingsbefondsing en rekonstruksie in die nadraai van Orkaan Katrina; wat party fiskale konserwatiewes laggend as “Bush se New Orleans Ooreenkoms” benoem het. Liberale kritiek van die rekonstruksie poging fokus op die toekenning van rekonstruksie kontrakte aan waargeneemde Washington binnewerkers.
mt: The debate was fueled by controversy over the spending of relief funding and reconstruction in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina; what some fiscal conservatives derisively dubbed “Bush’s New Orleans Agreement.” Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focuses on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Die debat is aangevuur deur kontroversie oor die besteding van verligtingsbefondsing en rekonstruksie in die nadraai van Orkaan Katrina; wat party fiskale konserwatiewes laggend as “Bush se New Orleans Ooreenkoms” benoem het. Liberale kritiek van die rekonstruksie poging fokus op die toekenning van rekonstruksie kontrakte aan waargeneemde Washington binnewerkers.
mt: The debate was fueled by controversy over the spending of relief funding and reconstruction in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina; what some fiscal conservatives derisively dubbed “Bush’s New Orleans Agreement.” Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focuses on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Wanneer die kapsule op Aarde kom en die atmosfeer binnekom, teen omtrend 5vm (oosterlike tyd), sal dit na verwagting omtrend ‘n ligskou hou vir mense wat in Noord California, Oregon, Nevada en Utah bly. Die kapsel sal nes ‘n verskietende ster lyk wat deur die lug gaan. Die kapsule sal teen ‘n spoed van ongeveer 12.8 km of 8 myl per sekonde reis, vinnig genoeg om vanaf San Fransisco tot Los Angeles in een minuut te gaan. Sterstof sal ‘n nuwe record van alle tye stel om rede dat dit die vinnigste ruimtetuig is om na Aarde toe terug te keer, wat die vorige record wat in Mei van 1969 gestel is gedurend die terugkeer van die Apollo X opdrag module. “Dit sal oor van die weskus van noord-Kalifornië beweeg en sal die hemelruim verlig van Kalifornië tot sentraal Oregon en deur Nevada en Idaho en in Utah in,” het Tom Duxbury, Stardust se projekbestuurder gesê.
mt: When the capsule comes to Earth and enters the atmosphere, around 5pm (eastern time), it is expected to hold around a light show for people who live in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look like a shooting star as it goes through the air. The capsule will travel at a speed of about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new record of all time because it is the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, which the previous record was set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light up the sky from California to central Oregon and through Nevada and Idaho and in Utah,” said Tom Duxbury, Stardust’s project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: n Dokter wat gewerk het by die Kinderhospitaal van Pittsburg, Pennsylvanië sal met 'n verergde graad van moord aangekla word na haar moeder dood in die kattebak van haar kar gevind is op Woensdag - sê owerhede in Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, is in Blue Ash in Ohio, n voorstad ongeveer 15 myl noord van Cincinnati, gevind waar sy op die grond in haar onderklere gelê het en was blykbaar onder die invloed van medikasie. Sy het beamptes beduie na haar swart Oldsmobile Intrigue wat ongeveerd 500 voet weg was. Daar het hulle die liggaam van Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, gevind, toegemaak in bloedbevlekte komberse. Polisie het gesê dit wil voorkom of die liggaam vir min of meer ‘n dag daar was.
mt: A doctor who worked at the Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with a degree of murder after her mother was found dead in the cat litter box of her car on Wednesday - say officials in Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash in Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, where she was lying on the ground in her underwear and appeared to be under the influence of medication. She pointed officials to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue, which was about 500 feet away. There they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, wrapped in bloody blankets. Police say it appears the body was there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Dit was die grootste verkryging in eBay se geskiedenis. Die maatskappy hoop om sy wins-bronne te diversifiseer en sulke populariteit te verkry in areas waar Skype ‘n sterk posisie behou, soos China, Oos Europa en Brasilië.
mt: It was the largest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and achieve such popularity in areas where Skype maintains a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Toe die vegtery ophou nadat die gewondes vervoer is na die hospitaal, het ongeveer 40 van die oorblywende gevangenes in die binneterrein gebly en geweier om na hulle selle terug te keer. Onderhandelaars het die situasie probeer regstel, maar die gevangenes se vereistes is nie duidelik nie. Tussen 10:00-11:00nm MDT, is ‘n vuur gestig deur gevangenes op die werf. Offisiere met die nodige toerusting, het die binneplein binnegekom en die gevangenes met traangas in ń hoek gedryf. Brandweerreddingsspanne het uiteindelik die vuur teen 11:35 geblus gekry.
mt: When the rioting stopped after the injured were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the remaining inmates remained in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to settle the situation, but the inmates' demands were not clear. Between 10:00-11:00pm MDT, a fire was started by inmates on the yard. Officers with the necessary equipment, drove the inmates into a corner with tear gas. Firefighters eventually put out the fire at 11:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
