src: Die opmerkings, wat regstreeks op televisie gebeeldsend is, is die eerste keer wat senior Irannese bronne toegegee het dat die sanksies enige effek het. Hulle sluit in finansiële beperkings en ‘n verbieding deur die Europese Unie op die uitvoer van ru-olie, van waar af die Iraniese ekonomie 80% van sy buitelandse inkomste ontvang. In hul mees onlangse verslag het OPEC gesê dat uitvoere van ruolie geval het to hul laagste vlak in twee dekades tot 2.8 miljoen vate per dag. Die land se opperhoof, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, het die afhanklikheid aan olie beskryf as ‘‘n lokval’, gedateer van voor Iran se Islamitiese revolusie in 1979 en die land moet homself bevry.
mt: The remarks, which were broadcast live on television, were the first time senior Iranian officials acknowledged that the sanctions had any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80 percent of its foreign income. In its latest report, OPEC said that exports of crude oil had fallen to their lowest level in two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country’s supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described the dependence on oil as a “trap,” dating back to before Iran’s Islamic revolution in 1979 and the country must free itself.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: In Frankryk, was stemming ‘n tradisioneel lae tegnologie ervaring: kiesers isoleer hulself in ‘n hokkie, en sit dan ‘n voorafgedrukte vel papier wat die kandidaat van hul keuse aandui, in ‘n koevert. Na amptenare die verkieser se identiteit bevestig het, laat val die verkieser die koevert in die stembus en onderteken hy die kieserslys. Franse verkiesingswetgewing het hierdie verrigtinge nogal streng gekodifiseer. Sedert 1988, moet stembusse deurskynend wees sodat kiesers en waarnemers kan getuig dat geen koeverte aan die begin van die verkiesing daar was en dat geen koeverte bygevoeg is behalwe die wat getel is en deur geregistreerde kiesers is. Kandidate kan verteenwoordigers stuur om elke deel van die proses te volg. Saans word stemme deur vrywilligers onder swaar toesig getel, volgens spesifieke prosedures.
mt: In France, the voting experience was traditionally a low-tech affair: voters were isolated in a booth, and then placed a pre-printed slip of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After election officials verified the voter's identity, the voter dropped the envelope into the ballot box and signed the voter's list. French election law had codified these proceedings rather strictly. Since 1988, ballot boxes had to be transparent so that voters and observers could attest that no envelopes were present at the beginning of the election and that no envelopes were added except those counted and cast by registered voters. Candidates could send representatives to follow each step of the process. In the evening, votes were counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, according to specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Indien dit bevestig is, voltooi dit Allen se agt-jaar soektog na die Musashi. Die wrak van die RBV is gevind met die hulp van see-bed kaarte. Volgens Allen, een van die rykste mense in die wêreld, het 'n groot deel van sy rykdom in mariene eksplorasie belê, en sy soeke na die Musashi uit 'n lewenslange belangstelling in die oorlog.
mt: If confirmed, this would complete Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. The wreck of the RBV was found with the help of sea-bed maps. According to Allen, one of the richest people in the world, a large part of his wealth has been invested in marine exploration, and his search for the Musashi from a lifelong interest in the war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televisie verslae wys wit rook wat uit die fabriek kom. Plaaslike owerhede waarsku inwoners in die omgewing van die reaktor om binne te bly, lugverkoelers af te skakel en nie kraanwater te drink nie. Volgens Japan se kernkrag agentskap, is radio-aktiewe cesium en jodium by die plantasie identifiseer. Owerhede spekuleer dat houers wat uraan brandstof by die perseel gehou het, dalk gebars het en besig is om te lek.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities warn residents in the area of the reactor to stay inside, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear power agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll het die uiters Dwelmweerstandige Tuberkulose (XDR-TB) in die Suid-Afrikaanse streek KwaZulu-Natal ontdek. In ‘n onderhoud, het hy gesê dat die nuwe kultivar “baie hoogs onrusbarend en ontstellend was vanweê die baie hoë dodesyfer.” Party pasiënte het dalk die kiem opgetel in die hospitaal, dink Dr. Moll, en ten minste twee was gesondheidspersoneel van die hospitaal. In een jaar se tyd sal een besmette persoon 10 tot 15 nabye kennisse besmet. Alhoewel, die persentasie van XDR-TB in die hele groep mense met tuberkulose blyk steeds laag te wees; 6,000 van die totale 330,000 mense wat besmet is teen enige spesifieke oomblik in Suid Afrika.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered the extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said that the new strain was “very alarming and shocking because of the high death rate.” Some patients may have picked up the germ in the hospital, thinks Dr. Moll, and at least two were hospital staff. In a year’s time one infected person will infect 10 to 15 close contacts. Although, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis seems to be still low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people who are infected at any specific time in South Africa.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

In ‘n onderhoud, het hy gesê dat die nuwe kultivar “baie hoogs onrusbarend en ontstellend was vanweê die baie hoë dodesyfer.” Party pasiënte het dalk die kiem opgetel in die hospitaal, dink Dr. Moll, en ten minste twee was gesondheidspersoneel van die hospitaal. In een jaar se tyd sal een besmette persoon 10 tot 15 nabye kennisse besmet. Alhoewel, die persentasie van XDR-TB in die hele groep mense met tuberkulose blyk steeds laag te wees; 6,000 van die totale 330,000 mense wat besmet is teen enige spesifieke oomblik in Suid Afrika.
mt: Dr Tony Moll discovered the extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region of KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said that the new strain was “very alarming and shocking because of the high death rate.” Some patients may have picked up the germ in the hospital, thinks Dr. Moll, and at least two were hospital staff. In a year’s time one infected person will infect 10 to 15 close contacts. Although, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis seems to be still low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people who are infected at any specific time in South Africa.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen is ‘n sisteem wat die FLA beweer sal lugvaartuie toelaat om korter roetes te vlieg en miljoene liters brandstof jaarliks spaar en koolstof uitlatings sny. Dit gebruik satelliet-gebaseerde tegnologie in plaas van ouer grond-radar-gebaseerde tegnologie om lugverkeerkontroleerder toelaat om die lugvaartuig met groter presissie neer te pen en vlieëniers meer akkurate inligting te gee.
mt: NextGen is a system that the FAA claims will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel annually and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology instead of older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to more precisely guide aircraft and give pilots more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Geskiedkundiges het vorige FBI beleide gekritiseer omdat dit gefokus het op gevalle wat maklik is om op te los, veral gesteelde karre, met die oog daarop om die agentskap se suksespeiling te verbeter. Die Kongres het die obseniteit inisiatief in fiskale 2005 begin fonds en spesifiseer dat die FBO 10 agente aan volwasse pornografie moet toewy.
mt: Historians have criticized previous FBI policies because they focused on cases that are easy to solve, especially stolen cars, with the goal of improving the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specifies that the FBI assign 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Die JAS 39C Gripen het op die aanloopbaan neergestort om en by 9:30 vm plaaslike tyd (0230 UTC) en ontplof, sodoende die lughawe gesluit vir kommersiële vlugte. Die vlieenier was identifiseer as Eskader Leier Dilokrit Pattavee. Plaaslike media berig ‘n lughawe brandweervoertuig het gerol terwyl hul gereageer het.
mt: The JAS 39C Gripen had crashed on the runway around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, thus closing the airport for commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported a fire truck had rolled while they were responding.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Gedurend die 1960s het Brezinski vir John F. Kennedy gewerk as sy adviseur en toe by die Lyndon B. Johnson administrasie. Tydens die 1976 verkiesings het hy Carter op buitelandse beleid geadviseer, en het toe as Nasionale Sekuriteitsadviseur (NSA) gedien tussen 1977 tot 1981, na Henry Kissinger. Hy het as NSA vir Carter diplomaties bygestaan in die hantering van wêreldsake, soos die Kamp Dawid Ooreenkomste, 1978; wat die VSA-Sjina verhoudings genormaliseer het regdeur die laat 1970s; die Irannese Revolusie, wat tot die Irannese gyselaarsdrama gelei het, 1979; en die Sowjet inval van Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: During the 1960s, Brezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his adviser and then for the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 elections, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, after Henry Kissinger. He assisted Carter diplomatically in the handling of world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; which normalized U.S.-China relations throughout the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Gebore in die Kroasiese hoofstad, Zagreb, het Bobek roem gekry terwyl hy vir Partizan Belgrade gespeel het. Hy het by hulle aangesluit in 1945 en gebly tot 1958. Gedurende sy tyd met die span, het hy 403 doele in 468 verskynings aangeteken. Niemand anders het ooit meer verskynings gemaak of meer doele as Bobek aangeteken nie. In 1995 is hy verkies as die beste speler in Partizan’s geskiedenis.
mt: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek earned fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined the team in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals than Bobek. In 1995, he was elected as the best player in Partizan’s history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae is ‘n spesie uit die familie Dromaeosauridae en is ‘n nefie van die Velociraptor. Dit is geglo dat die volgeveerde, warmbloedige Roofvoël regop gestaan het op twee bene met kloue soos die Velociraptor. Sy tweede klou was groter, wat die naam Hesperonychus, wat “westerse kou” beteken, laat opkom het.
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae  is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of the Velociraptor. It is believed that the feathered, warm-blooded Raptor stood upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, which gave rise to the name Hesperonychus, which means "western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Ten minste 100 mense was by die partytjie, om die eerste herdenking van ‘n paartjie te vier, waarvan die troue laas jaar gehou is. n Formele herdenkingsgeleentheid is volgens amptenare vir 'n latere datum gereël. Die paartjie is ‘n jaar gelede in Texas getroud en het Buffalo toe gekom om dit met hul vriende en familie te vier. Die 30-jaar oue man, wat in Buffalo gebore is, was een van die vier wat tydens die skietery gedood is, maar sy vrou is nie beseer nie.
mt: 100 people were at the party, to celebrate the first anniversary of their wedding, which was held last year. A formal commemoration event has been arranged for a later date. The couple was married a year ago in Texas and came to Buffalo to celebrate it with their friends and family. The 30-year-old man, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four who were killed during the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Die Luno het 120-160 kubieke meter brandstof aan boord gehad toe dit onklaar geraak het en stormwinde en golwe dit in die keerwalle ingestoot het. Helikopters het die twaalf spanlede gered en die enigste besering was ‘n gebreekte neus. Die 100 meter skip was oppad om sy gewone kunsmis-vrag te gaan optel en aanvanklik het amptenare gevrees dat die skip 'n vrag sou stort.
mt: The Luno had 120-160 cubic meters of fuel on board when it became disabled and storm winds and waves drove it into the breakwaters. Helicopters rescued the twelve crew members and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100 meter ship was on its way to collect its usual scrap metal cargo and initially officials feared the ship would sink.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Vautier se prestasies buite regie het 'n eetstaking in 1973 ingesluit, teen wat hy as politieke sensorskap gesien het. Franse wetgewing was verander. Sy aktivisme het terug gegaan na 15 jarige ouderdom toe hy by die Franse Weerstandsbeweging gedurende Wêreld Oorlog II aangesluit het. Hy het homself in ‘n boek van 1998 dokumenteer. In die 1960s is hy terug na die nuut-onafhanklike Algerië om film regie te onderrig.
mt: Vautier's achievements outside of the director's chair included a hunger strike in 1973, which he saw as political censorship. French legislation was changed. His activism went back to 15-year-old when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a book in 1998. In the 1960s, he returned to the newly independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Oor vier miljoen mense het Rome toe gegaan om die begrafnis by te woon. Die hoeveelheid mense was so groot dat dit nie vir almal moontlik was om toegang tot die begrafnis in St. Peter’s Square te verkry nie. Verskeie groot televisie skerms is geinstalleer in verskillende plekke in Rome om mense die seremonie te laat sien. In baie ander stede van Italië en in die res van die wêreld, veral in Pole, was soortgelyke opstelle gemaak, wat beskou was deur ‘n groot aantal mense.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people was so large that it was not possible for everyone to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter’s Square. Several large television screens were installed in different places in Rome to allow people to see the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were made, which were viewed by a large number of people.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Volgens berigte, het ‘n woonstel op Macbethstraat ontplof vanweë ‘n gaslekkasie. n Amptenaar van die gasmaatskappy het by die toneel gerapporteeer na 'n buurman ingebel het oor 'n gaslekkasie. Toe die amptenaar daar aankom, het die woonstel ontplof. Geen ernstige beserings is aangemeld nie, maar ten minste vyf mense wat op die toneel was tydens die ontploffing, is behandel vir simtome van skok. Niemand was binne die woonstel nie. Op daardie stadium, is bykans 100 inwoners uit die gebied ontruim.
mt: According to reports, a flat on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. A gas company official reported to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the flat exploded. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people who were at the scene during the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the flat. At that stage, almost 100 residents from the area were evacuated.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Die sterftes was Nicolas Alden, 25, en Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback was die bestuurder. Edgar Veguilla het arm en kakebeenwonde ontvang terwyl Kristoffer Schneider rekonstruktiewe plastiese chirurgie aan sy gesig moes kry. Uka se wapen het gefaal terwyl dit gerig op ‘n vyfde man se kop was. Schneider het voordurende pyn, blindheid in een oog, ‘n vermiste gedeelte van ‘n kopbeen en ‘n gesig wat deur titanium herbou is. Schneider het via videoskakel vanuit ‘n USAF basis in sy tuisland getuig
mt: 2 people were killed, Nicolas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla suffered arm and facial fractures while Kristoffer Schneider required reconstructive plastic surgery to his face. Uka's weapon failed while it was aimed at a fifth man's head. Schneider testified via video link from an USAF base in his home country
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Beide golf en rugby is vasgestel om terug te keer na die Olimpiese Spele. Die Internasionale Olimpiese Kommitee het gestem om die sporte in te sluit by hul uitvoerende bestuursbyeenkoms vandag in Berlyn. Rugby, veral die rugby unie, en golf is verkose oor vyf ander sporte waaroor besin is om in die Olimpiese spele deel te neem. Muurbal, karate en roller sporte het probeer om ingesluit te word in die Olimpiese program, asook bofbal en sagtebal, wat uit die 2005 Olimpiese Spele gestem is. Die stemming moet nog bekragtig word deur die volle IOC by die Oktober vergadering in Kopenhagen.
mt: Both golf and rugby have been set to return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee has voted to include the sports in their executive board meeting today in Berlin. Rugby, especially the rugby union, and golf were chosen over five other sports that were considered to be included in the Olympic games. Wallball, karate and roller sports tried to be included in the Olympic program, as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the 2005 Olympics. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at the October meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Op September 24, 1759, het Arthur Guinness ‘n 9,000 jaar huurkontrak vir die St James’ Gate Brouery in Dublin, Ierland geteken. 250 jaar later, het Guinness gegroei tot ‘n globale besigheid met ‘n jaarlikse opbrengs van meer as 10 biljoen euros (U$14.7 biljoen).
mt: 250 years later, Guinness has grown into a global business with an annual revenue of more than €10 billion ($14.7 billion).
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Die tipe voëlgriep wat noodlottig is aan mense, H5N1, is al gevind waar dit ‘n dooie wilde eend besmet het, wat op Maandag in ‘n moeras naby Lyon in die ooste van Frankryk gevind is. Frankryk is die sewende land in die Europese Unie wat onder die virus ly; in die voetspore van Oostenryk, Duitsland, Slowakye, Bulgarye, Griekeland en Italië. Verdagte gevalle van H5N1 in Kroasië en Denemarke bly onbevestig.
mt: The type of bird flu that is fatal to humans, H5N1, has already been found where it infected a dead wild goose, which was found Monday in a marsh near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be affected by the virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovakia, Bulgaria, Greece, and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: VN-vredesmagte, wat in Haïti gearriveer het ná die 2010-aardbewing, word blameer vir die verspreiding van die siekte wat naby die troepe se kamp uitgebreek het. Volgens die hofsaak is rommel vanaf die VN kamp nie behoorlik saniteer nie, wat veroorsaak het dat bakterië in een van Haiti se grootste riviere, die Artibonite Rivier, se sytakke ingeloop het. Voor die aankoms van die troepe, het Haïti nog nie probleme wat aan die siektetoestand verwant is ervaar sedert die 1800s nie. Die Haiïtiese Instituut vir Reg en Demokrasie het verwys na onafhanklike studies wat voorstel dat die Nepalese VN vredesmagte onwetend die siekte Haïti toe gebring het. Danielle Lantagne, ‘n VN deskundige op die siekte, het verklaar dat die uitbraak moontlik deur die vredesmagte veroorsaak is.
mt: UN peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are blamed for the spread of the disease that broke out near the troops' camp. According to the lawsuit, debris from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to flow into one of Haiti's largest rivers, the Artibonite River, tributaries. Before the arrival of the troops, Haiti had not experienced problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Law and Democracy referred to independent studies that suggest that the Nepalese UN peacekeepers unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, declared that the outbreak may have been caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Die Ierse regering het die dringendheid van parlementêre regulasies benadruk om die situasie reg te stel. “Dit is tans belangrik vanaf beide ‘n openbare gesondheid en kriminele geregtigheids perspektief dat die wetgewing so gou as moontlik uitgevoer word,” het ‘n regerings-woordvoerder gesê. Die Minister van Gesondheid het kommer uitgespreek oor beide die welvaart van individue wat munt slaan uit die tydelike wettiging van die middele wat betrokke is, en dwelmmiddel-verwante oortredinge wat aangegee is sedert die tans-ongrondwetlike veranderinge van krag gekom het.
mt: The Irish government has stressed the urgency of parliamentary regulations to rectify the situation. “It is currently important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible,” a government spokesman said. The Minister of Health expressed concern over both the welfare of individuals profiting from the temporary legalization of the substances involved, and drug-related offenses that have been reported since the currently ungrounded changes of force have come into effect.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia, ‘n woordvoerder van die Los Angeles Polisie Afdeling, het gesê dat die vermoede manlike oortreder ondersoek word vir oortreding eerder as vandalisme. Die teken was nie fisies beskadig nie; die verandering was gemaak deur swart seile versier met die vredesteken en ‘n hart om die “O” te verander in kleinletter “e”.
mt: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for a violation rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the change was made by black ropes adorned with the peace sign and a heart around the “O” to change it to lowercase “e”.
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno is 'n alombekende maar kontroversiële Engelse tutor wat onder Moderne Opvoeding en King's Glory onderrig het, en aanspraak daarop maak dat hy 9 000 studente op die hoogtepunt van sy loopbaan gehad het. In sy notas het hy woorde gebruik wat sommige ouers as grof beskou het, en dit is berig dat hy vloekwoorde in klas gebruik het. Moderne Opvoeding het hom beskuldig dat hy groot advertensies op busse gedruk het sonder toestemming en deur te jok en te sê hy was die hoof Engelse tutor. Hy was ook voorheen van kopieregskending beskuldig, maar is nie vervolg nie. ‘n Vorige student het gesê dat hy ‘slang in klas gebruik het, klasse in afspraak-vaardighede in notas aangebied het, en was net soos die studente-vriend.’
mt: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught at Modern Education and King's Glory, and claims to have had 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words that some parents considered vulgar, and it was reported that he cursed in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large ads on buses without permission and by fraud and saying he was the main English tutor. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but was not prosecuted. A former student said he "used snakes in class, offered classes in appointment skills in notes, and was just like the student-friend."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: ‘n Voormalige Filippynse polisieman het Hongkong-toeriste gyselaar gehou deur hulle bus te kaap in Manila, die hoofstad van die Filippyne. Rolando Mendoza het sy M16 geweer op die toeriste afgevuur. Verskeie gyselaars is gered en ten minste ses is tot dusver aangemeld as oorlede. Ses gyselaars, insluitend kidners en bejaardes, is vroeg vrygelaat, asook Filipino fotograwe. Die fotograwe het later die plek van 'n bejaarde vrou geneem aangesien sy die badkamer moes gebruik. Mendoza is doodgeskiet.
mt: A former Filipino policeman held Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued and at least six are reported dead so far. Six hostages, including children and elderly, were early released, as well as Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an elderly woman because she had to use the bathroom. Mendoza was shot dead.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazilië is die grootste Rooms-Katolieke land op aarde, en die Rooms-Katolieke Kerk het konstant die wettiging van huwelike van dieselfde geslag teen gestaan. Die Nasionale Kongres van Brasilië het die wettiging vir 10 jaar gedebatteer, en sulke siviele huwelike is huidiglik slegs wettig in Rio Grande do Sul. Die oorspronklike wetstoepassing is deur die voormalige goewerneur van São Paulo, Marta Suplicy, opgeteken. Die voorgestelde wetgewing, nadat dit aangepas is, is nou in die hande van Roberto Jefferson. Protesteerders hoop om ‘n petisie van 1.2 miljoen handtekeninge te versamel om aan die Nasionale Kongres in November voor te lê.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has constantly opposed the legalization of same-sex marriages. The National Congress of Brazil has debated the legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original legislation was recorded by the former governor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to gather a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Vyf minute na die vertoning, begin ‘n wind om te waai. Omtrent ‘n minuut later, bereik die wind 70km/h… en dan kom die reën, maar dit is so hard en groot dat dit jou vel tref soos ‘n naald, en toe val daar hael uit die lug, mense het paniekbevange geword, geskree en oor mekaar gehardloop. “Ek het my suster en haar vriend verloor, en op pad was daar twee gestremde mense in rolstoele, mense spring net om en het hulle gestoot, ” het Armand Versace gesê.
mt: 5 minutes after the show, a wind began to blow. About a minute later, the wind reached 70km/h… and then the rain came, but it was so hard and big that it hit your skin like a needle, and then hail came out of the sky, people became panic-stricken, screamed and ran over each other. “I lost my sister and her boyfriend, and on the way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumped over them and shoved them,” said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Voorspellers sê dat die storm, wat ongeveer 645 myl (1040 km) wes van die Kaap Verde eilande geleë is, sal waarskynlik ontbind word voordat dit enige land-areas bedreig. Fred het huidiglik winde van 105 myl per uur (165 km/h) en beweeg tans na die noordweste toe. Fred is die sterkste tropiese sikloon wat tot dusver so vêr suid en oos in die Atlantiese oseaan opgeteken is, sedert die aanvangs van satellietbeelde, en slegs die derde groot orkaan wat oos van 35 ͦW opgeteken is.
mt: Forecasters say the storm, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, will likely dissipate before it threatens any land areas. Fred has winds of 105 mph (165 km/h) and is moving toward the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic Ocean, since the beginning of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane east of 35 ͦW.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Voorspellers sê dat die storm, wat ongeveer 645 myl (1040 km) wes van die Kaap Verde eilande geleë is, sal waarskynlik ontbind word voordat dit enige land-areas bedreig. Fred het huidiglik winde van 105 myl per uur (165 km/h) en beweeg tans na die noordweste toe. Fred is die sterkste tropiese sikloon wat tot dusver so vêr suid en oos in die Atlantiese oseaan opgeteken is, sedert die aanvangs van satellietbeelde, en slegs die derde groot orkaan wat oos van 35 ͦW opgeteken is.
mt: Forecasters say the storm, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, will likely dissipate before it threatens any land areas. Fred has winds of 105 mph (165 km/h) and is moving toward the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic Ocean, since the beginning of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane east of 35 ͦW.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: Die 802.11n standaard opereer op beide die 2.4Ghz en die 5.0Ghz frekwensies. Dit laat dit agteruit versoenbaar wees met 802.11a, 802.11a en 802.11g, mits die basisstasie dubbele radio's het. Die snelhede van 802.11n is merkwaardig vinniger as enige van sy voorgangers, met ‘n teoretiese deurlating van 600Mbit/s
mt: 802.11n operates on both the 2.4GHz and the 5.0GHz frequencies. This allows it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11a and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are remarkably faster than any of its predecessors, with a theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Die Olimpiese goue medaljehouer, moes in die 100m en 200m vryslag, en in drie aflosse op die Statebondspele swem, maar weens sy klagtes, was sy fiksheid in twyfel gebring. Hy kon nie die medisyne gebruik wat hy nodig het om sy pyn te oorkom want dit is verban van die Spele.
mt: 2012 Olympic gold medalist, who won the 100m and 200m freestyle, and three relay events at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints, his fitness was brought into question. He could not use the medication he needed to overcome his pain because it was banned from the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Die United States Geological Survey se internasionale aarbewingkaart wys geen aardbewings in Ysland die vorige week nie. Die Yslandse Meteorologiese Kantoor het ook gerapporteer dat daar in die afgelope 48 uur geen aardbewingsaktiwiteit in die Hekla area was nie. Die aansienlike aardbewing aktiwiteit het ‘n fase verandering veroorsaak wat op 10 Maart plaasgevind het op die noordoostelike kant van die vulkaan se top kaldera. Donker wolke wat nie verwant was aan enige vulkaniese aktiwiteite nie is teen die basis van die berg gerapporteer. Die wolke bied aan die potensiaal vir verwarring oor of ‘n eintlike uitbarsting plaasgevind het.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's international earthquake map shows no earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported that there was no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity caused a phase change that occurred on March 10 on the northeastern side of the volcano's top caldera. Dark clouds that were not related to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds offer the potential for confusion over whether an actual eruption occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Die onbemande maan-pendeltuig Chadrayaan-1 het sy Maan Impak Ruimtetuig (MIP) uitgeskiet, wat teen 1.5 kilometer per sekonde (3 000 myl per uur) oor die oppervlak van die Maan geslinger is, en suksesvol naby die Maan se suidpool gebots-land het. Behalwe die dra van drie belangrike instrumente, het die maantuig ook die beeld van die nasionale vlag van India gedra, op alle kante geverf.
mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 has successfully deployed its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which was fired at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour) over the surface of the Moon and crashed-landed near the Moon's south pole. In addition to carrying three important instruments, the spacecraft also carried the image of the national flag of India, painted on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Die eerste gevalle van die siekte hierdie seisoen is gerapporteer in laat Julie. Die siekte word oorgedra deur varke, wat dan migreer na mense deur muskiete. Die uitbraak het die Indiese staat genoop om sulke maatstawwe in te stel soos die ontplooiing van varkvangers in ernstig geaffekteerde areas, wat duisende muskiet gordyne uitgedeel het en plaagdoders gespuit het. Verskeie medisynebotteltjies vol enkefalitis entstof is al beloof deur die goewerment, wat gesondheidsagentskappe sal help om vir volgende jaar voor te berei. Planne vir die aflewering van inentings aan die histories mees geaffekteerde areas is hierdie jaar vertraag as gevolg van ‘n verlies aan fondse en lae prioritisering in verband met ander siektes.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is spread by pigs, which then migrate to humans through mosquitoes. The outbreak prompted the Indian state to implement such measures as the deployment of pig catchers in severely affected areas, which distributed thousands of mosquito nets and sprayed pesticides. Several bottles of encephalitis vaccine have been promised by the government, which will help health agencies prepare for next year. Plans for the delivery of vaccinations to the historically most affected areas were delayed this year due to a loss of funds and low prioritization in relation to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Die voorgestelde wysiging het beide huise in 2011 reeds geslaag. ‘n Verandering is in hierdie wetgewende sessie gemaak toe die tweede sin verwyder is deur die Huis van Verteenwoordigers en toe in soortgelyke vorm deur die Senaat op Maandag goedgekeur is. Die mislukking van die tweede vonnis, wat beoog om burgers van dieselfde geslag in die huwelik te bevestig, te verbied, kan moontlik in die toekoms die deur oopmaak vir burgers van die selfde geslag. Ingevolge die proses, sal HJR-3 weer hersien word teen die volgende elektiewe wetgewer in of 2015 of 2016 om in die proses te bly.
mt: The proposed amendment had already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made in this legislative session when the second clause was removed by the House of Representatives and then approved in similar form by the Senate on Monday. The failure of the second vote, which sought to affirm the prohibition of marriage between members of the same sex, may possibly open the door in the future for members of the same sex. In accordance with the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next legislative body in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: “Panama Papers” is ‘n oorkoepelende term vir ongeveer tien miljoen dokument van die Panamese regsfirma, Mossack Fonseca, wat aan die pers uitgelek het in die lente van 2016. Die dokumente het gewys dat veertien banke ryk kliënte gehelp het om biljoene VS dollar van rykdom weg te steek om belasting en ander regulasies te vermy. Die Britse koerant, The Guardian, het aangedui dat die Deutsche Bank rofweg ‘n derde van die 1200 dop maatskappye gebruik om dit te bereik. Daar was wêreldwyd proteste, verskeie kriminele vervolgings, en die leiers van die regerings van Ysland en Pakistan het beide bedank.
mt: “Panama Papers” is an overarching term for about ten million documents from the Panamanian law firm, Mossack Fonseca, which leaked to the press in the spring of 2016. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of U.S. dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. The British newspaper, The Guardian, reported that the Deutsche Bank roughly used a third of the 1200 shell companies to achieve this. There were worldwide protests, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Lugongelukke is algemeen in Iran, wat ‘n verouderende lugmag het wat swak in stand gehou word vir beide siviele en militêre operasies. Internasionale sanksies het beteken dat nuwe lugvaartuie nie aangekoop kan word nie. Vroeër die week het 'n polisiehelikopterbotsing drie mense se gedood en drie meer gewond gelaat. Laas maand het Iran sy ergste lug ramp in jare beleef toe ‘n lugredery wat oppad was Armenië toe, neergestort het en die 168 insittendes doodgemaak het. Daardie selfde maand is daar ‘n ander vliegtuig wat die aanloopbaan oorskry het by Mashhad en ‘n muur getref het, en sewentien mense gedood het.
mt: Aircraft accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging air force that is poorly maintained for both civilian and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week a police helicopter crash killed three people and injured three more. Last month Iran suffered its worst air disaster in years when a domestic airliner en route to Armenia crashed and killed all 168 aboard. That same month another aircraft overshot a runway at Mashhad and hit a wall, killing seventeen people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Die Irak Studie Groep het vandag, 12:00 GMT, hul verslag voorgelê. Dit waarsku dat niemand kan waarborg dat enige koers van aksie in Irak op hierdie punt sektariese oorlogvoering, groeiende geweld of 'n verskuiwing na chaos kan stop nie. Die Verslag open met ‘n pleidooi vir ope debat en die formasie van ‘n konsensus in die Verenigde State oor die beleid teenoor die Midde-Ooste. Die verslag is hoogs krities oor byna elke aspek van die huidige besluit van die Uitvoerende hoof teenoor Irak en dit verg ‘n onmiddelike verandering van rigting. Die eerste van hul 78 aanbevelings is dat ‘n nuwe diplomatieke inisiatief geneem behoort te word voor die einde van die jaar om Irak se grense teen vyandige intervensies te versterk, en om diplomatieke verhoudings te herbevestig met hul bure.
mt: 12:00 GMT, the Iraq Study Group presented its report today. It warns that no one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq will stop sectarian violence, growing violence or a shift to chaos. The report opens with a plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about policy toward the Middle East. The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the current decision of the Executive Branch toward Iraq and it calls for an immediate change of direction. The first of their 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative be taken before the end of the year to strengthen Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to reestablish diplomatic relations with their neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Volgens Ansa was ""die polisie besorg oor 'n paar topvlakmoorde wat hulle vrees 'n algehele opvolgingsoorlog tot gevolg sou kon hê. Die Polisie het gesê dat Lo Picollo die opperhand gehad het omdat hy Provenzano se regterhand in Palermo was, en dat hy meer ondervindervinding het, wat hom die respek van die ouer generasie van base gewen aangesien hulle Provenzano se polis om so laag as moontlik te hou, onderwyl hulle hul kragnetwerk versterk het. Daardie base is getem deur Provenzano toe hy ‘n einde gemaak het aan die Riina-aangedrewe oorlog teen die staat wat die lewens van Mafia kruisvegters Giovanni Falcone en Paolo Borsellino in 1992 geeïs het.”"
mt: "According to Ansa, the police were concerned about a few top-level murders they feared could lead to an all-out gang war. The police said that Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was Provenzano's right hand in Palermo, and that he had more experience, which won him the respect of the older generation of bases, as they kept Provenzano's police as low as possible while they strengthened their network. That base was hit by Provenzano when he ended the Riina-led war against the state that killed Mafia cross-killers Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: "Volgens Ansa was ""die polisie besorg oor 'n paar topvlakmoorde wat hulle vrees 'n algehele opvolgingsoorlog tot gevolg sou kon hê. Die Polisie het gesê dat Lo Picollo die opperhand gehad het omdat hy Provenzano se regterhand in Palermo was, en dat hy meer ondervindervinding het, wat hom die respek van die ouer generasie van base gewen aangesien hulle Provenzano se polis om so laag as moontlik te hou, onderwyl hulle hul kragnetwerk versterk het. Daardie base is getem deur Provenzano toe hy ‘n einde gemaak het aan die Riina-aangedrewe oorlog teen die staat wat die lewens van Mafia kruisvegters Giovanni Falcone en Paolo Borsellino in 1992 geeïs het.”"
mt: "According to Ansa, the police were concerned about a few top-level murders they feared could lead to an all-out gang war. The police said that Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he was Provenzano's right hand in Palermo, and that he had more experience, which won him the respect of the older generation of bases, as they kept Provenzano's police as low as possible while they strengthened their network. That base was hit by Provenzano when he ended the Riina-led war against the state that killed Mafia cross-killers Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, wat die wenner was van twee Olimpiese goue medaljes, het op die ouderdom van 54 gesterf. Die oorsaak van die dood was as intrahepatiese galkanaalkanker aangekondig. Hy is Dinsdag in Osaka oorlede. As ‘n voormalige Olimpiese en Wereld kampioen, was Saito die voorsitter van die All Japan Judo Federasie opleidings kommitee ten tye van sy dood.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, who was the winner of two Olympic gold medals, died. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic gallbladder cancer. He died on Tuesday in Osaka. As a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Tydens sy reis het Iwasaki baie probleme ondervind. Hy is deur seerowers beroof, in Tibet deur 'n hondsdol hond aangeval, die huwelik in Nepal vrygespring en is in Indië gearresteer.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki encountered many problems. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, divorced in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fischella het beheer van sy motor verloor en het die resie baie gou na die begin verloor. Sy spanmaat Fernando Alonso het vir die meeste van die resies gelei, maar het dit reg na sy russtop beïndig, moontlik as gevolg van ‘n sleg vasgedraaide regter voorwiel. Michael Schumacher het sy wedren kort ná Alonso beëindig weens die veringskade van die talle 'gevegte' tydens die wedloop.
mt: Giancarlo Fischella lost control of his car and lost the lead very quickly at the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but ended it just before his pit stop, possibly due to a badly worn right front tire. Michael Schumacher ended his race shortly after Alonso due to the suspension damage from the numerous "battles" during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: In die laaste 3 maande is meer as 80 gearresteerdes vrygelaat van die Sentrale Aanhoudingsfasiliteit sonder dat hulle formeel aangekla is. In April hierdie jaar is ‘n tydelike inderdik deur Regter Glynn teen die fasiliteit uitgereik om die vrylating van diegene wat meer as 24 uur na hulle inname aangehou word en nog nie ‘n verhoor deur die hofbeampte ontvang het nie af te dwing. Die kommissaris stel ‘n borgtog vas, en indien dit toegeken word, word dit geformaliseer en die klagtes in die lêer opgeteken word deur die arrestasiebeampte. Die klagte word dan op die staat se rekenaarsisteem ingesleutel waar die saak nagespoor word. Die verhoor merk ook die datum vir die verdagte se reg tot ‘n spoedige verhoor.
mt: 80+ detainees have been released from the Central Detention Facility in the last 3 months without being formally charged. In April this year a temporary injunction was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to force the release of those who have been held for more than 24 hours after their arrest and have not yet received a hearing by the court official. The commissioner sets bail, and if it is granted, it is formalized and the charges are recorded in the file by the arresting officer. The charges are then keyed into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the defendant's right to a speedy trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin het ook gesê dat hulle besluit het om die afloop te kanselleer om Afgane se geld te spaar en te beskerm teen die sekuriteitsrisiko van nog 'n verkiesing. Diplomate sê dat hulle genoeg dubbelsinnigheid gevind het in die Afghan konstitusie om die afloop as onnodig te bepaal. Hierdie weerspreek verslae van vroeër wat gesê het dat die kansellering van die afloop teen die konstitusie sou wees.
mt: Lodin also said that they decided to cancel the runoff to save and protect Afghanis' money and to protect against the security risk of another election. Diplomats say that they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to deem the runoff unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports that said the cancellation of the runoff would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Sedert Pakistani onafhanklikheid van Britse oorheersing in 1947, het die Pakistani President “Politiese Agente” aangestel om die FATA te regeer, wat byna-totale outonome beheer oor die areas uitvoer. Hierdie agente is verantwoordelik daarvoor om aan die regering en regsdienste te voorsien onder Artikel 247 van die Pakistani Grondwet.
mt: Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed “Political Agents” to govern the FATA, which has almost-total autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing the government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Die fliek, waarin Ryan Gosling en Emma Stone voorkom, het ‘n nominasie ontvang in al die grootste kategorië. Gosling en Stone het nominasies vir, onderskeidelik, Beste Akteur en Beste Aktrise ontvang. Die ander nominasies sluit Beste Film, Direkteur, Filmkuns, Kostuum-ontwerp, Film Redigering, Oorspronklike Telling, Produksie Ontwerp, Klank Redigering, Klank Vermenging en Oorspronklike Draaiboek. Twee liedere van die film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) en City of Stars, het nominasies gekry vir die beste oorspronklike lied. Lionsgate ateljee het 26 nominasies ontvang - meer as enige ander ateljee.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, has received a nomination in all the major categories. Gosling and Stone have received nominations for, respectively, Best Actor and Best Actress. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Film Editing, Original Screenplay, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Score. Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, have received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio has received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK het ook gerapporteer dat die Kashiwazaki Kariwa kernkragsentrale in die Niigata prefektuur normaal werksaam was. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. het geen effekte van die aardbewing geraporteer nie en die Nommer 1 en 2 reaktors by hul Shika kernkragsentrale was afgeskakel. Daar word berig dat sowat 9400 huise in die omgewing sonder water is en sowat 100 sonder elektrisiteit. Sommige paaie is beskadig, spoorweg dienste is onderbreek in die geaffekteerde areas, en die Noto Lughawe in Ishakawa prefektuur bly gesluit.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in the Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and the No. 1 and 2 reactors at their Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that about 9,400 homes in the area are without water and about 100 are without electricity. Some roads are damaged, rail services are disrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Die dokument sal, volgens die informant, verwys na die grensdispuut, wat Palestina wil hê gebaseer moet wees op die grense voor die 1967 Middeoosterse Oorlog. Ander onderwerpe wat volgens berigte gedek word, sluit die toekomstige toestand van Jerusalem wat heilig is aan beide nasies en die Jordaanvallei-kwessie. Israel eis 'n aanhoudende militêre teenwoordigheid in die vallei vir tien jaar sodra 'n ooreenkoms onderteken is, terwyl die PA instem om sodanige teenwoordigheid slegs vir vyf jaar te laat.
mt: The document will, according to the source, refer to the border dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Middle Eastern War. Other issues that are reported to be covered include the future status of Jerusalem which is holy to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands a continued military presence in the valley for ten years after a deal is signed, while the PA agrees to such a presence only for five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Gebore in Hong Kong, Ma het by New York Universiteit en Harvard Regsskool studeer en het op ‘n tyd ‘n permanente groenkaart vir Amerika gehad”. Hsieh het gedurende die verkiesing geïmpliseer dat Ma uit die land in ‘n tyd van mag vlug. Hsieh het ook geredeneer dat die fotogeniese Ma meer styl as inhoud was. Ten spyte van beskuldigings het Ma behendig gewen op ‘n platform wat nader bande met die Sjinese vasteland bevorder.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma has studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and had a permanent green card for the United States at one time.” Hsieh has implied during the campaign that Ma would flee the country at a time of crisis. Hsieh has also reasoned that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite accusations, Ma has deftly won on a platform that is closer to mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Nadat dit duidelik geword het dat baie families regshulp gesoek het om die uitsettings teen te staan, was ‘n vergadering gehou op 20 Maart by die East Bay Community Law Center vir die slagoffers van die behuisingsverneukspul. Toe die huurders begin deel het wat met hulle gebeur het, het meeste van die betrokke families skielik besef dat Carolyn Wilson van die OHA hul sekuriteitsdeposito’s gesteel het, en toe op vlug geslaan het. Huurders van Lockwood Gardens glo dat daar nog 40 of meer families is wat uitsetting in die gesig staar, sedert hulle uitgevind het dat die OHA-polisie ook ander publieke behuisingseiendomme in Oakland ondersoek wat ook dalk in die behuisingsskandaal vasgevang is.
mt: After it became clear that many families had sought legal help to stand against the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing demolition spree. When the tenants began to share what had happened to them, most of the affected families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and then fled on the run. Tenants of Lockwood Gardens believe that there are still 40 or more families facing eviction since they discovered that the OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may also be caught up in the housing scandal.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Na die resies, bly Keselowski die jaerskampioenskap-leier’ met 2250 punte. Sewe punte agter, is Johnson tweede met 2,243. In derde is Hamlin twintig punte agter, maar vyf voor Bowyer. Kahne en Treux, Jr. is vyfde en sesde, onderskeidelik met 2,220 en 2,207 punte. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth en Harvick voltooi die top tien posisies vir die Drivers’ Championship met vier wedrenne oor in die seisoen.
mt: After the race, Keselowski remains the season points leader with 2250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third is Hamlin twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Treux, Jr. are fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten positions for the Drivers’ Championship with four races left in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Na die resies, bly Keselowski die jaerskampioenskap-leier’ met 2250 punte. Sewe punte agter, is Johnson tweede met 2,243. In derde is Hamlin twintig punte agter, maar vyf voor Bowyer. Kahne en Treux, Jr. is vyfde en sesde, onderskeidelik met 2,220 en 2,207 punte. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth en Harvick voltooi die top tien posisies vir die Drivers’ Championship met vier wedrenne oor in die seisoen.
mt: After the race, Keselowski remains the season points leader with 2250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third is Hamlin twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Treux, Jr. are fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick complete the top ten positions for the Drivers’ Championship with four races left in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Dit is glo die vyfde keer in die geskiedenis dat mense ‘n observasie gemaak het wat uitdraai dat dit chemies bevestigde Marsagtige materiaal was wat na die Aarde geval het. Uit die ongeveer 24 000 bekende meteoriete wat al op die Aarde geval het, is dit bevestig dat slegs 34 van Mars afkomstig was. Vyftien van hierdie rotse is toegeskryf aan die meteoriet reën verlede Julie. Sommige van die klippe wat baie skaars op aarde is, word verkoop van VS$11 000 tot $22 500 per ons, wat om en by tien keer meer as die waarde van goud is.
mt: It is allegedly the fifth time in history that people have made an observation that turned out to be chemically confirmed Martian-like material that fell to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth, it is confirmed that only 34 were of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite rain last July. Some of the rocks that are very rare on Earth are sold for US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the value of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.
