src: Schumacher wat in 2006 afgetree het nada thy die Formula 1 kampioenskap sewe keer gewen het, was veronderstel om die beseerde Felipe Massa te vervang. Die Braziliaan het ernstige kopbeserings gehad na ‘n botsing tydens die 2009 Hongaarse Grand Prix. Massa gaan uit wees vir ten minste die res van die 2009 seisoen.
mt: 2006 retiree Schumacher who won the Formula 1 championship seven times was supposed to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian had serious head injuries after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Tot nou toe kon AOL die IM-mark skuif en ontwikkel teen sy eie pas, vanweë die wydverspreide gebruik binne die Verenigde State. Met hierdie relings in plek, mag hierdie vryheid dalk tot 'n einde kom. Die hoeveelheid gesamentlike Yahoo! en Microsoft dienste gebruikers sal kan meeding met die hoeveelheid AOL kliente.
mt: Until now, AOL could shift and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to the widespread use within the United States. With these restrictions in place, this freedom may come to an end. The amount of combined Yahoo! and Microsoft services users may be able to compete with the amount of AOL clients.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: n Motorbom wat gisteroggend by die polisiehoofkwartiere in Gaziantep, Turkye, ontplof is het twee polisieoffisiere gedood en meer as twintig ander mense beseer. Die goewerneur se kantoor het aangevoer dat negentien van die beseerdes polisieoffisiere was. Die Polisie sê dat hulle ‘n beweerde Daesh (ISIL) militant verdink as verantwoordelik vir die aanval.
mt: A car bomb that exploded this morning at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killed two police officers and injured more than twenty others. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. The police say they suspect a purported Daesh (ISIL) militant of being responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Voormalige Massachusettse burgemeester Mitt Romney het die Florida Republikeinse Party se presidensiële verkiesing op Dinsdag gewen met oor die 46 persent van die stemme. Voormalige VS Hoofspreker Newt Gingrich het tweede gekom met 32 persent. As ‘n wenner-van-alles staat, het Florida al vyftig van sy afgevaardiges aan Romney toegeken, wat hom vorentoe as die voorloper van die Republikeinse Party gestoot het.
mt: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party's presidential primary on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the votes. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-take-all state, Florida has already awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, propelling him ahead as the front-runner of the Republican Party.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Voormalige Spreker van die Huis Newt Gingrich, Texas goewerneur Rick Perry, en Kongresvrou Michele Bachmann het onderskeidelik in vierde, vyfde, en sesde plek klaar gemaak. Na die resultate ingekom het, prys Gingrich Santorum, maar het hy slegs skertsende woorde vir Romney gehad, om wie se onthalwe negatiewe advertensies in Iowa teen Gingrich geloods is. Perry het verklaar dat hy sou “terugkeer na Teksas om die gevolge van vanaand se koukus te evalueer, en te bepaal of daar ‘n pad vorentoe vir my is in hierdie resies”, maar later het hy gesê dat hy in die resies sou bly en in op 21 Januarie aan die primêre verkiesing in South Carolina sou deelneem. Bachmann, wat die Ames Straw Poll in Augustus gewen het, het besluit om haar veldtog te beeïndig.
mt: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann had finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich praised Santorum, but had only joking words for Romney, against whom negative ads in Iowa had been run against Gingrich. Perry declared that he would “return to Texas to evaluate the aftermath of tonight’s caucus, and determine if there is a path forward for me in this race”, but later said that he would stay in the race and participate in the primary in South Carolina on January 21. Bachmann, who had won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Die stasie se webblad beskryf die optrede as “ou skool radio teater met ‘n nuwe en verregaande geeky draai!” In die vroeë dae daarvan is die vertoning hoofsaaklik alleenlik by die lang-lopende internet radio stasie plek, TogiNet radio, 'n tuiste wat op praatradio fokus, te vinde. Laat in 2015 het TogiNet AstroNet Radio as ‘n filiale stasie gestig. Die opvoering het oorspronklik amateur stem akteurs, plaaslik aan Oos Texas aangebied.
mt: The station's website describes the performance as "old school radio theater with a new and very geeky twist!" In the early days of its existence, the production was primarily found only at the long-running internet radio station home, TogiNet Radio, a home that focuses on talk radio, to be found. Late in 2015, TogiNet AstroNet Radio was established as a subsidiary station. The performance originally amateur voice actors, locally offered at East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Die Mumbai aanvallers het per boot op 26 November 2008 aangeland, en met hul saam granate en outomatiese wapens gebring waarmee hulle velerlei teikens getref het, insluitend die oorvol Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus spoorwegstasie en die beroemde Taj Mahal Hotel. Dawid Headly se verkenning en insameling van informasie het gehelp met die in staat stelling van ‘n krygsbeweging deur 10 gewapende mans van die Pakistani militante groep Laskhar-e-Taiba Die aanval het hewige spanning op die verhouding tussen Indië en Pakistan geplaas.
mt: 26 November 2008, the Mumbai attackers landed by boat, bringing with them grenades and automatic weapons with which they hit various targets, including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's reconnaissance and collection of information helped in the establishment of a military movement by 10 armed men of the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack placed heavy strain on the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadal se kop-teen-kop rekord teen die Kanadees is 7-2. Hy het onlangs teen Raonic in die Brisbane Ope verloor. Nadal het 88% netpunte in die wedstryd gekry en 76 punte in die eerste afslaan verdien. Na die wedstryd, het die Koning van Klei gesê, “Ek is net opgewonde om terug te wees in die finale rondte van die belangrikste gebeure. Ek is hier om te probeer wen.”
mt: Nadal’s head-to-head record against the Canadian is 7-2. He recently lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal had 88% net points in the match and earned 76 points in the first serve. After the match, the King of Clay said, “I’m just happy to be back in the final round of the main events. I’m here to try to win.”
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Verlede week, het Naked News aangekondig dat hulle die internasionale tale mandaat vir nuusberiggewing dramaties gaan verhoog, met drie nuwe uitsendings. Die wêreldorganisasie gee reeds verslag in Engels en Japannees, en hulle stel Spaanse, Italiaanse, en Koreaanse programme bekend vir televisie-, internet- en mobiele toestelle.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced that they will be increasing the international language mandate for news reporting dramatically, with three new broadcasts. The world organization already reports in English and Japanese, and they are announcing Spanish, Italian, and Korean programs for television, internet, and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Na Woensdag se gebeurtenis het Carpanedo in twee individuele resies by die Kampioenskappe deel geneem. Haar eeste was die Slalom, waar sy die Het Nie Voltooi prys gekry het in haar eerste lopie. 36 van die 116 deelnemers het dieselfde resultaat in daardie resies gekry. Haar ander resies, die Groot Slalom, het haar klaargesien in tiende plek in die sittende vroue groep met ‘n gekombineerde hardlooptyd van 4:41.30, 2:11:60 minute stadiger as die eerste plek atleet, Oostenrykse Claudia Loesch en 1:09:02 minute stadiger as die negende plek atleet, Gyöngyi Dani van Hongarye. Vier skiërs in die vroue groep het misluk om hul lopies te voltooi, en 45 van die 117 skiërs in die Giant Slalom het misluk om in die resie te rangskik.
mt: After Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she received the Did Not Finish award in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth place in the seated women's group with a combined downhill time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than the first place athlete, Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place athlete, Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's group failed to complete their runs, and 45 of the 117 skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Op Woensdag het die Verenigde State se Nasionale Basketbalk Vereniging (NBA) hul professionele basketbalseisoen opgeskort vanweë kommer rakend COVID-19. Die NBA se besluit het gevolg nadat ‘n Utah Jazz speler positief getoets het vir die COVID-19 virus.
mt: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) postponed its professional basketball season due to concerns about COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Speler van die dag is Alex Ovechkin van die Washington-hoofstede. Hy het 2 doele en 2 assistente in Washington se 5-3 oorwining teen die Atlanta Thrashers gehad. Ovechkin se eerste bystand van die nag was met die spel-wennede doel deur nuweling Nicklas Backstrom. sy tweede doel van die aand was sy 60ste van die seisoen, wat hom die eerste speler gemaak het om 60 of meer doele in ‘n seisoen sedert 1995-96 te maak, toe Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux elkeen daardie mylpaal behaal het.
mt: Player of the day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom. His second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. src: Die Northern Rock bank is in 2008 genasionaliseer, kort na die onthulling dat die maatskappy noodondersteuning van die VK Goewerment ontvang het. Northern Rock het ondersteuning benodig vanweë hul blootstelling aan die sub prima verband krisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson se Virgin Group se bod op die bank is van die hand gewys voor die nasionalisering van die bank. In 2010, terwyl dit genasionaliseer is, het die huidige hoogstraat bank, Northern Rock (Edms.) Bpk. afgesplinter van die ‘slegte bank’, Northern Rock (Batebestuur). Virgin het net die “goeie bank” van Northern Rock gekoop, en nie die batebestuur maatskappy nie.
mt: 2008, the Northern Rock bank was nationalized, shortly after the announcement that the company needed support from the UK Government. Northern Rock needed support due to its exposure to the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group bid for the bank was rejected before the nationalization of the bank. In 2010, while it was nationalized, the current high street bank, Northern Rock (Edms.) Ltd. split off from the "bad bank", Northern Rock (Administration). Virgin only bought the "good bank" of Northern Rock, and not the administration company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Mnr. Rudd se besluit om die Kyoto klimaatsooreenkoms te onderteken isoleer die Verenigde State, wat nou die enigste ontwikkelde nasie sal wees om nie die ooreenkoms te bekragtig nie. Australië se vorige konserwatiewe regering het geweier om Koyoto te bekragtig deur te sê dat dit die ekonomie sal beskadig met die hewige afhanklikheid van kool uitvoere, terwyl lande soos Indië en China nie gebind is deur emissie teikens nie.
mt: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate treaty isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the treaty. Australia's previous conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto by saying it would damage the economy with the heavy dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India and China are not bound by emission targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Veldwagters het fyn toesig gehou oor skuts in die aanvullende plaagbeheer proef, omdat die proef gemonitor was en effektiwiteit geëvaluer. In samewerking met die NPWS en die Sport Skieters Assosiasie van Australië (NSW) Inc, is gekwalifiseerde vrywilligers onder die Sport Skieter Assosiasie se jagprogram gewerf. Volgens Mick O’Flynn, die Waarnemende Direkteur van Parkbewaring en Erfenis van die NPWS, het die vier gekose skutte vir die eerste skiet-operasie, breedvoerige veiligheid en opleidings-instruksies ontvang.
mt: Field officers closely monitored shooters in the supplementary pest control trial, as the trial was monitored and effectiveness evaluated. In collaboration with the NPWS and the NSW Sporting Shooters Association Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Sporting Shooters Association’s hunting program. According to Mick O’Flynn, the Acting Director of Park Conservation and Heritage of the NPWS, the four selected shooters for the first shooting operation, comprehensive safety and training instructions.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "“Gegrond of hierdie fossiel, beteken dit die skeuring was veel vroeër as wat verwag is deur die molekulêre bewyse. Dit beteken dat alles teruggesit moet word,"" het die navorser by die Rift Vallei Navorsingsdiens in Ethiopië, en mede-outeur van die studie, Berhane Asfaw, gesê."
mt: ““Grounded or this fossil, it means the rifting was much earlier than what is expected by the molecular evidence. It means everything has to be pushed back,”” said the researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia, and co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw, said."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: By Donderdag se hoof sprekersgeleentheid van die Tokyo Speletjiesvertoning , het die Nintendo president Satoru Iwata die beheertoestel-ontwerp vir die maatskappy se nuwe Nintendo Revolusie-konsole onthul. Dit stel ‘n televisie afstandbeheer voor, die beheerder gebruik twee sensors wat naby die gebruiker se televisie geplaas word om die posisie daarvan in drie-dimensionele ruimte te trianguleer. Hierdie sal spelers help om aksies en bewegings in video speletjies te beheer deur die toestel deur die lug te beweeg.
mt: At Thursday's keynote address at the Tokyo Games Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. It presents a television remote control, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will help players control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Vroeër het die Chinese nuusagentskap, Xinhua, gerapporteer dat daar ‘n vliegtuig was wat gekaap sou word. Latere verslae het toe gemeld dat die vliegtuig ‘n bom-dreigement ontvang het en terug na Afghanistan herlei is, en in Kandahar gaan land het. Die vroeë verslae sê dat die vliegtuig herlei is na Afghanistan nadat dit ‘n noodlanding in Ürümqi geweier is.
mt: Earlier, the Chinese news agency, Xinhua, reported that there was a plane that was being hijacked. Later reports then said that the plane received a bomb threat and was rerouted back to Afghanistan, and landed in Kandahar. The early reports say that the plane was rerouted to Afghanistan after it refused a forced landing in Ürümqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Sara Danius, die Permanente Sekretaris van die Nobel Kommitee vir Literatuur by die Switserse Akedemie, het Maandag ‘n publieke aankondiging gemaak gedurende ‘n radio program op Sveriges Radio in Swede, dat die kommitee nie in staat was om Bob Dylan direk te bereik nie, in verband met die wen van die 2016 Nobel Prys vir Literatuur, en het opgegee in hul pogings om hom te bereik. Danius het gesê: “Op die oomblik doen ons niks. Ek het geskakel en eposse gestuur na sy naaste medewerkers en het baie vriendelike antwoorde ontvang. Vir nou is dit sekerlik genoeg.”
mt: Sara Danius, the Permanent Secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, made a public announcement on Monday during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden, that the committee was unable to directly reach Bob Dylan, in connection with the win of the 2016 Nobel Prize for Literature, and gave up on their efforts to reach him. Danius said: “For now, we’re doing nothing. I’ve called and emailed his closest associates and have received very friendly responses. For now, it’s probably enough.”
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: U.S. President George W. Bush het die aankondiging verwelkom. Bush se woordvoerder Gordon Johndroe het Noord Korea se belofte as “‘n groot stap in die rigting van ‘n verifieërbare kernontwapening van die Koreaanse skiereiland.” bestempel.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe described North Korea's pledge as "a big step in the direction of verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: In 1956 het Słania na Swede getrek waar hy drie jaar later vir die Sweedse Poskantoor begin werk het en hulle hoof grafeerder geword het. Hy het meer as 1,000 seëls vir Swede en 28 ander lande produseer. Sy werk is van sulke hoogstaande gehalte en detail dat hy een van die min “huishoudelike name” onder filateliste. Sommige spesialiseer slegs in die versameling van sy werk. Sy 1000ste seël was die manjifieke “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” deur David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000 en is gelys in die Guinness Book of World Records. Hy was ook daarmee bemoeid om banknote vir vele lande te graveer, onlangse voorbeelde van sy werk sluit premiersportrette in op die voorkant van die Kanadese $5 en $100 note.
mt: 1956, Słania moved to Sweden where he began working for the Swedish Post Office in 1959 and became their chief engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such high quality and detail that he is one of the few “household names” among philatelists. Some specialize only in the collection of his work. His 1000th stamp was the magnificent “Great Deeds by Swedish Kings” by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000 and is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also involved in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work include prime minister portraits on the front of the Canadian $5 and $100 notes.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 Myl van die Trans-Alaska Pyplynsisteem is toegemaak na aanleiding van 'n vermorsing van duisende vate ru-olie suid van Fairbanks, Alaska. 'n Kragonderbrekeing na 'n roetine-brandbeheersisteemtoets het veroorsaak dat die ontlaskleppe oopgaan, en ru-olie oorgeloop het naby die Fort Greenly-pompstasie 9. Die ontlaskleppe se opening het 'n druk-ontlading vir die sisteem toegelaat en olie het oor 'n kussing na 'n tenk wat 55 000 vate kan hou, gevloei (2.3 miljoen gellings). Van Woensdag middag af, het die drom luggate nog steeds gelek waarskynlik as gevolg van termiese uitsetting binne die drom. ‘n Ander sekondêre opvangsgebied onder die tanks kan tot 104,500 vate hou wat nog nie tot kapasiteit gevul is nie.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was shut down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power outage following a routine pressure-relief system test caused the valves to open, and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The opening of the valves allowed a pressure relief for the system and oil flowed over a cushion into a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). From Wednesday afternoon, the pool was still leaking likely due to thermal settling within the pool. Another secondary containment area under the tanks can hold up to 104,500 barrels which has not yet reached capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Die V.S. Liggaam van Ingenieurs het beraam dat 6 duim reën die reeds beskadigde oewerwalle kon breek. Die Negende Wyk het vloede so hoog soos 20 voet ervaar tydens Orkaan Katrina, en is huidiglik in heuphoogte water aangesien die naaste vloedwal omgegooi is. Water spoel oor die oewerwal in ‘n seksie 100 voet breed.
mt: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rain could have broken the already damaged levees. The Ninth Ward experienced floods as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, and is currently in chest-high water as the nearest flood wall has been breached. Water is spilling over the levee in a 100-foot section.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton het bevestig die pasiënt is opgeneem in ‘n stabile kondise in Howard University Hospital. Die pasient was ‘n Nigerië waar sommige gevalle van die Ebola virus voorgekom’ het. Die hospitaal het protokol gevolg vir infeksiebeheer, insluitend om die pasiënt van ander te skei om moontlike aansteek van ander te vermy.
mt: Hamilton confirmed the patient was admitted in a stable condition to Howard University Hospital. The patient was a Nigerian where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent possible transmission to others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Komete mag moontlik ’n bron van water aflewering aan die aarde wees saam met organiese materie wat proteine kan vorm en lewe ondersteun. Wetenskaplikes hoop om te verstaan ​​hoe planete ontstaan, veral hoe die aarde gevorm is, aangesien komete lank gelede met die aarde gebots het.
mt: Comets may be a source of water delivery to the Earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth was formed, as comets have collided with the Earth long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Terwyl owerhede onseker is oor die geldigheid van die bedreiging, het die Maryland Transportation Authority die sluiting gemaak op die aandrang van die FBI. Vullistrokke was gebruik om ondergrondse treinstasie ingange te blokkeer en die bystand van 80 polisie lede was beskikbaar om motoriste na ompaaie te verwys. Daar waas geen verkeers vertragings op die ringweg, die stad se alternatiewe roete, aangemeld nie.
mt: While authorities are unsure of the validity of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority made the closure on the urging of the FBI. Bus stops were used to block underground train station entrances and the assistance of 80 police officers was available to direct motorists to detours. No traffic delays were reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Die fotograaf is na Ronald Reagan UCLA Mediese Sentrum getransporteer, waar hy kort daarna, oorlede is. Dit is berig dat hy in sy 20's is. Bieber het in 'n verklaring gesê: “Terwyl ek nie teenwoordig of direk betrokke was by hierdie tragiese ongeluk nie; is my gedagtes en gebede by die familie van die slagoffer.” Die vermaaklikheidsnuus-webwerf TMZ verstaan dat die fotograaf sy voertuig aan die oorkant van Sepulveda Boulevard gestop het en probeer het om fotos van die polisiestop te neem voordat hy die pad oorgesteek het en aangehou het om foto's neem, waarná die California Highway Patrol-polisieman wat die verkeerstop uitgevoer het, hom twee keer moes beveel om terug te gaan. Volgens polisie, die bestuurder van die motor wat die fotograaf getref het sal waarskynlik nie aanklagte in die gesig staar nie.
mt: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he was later pronounced dead. It was reported that he was in his 20s. Bieber said in a statement: "While I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim, as well as my friends and crew." The entertainment news website TMZ understands that the photographer had stopped his vehicle on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and was trying to take photos of the police stop before he crossed the road and continued to take photos, whereupon the California Highway Patrol police officer who was conducting the traffic stop had to order him twice to go back. According to police, the driver of the car that hit the photographer will likely not face charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Arias het positief getoets vir ‘n ligte graad van die virus, volgens Presidensiële Minister Rodrigo Arias. Die president se kondisie is stabiel, alhoewel hy geisoleerd by die huis sal wees vir die volgende paar dae. “Behalwe vir die koors en ‘n seer keel, voel ek goed en in staat om my werk deur telewerk uit te voer. Ek verwag om terug te keer na al my pligte op Maandag, het Arias gesê in ‘n verklaring.
mt: Arias has tested positive for a light grade of the virus, according to Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias. The president’s condition is stable, although he will be isolated at home for the next few days. “Besides the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and able to carry out my work through telework. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,” Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Op sy hoogtepunt het Tropiese Sikloon Gonu, genaamd na ‘n sak blare in die taal van die Maldives, volgehoue winde van 240 kilometer per uur (149 myl per uur) bereik. Teen vroegdag was winde om en by 83 km/h, en daar is verwag dat dit sou aanhou verswak.
mt: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named after a type of leaf in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). By early morning, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Rooi gety is veroorsaak deur hoër as normale konsentrasie van Karenia brevis, ‘n natuurlike enkel sel marien organisme. Natuurlike faktore kan oorvleuel om ideale kondisies voort te bring, wat hierdie alge toelaat om drasties in getalle toe te neem. Die alge produseer 'n neurotoksine wat senuwees in beide mens en vis kan verlam. Vis vrek dikwels as gevolg van die hoë konsentrasies van die gifstof in die water. Mense kan geaffekteer word deur geaffekteerde water in te asem wat in die lug opgeneem is deur die wind en die golwe.
mt: Red tide is caused by higher than normal concentrations of Karenia brevis, a natural single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can overlap to bring about ideal conditions, allowing this algae to dramatically increase in numbers. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can paralyze nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die as a result of the high concentrations of the toxin in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling affected water in the air that is carried by the wind and the waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, eens 'n kategorie-4-storm op die Saffir-Simpson-orkaanskaal, het na 'n tropiese depressie verswak voor dit op Dinsdag opgeklaar het. Sy oorblyfsels het reën oor meeste van die eilande veroorsaak, maar tot op hede, is daar geen skade of vloede gerapporteer nie. Die neerslag, wat 6.34 duim deur ‘n meter op Oahu bereik het, was as “voordelig” beskryf. Sommige van die reënval was vergeself deur donderstorms en gereelde weerlig.
mt: Felicia, once a category-4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson hurricane scale, weakened to a tropical depression before clearing up on Tuesday. Its remnants caused rain over most of the islands, but so far, there have been no reports of damage or flooding. The rainfall, which reached 6.34 inches per meter on Oahu, was described as “beneficial.” Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. het in die 2008 Singapoer Grand Prix 'n ongeluk gemaak net na 'n vroeë russtop vir Fernando Alonso, en die veiligheidskar is uitgebring. Soos die motors voor Alonso vir brandstof onder die veiligheidsmotor ingegaan het, het Alonso vorentoe  in die grope beweeg om die oorwinning te behaal. Piquet Jnr. is na die 2009 Hongaarse Grand Prix afgedank.
mt: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix after an early safety car period for Fernando Alonso, and the safety car was brought out. As the cars ahead of Alonso for fuel under the safety car moved forward, Alonso moved ahead in the pack to win. Piquet Jr. was dropped after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: ‘n Studie wat Donderdag in die joernaal Science gepubliseer is, het die ontstaan van ‘n nuwe spesie voël op die Ecuadoriaanse Galapagos Eilande vermeld. Navorsers van Princeton Universiteit in die Verenigde State en Uppsala Universiteit in Swede het rapporteer dat die spesies aangepas het in slegs twee generasies, al is hierdie proses geglo om baie langer te vat, as gevolg van broei tussen ‘n endemiese Darwin vink, Geospiza fortes, en die immigrante kaktus vink, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported the emergence of a new bird species on the Ecuadorian Galapagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the species had adapted in just two generations, although this process was believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Die artistieke geleentheid is ook deel van ‘n veldtog deur die Boekarest Stadsaal wat daarna poog om die beeld van die Roemeense hoofstad as ‘n kreatiewe en kleurvolle metropool uit te druk. Die stad sal die eerste gasheer in suidoos Europa wees vir CowParade, die wêreld se grootste publieke kuns gebeurtenis, tussen Junie en Augustus die jaar.
mt: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall which is trying to portray the Romanian capital as a creative and colorful metropolis. Bucharest will be the first host in south-east Europe for CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Die vliegtuig was op pad na Irkutsk en is deur binnelandse troepe gevlieg. Navrae is vasgestel sodat 'n ondersoek geloods is. Die Il-76 was ‘n groot deel van beide die Russiese en Sowjet weermag sedert die 1970’s, en het reeds ‘n ernstige ongeluk in Rusland gesien verlede maand. Op Oktober 7 het 'n enjin met opstyg geskei, sonder beserings. Rusland het Il-76's kort ná die ongeluk vir ń tydperk verbied.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was flown by domestic troops. Inquiries have been made so that an investigation can be launched. The Il-76 was a major part of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970’s, and has already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7, an engine with takeoff broke, without injuries. Russia has banned Il-76's shortly after the accident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Voor Die Simpsons, het Simon gewerk aan verskeie vertonings in verskillende rolle. Tydens die 1980 het hy op programme gewerk soos Taxi, Cheers, en The Tracy Ulman Show. In 1989 het hy vir Brooks en Groening gehelp om The Simpsons te skep en hy was verantwoordelik om die eerste skrywerspan vir die program te huur. Alhoewel hy die vertoning in 1993 verlaat het, het hy die titel van uitvoerende direkteur behou en het hy steeds elke seisoen miljoene dollars in tantieme verdien.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on various productions in various roles. In the 1980s he worked on shows like Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped Brooks and Groening create The Simpsons and he was responsible for hiring the first writing staff for the show. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer and still earns millions of dollars in royalties every season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke het geskryf dat die pogings deur party om vrouestemme oor vrouegesondheid stil te maak, onsuksesvol was. Sy het tot hierdie gevolgtrekking gekom vanweë die vele posietiewe kommentare en aanmoedigings wat na haar toe gestuur is deur beide vroulike en manlike individue wat hul ywer daarvoor uitgespreek het dat voorbehoedmedikasie as 'n mediese noodsaak gesien behoort te word.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some to silence women's voices on women's health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion from the many positive comments and encouragements that were sent to her by both female and male individuals who expressed their zeal that contraception be seen as a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: “Dit gaan optree soos water. Dis deursigtig nes hoe water is.” So as jy by die kuslyn staan, sal jy in staat wees om af te kyk en te sien watter klippies of gemors daar op die onderkant is. So ver soos ons weet is daar slegs een planeetliggaam wat meer dinamika as Titaan ten toon stel, en sy naam is Aarde,” het Stofan bygevoeg.
mt: “It will behave like water. It’s transparent like water.” So if you stand at the shoreline, you will be able to look down and see what rocks or debris are on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamics than Titan, and its name is Earth,” Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

So ver soos ons weet is daar slegs een planeetliggaam wat meer dinamika as Titaan ten toon stel, en sy naam is Aarde,” het Stofan bygevoeg.

src: Dit bevestig nie net dat daar ten minste sommige dinosaurusse was wat vere gehad het nie, wat reeds ‘n wydverspreide teorie is, maar bied ook besonderhede wat fossiele oor die algemeen nie kan nie, soos kleur en drie-dimensionele rangskikking. Wetenskaplike sê dat hierdie dier se vere kastaiingbruin bo-op met ‘n vaal of karetoïed-gekleurde onderkant het. Die vinding gee ook insig tot die evolusie van vere in voëls. Omdat die dinosourus vere nie ‘n goed-ontwikkelde skag het nie, ook genaamd as die rhachis, maar dit het ander eienskappe van vere - skagveertjies en sytakkies met baardjies - en die navorsers het afgelei dat die rhachis moontlik ‘n latere evolusionêre ontwikkeling was as hierdie ander eienskappe. Die veer struktuur suggereer dat hulle nie in vlug gebruik is nie, maar eerder vir temperatuur regulasie of afwys. Die navorsers stel voor dat, selfs al is hierdie die stert van ‘n jong dinosourus, dat die monster volwasse vere wys en nie ‘n kuiken se donsies nie. Die navorsers het voorgestel dat selfs al is dit die stert van ‘n jong dinosaurus, wys die monster volwasse vere en nie kuiken donsies nie.
mt: This not only confirms that there were at least some dinosaurs with feathers, which is already a widely held theory, but also provides details that fossils in general cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say that this animal's feathers were chestnut brown on top with a pale or carotene-colored underside. The finding also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers did not have a well-developed rachis, also called the rachis, but it had other features of feathers - rachis feathers and shafts with barbs - and the researchers inferred that the rachis may have been a later evolutionary development as these other features. The feather structure suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or insulation. The researchers suggest that, even if this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers and not a chick's down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Tot op hede is daar een toets-inenting wat sterftes aan Ebola verminder, maar tot op hede het geen middels al duidelike gepastheid getoon vir die behandeling van ‘n bestaande infeksie nie. Een teenliggaam middel, ZMapp, het aanvanklik vordering in die veld beloof, maar formele studies het getoon dat dit minder voordele inhou as wat verlang word in die voorkoming van sterftes. In die PALM verhoor, het ZMapp as beheer gedien, wat beteken dat wetenskaplikes dit gebruik as ‘n basislyn en vergelyk drie ander behandelinge daarmee.
mt: To date, there is one vaccine that reduces deaths from Ebola, but to date, no treatments have shown clear efficacy for treating an existing infection. One antibody treatment, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies showed that it had less benefit than hoped in preventing deaths. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that scientists used it as a baseline and compared three other treatments to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Op Maandag het wetenskaplikes vanaf die Stanford Universiteit Medieseskool aangekondig dat die uitvinding van ‘n diagnostiese hulpmiddel wat selle kan rangskik volgens tipe: ‘n klein drukbare skyfie wat vervaardig kan word deur om standard inkjetprinters te gebruik vir ‘n moontlike een VS sent elk. Hoofnavorsers sê dit mag vroeë ontdekking van kanker, tuberkulose, HIV en malaria bring aan pasiënte in lae-inkomste lande, waar die oorlewingstempos vir sulke siektes soos borskanker die helfte kan wees van die van ryker lande.
mt: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a diagnostic aid that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable sheet that can be made by using standard inkjet printers for a possible one US cent each. Lead researchers say it may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where survival rates for such diseases as breast cancer can be half that of richer countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Wetenskaplikes het landvorms ontdek wat besaai regoor die maan se oppervalkte is en lobatarpe genoem word wat bykbaar onstaan het deurdat die maan stadig krimp. Hierdie kranse is oral oor die maan gevind en blyk in die minimum verweer te wees, wat daarop dui dat die geologiese gebeure wat dit veroorsaak het, redelik onlangs was. Hierdie teorie is in teenstelling met die bewerings dat die maan geheel en al sonder geologiese aktiwiteit is.
mt: Scientists have discovered landforms that are scattered across the moon's surface and called lobate scarps, which appear to have formed as the moon slowly shrinks. These scarps are found all over the moon and appear to be in the least weathered state, suggesting that the geological events that caused them were relatively recent. This theory is in contrast to the claims that the moon is entirely without geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Adekoya is sedertdien in die Edinburgh Sherrif Hof aangekla vir moord op haar seun. Sy is in aanhouding in afwagting van haar aanklag en verhoor, maar enige ooggetuie bewyse mag beïnvloed wees omdat haar beeld wyd gepubliseerd is. Hierdie is ‘n algemene praktyk elders in die UK maar Skotse regstelsels werk anders en howe het publikasie van die fotos as potensieël nadelig gesien. Professor Pamela Ferguson van die Universiteit van Dundee merk op dat “joernaliste 'n gevaarlike lyn oorskry indien hulle fotos ens van verdagtes publiseer.” Kroon Kantoor, wat in algehele beheer is van vervolgings, het aan joernaliste aangedui dat geen verdere kommentaar gelewer sal word, ten minste tot aanklag.
mt: Adekoya has since been charged with murder at the Edinburgh Sheriff Court. She is in custody awaiting her arraignment and hearing, but any eyewitness evidence may be affected because her image has been widely published. This is a common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish legal systems work differently and courts have seen publication of the photos as potentially detrimental. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes that “journalists are crossing a dangerous line if they publish photos of suspects.” The Crown Office, which is in overall control of prosecutions, has told journalists that no further comment will be made, at least until the arraignment.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Bykomend tot die verpletterende ys, het uiterste weersomstandighede die reddingspogings gestrem. Pittman het voorgestel dat toestande die sal verbeter tot een of ander tyd volgende week nie. Die hoeveelheid en digtheid van die pak ys, volgens Pittman, is die ergste wat dit in die afgelope 15 jaar was vir robbejagters.
mt: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions hampered the rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions would improve to some degree at some point next week. The amount and density of the pack ice, according to Pittman, was the worst it had been in the past 15 years for seal hunters.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts het eenvoudig geweier om te sê oor wanneer hy glo lewe begin, ‘n belangrike vraag wanneer ‘n mens die etiek van aborsie in gedagte hou, en gesê dat dit oneties sou wees om op die spesifieke besonderhede van waarskynlike gevalle kommentaar te lewer. Hy het wel sy vroeër uitspraak bevestig dat Roe v. Wade die “gevestige wet van die land” is, en die belangrikheid van konsekwentheid van Hooggeregshof bevindings benadruk. Hy het ook bevestig dat hy in die geimpliseerde reg tot privaatheid glo waarvan die Roe besluit afgehang het.
mt: Roberts declined to say when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, and said it would be unseemly to comment on the specifics of hypothetical cases. He did, however, reaffirm his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade is the “settled law of the land” and emphasized the importance of consistency of Supreme Court rulings. He also reaffirmed his belief in the implied right to privacy on which the Roe decision hinged.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Om presies 8:46 vm het 'n hush oor die stad geval op die presiese oomblik toe die eerste jet sy teiken getref het. Twee ligstrale is opgestel om oornag na die hemelruim te skyn. Deurlopende konstruksie aan vyf nuwe wolkekrabbers op die grond, met ‘n vervoersentrum en gedenkpark in die middel.
mt: 8:46 am, a hush fell over the city at the precise moment the first jet hit its target. Two beams were set up to shine into the night sky. Continuous construction on five new skyscrapers on the ground, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: Alle grot ingange, wat “Die Sewe Susters” genoem is, is ten minste 100 tot 250 meter (328 tot 820 voet) in deursnee. Infrarooi beelde toon dat die temperatuurvariasies tussen nag en dag daarop dui dat hulle heel waarskynlik grotte is. “Hulle is koeler as die omliggende omgewing in die dag en warmer in die nag.” Hul termiese gedrag is nie so gematig soos groot grotte op Aarde wat baiemaal ‘n redelike konstante temperatuur behou nie, maar dit is konsekwent met hierdie diep gate wat in die grond is,” sê Glen Cushing van die Verenigde State Geologiese opname (USGS) Astro-geologie Span en van Noordelike Arizona Universiteit wat in Flagstaff, Arizona is.
mt: All the cave entrances, which are called “The Seven Sisters,” are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations between night and day indicate that they are almost certainly caves. “They are cooler than the surrounding environment during the day and warmer at night.” Their thermal behavior is not so moderate as large caves on Earth that maintain a reasonable constant temperature, but it is consistent with these deep pits in the ground,” says Glen Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Alle grot ingange, wat “Die Sewe Susters” genoem is, is ten minste 100 tot 250 meter (328 tot 820 voet) in deursnee. Infrarooi beelde toon dat die temperatuurvariasies tussen nag en dag daarop dui dat hulle heel waarskynlik grotte is. “Hulle is koeler as die omliggende omgewing in die dag en warmer in die nag.” Hul termiese gedrag is nie so gematig soos groot grotte op Aarde wat baiemaal ‘n redelike konstante temperatuur behou nie, maar dit is konsekwent met hierdie diep gate wat in die grond is,” sê Glen Cushing van die Verenigde State Geologiese opname (USGS) Astro-geologie Span en van Noordelike Arizona Universiteit wat in Flagstaff, Arizona is.
mt: All the cave entrances, which are called “The Seven Sisters,” are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations between night and day indicate that they are almost certainly caves. “They are cooler than the surrounding environment during the day and warmer at night.” Their thermal behavior is not so moderate as large caves on Earth that maintain a reasonable constant temperature, but it is consistent with these deep pits in the ground,” says Glen Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and Northern Arizona University in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Die man het na beweringe met ‘n drie-wiel voertuig, gewapen met plofstof, in ‘n skare in bestuur. Die man wat daarvan verdink word dat hy die bom laat ontplof het is in gevange geneem, nadat hy in die ontploffing beseer is. Sy naam is steeds onbekend aan die owerhede, al weet hulle hy is 'n lid van die Uighur etniese groep.
mt: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle, armed with explosives, into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was arrested after being injured in the explosion. His name is still unknown to authorities, but they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Suid-Afrika het die All Blacks (Nieu Seeland) in ‘n rugby unie Drienasies toernooi by die Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, Suid-Afrika, oorwin. Die finale telling was ‘n een punt oorwinning, 21 tot 20, wat die All Blacks se 15-onoorwonne-wedstryde-rekord beeïndig het. Vir die Springbokke, het dit geeindig in ‘n vyf-wedstryd verloorstreep. Dit was die finale wedstryd vir die All Blacks, wat reeds die trofee gewen het twee weke terug. Die finale wedstryd van die reeks sal plaasvind by Ellis Park in Johannesburg volgende week, wanneer die Springbokke teen Australië speel.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri-Nations tournament at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, 21 to 20, a one-point victory, ending the All Blacks' 15-game unbeaten streak. For the Springboks, it ended in a five-game losing streak. It was the All Blacks' final game, having already won the trophy two weeks earlier. The final game of the series will be played at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Die stasie het sy houding behou, ten spyte van die verlies van ‘n gyroskoop vroeër tydens die missie, tot die einde van die ruimtewandeling. Chiao en Sharipov het berig dat hul ‘n veilige afstand van die houding aanpassing stuwers af was. Russiese grond-beheer het die straalvliegtuie geaktiveer en die normale houding van die stasie is herwin.
mt: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were a safe distance from the attitude control thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and the station's normal attitude was restored.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Die saak het in Virginia voorgekom, want dié is die tuiste van die toonaangewende internet diensverskaffer AOL, die maatskappy wat die klagtes gelê het. Dit is die eerste keer dat ‘n skuldigbevinding verkry is deur die wetgewing se implementering van 2003 om grootmaat e-pos, wat ook bekend staan as gemorspos, van ongewenste verspreiding in verbruikers se e-posbusse te verminder.
mt: The case occurred in Virginia, because that is the home of the leading Internet service provider AOL, the company that filed the complaints. It is the first time that a guilty finding has been made by the implementation of 2003 legislation to reduce bulk e-mail, also known as spam, from unwanted distribution in users' e-mail boxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Die 28-jarige Vidal het drie seisoene gelede by Barça aangesluit, vanaf Sevilla. Sedert hy na die Katalaanse hoofstad getrek het, het Vidal 49 wedstryde vir die klub gespeel.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barça three seasons ago from Sevilla. Since he moved to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque het vroeg in die dag gedurend voorseisoen opleiding in Cocerciano in Italië geoefen. Hy het in die span hotel gewoon voor ‘n wedstryd wat op Sondag teen Bolonia beplan is. Hy het voor die wedstryd wat vir Sondag teen Bolonië beplan is in die span-hotel gebly.

src: Geen tsunamiwaarskuwing is uitgereik nie, en volgens die Jakarta geofisika agentskap sal geen tsunamiwaarskuwing uitgereik word nie omdat die aardbewing nie die vereiste 6.5 skaal bereik het nie. Tenspyte dat daar geen tsunami gevaar is nie, het inwoners angstig geword en begin om hul besighede en tuistes te verlaat.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency no tsunami warning will be issued because the earthquake did not reach the required 6.5 scale. Despite the fact that there was no tsunami danger, residents became frightened and began to leave their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Hulle het bevind dat die Son op dieselfde basiese beginsels as ander sterre werk. Dit is gevind dat die aktiwiteite van alle sterre in die sisteem gedryf word deur hul helderheid en rotasie en niks anders nie. Die helderheid en rotasie word saam gebruik om ‘n ster se Rossby nommer te bepaal, wat verwant is aan plasma vloei. Hoe kleiner die Rossby nommer is, hoe minder aktief is die ster met betrekking tot magnetiese ommekerings.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars. It was found that the activities of all stars in the system are driven by their brightness and rotation and nothing else. The brightness and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number is, the less active the star is with respect to magnetic eruptions.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Uit die 1,400 vorige kiesers van die 2010 federale verkiesing, het die wat teenstaan dat Australië ‘n republiek word, met 8 persent gegroei sedert 2008. Waarnemende Eerste Minister, Julia Gillard, het gedurende die 2010 federale verkiesing beweer dat sy geglo het dat Australië ‘n republiek aan die einde van Koningin Elizabeth II se heerskappy sou word. 34 Persent van diegene in die peiling deel hierdie siening, hul wil hê Koningin Elizabeth ll moet Australië se laaste monarg wees. By die uiterstes van die peiling, het 29 persent van die respondente geglo dat Australië so gou as moontlik ‘n republiek moet word, terwyl 31 persent glo Australië moet nooit ‘n republiek word nie.
mt: 1,400 of the previous voters in the 2010 federal election, who opposed Australia becoming a republic, have grown by 8 percent since 2008. Acting Prime Minister, Julia Gillard, claimed during the 2010 federal election that she believed that Australia would become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 percent of those polled share this view, they want Queen Elizabeth ll to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 percent of the respondents believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believe that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, ‘n woordvoerder vir die Komen Fondasie, het gesê dat die organisasie ‘n nuwe reël aangeneem het wat nie die gee van donasies of befondsing toelaat aan organisasies wat onder wettige ondersoeke verkeer nie. Komen se beleid het Beplande Ouerskap gediskwalifiseer as gevolg van ‘n onbesliste ondersoek oor hoe Beplande Ouerskap se verteenwoordiger, Cliff Sterns, hulle geld spandeer het en gerapporteer wat uitgevoer is. In sy rol as voorsitter van die Toesig en Ondersoeke Subkomitee, wat onder die sambreel van die Huis Energie en Handel Komitee is, ondersoek Stearns of belasting gebruik word om aborsies te befonds deur Beplande Ouerskap.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Komen Foundation, said the organization has adopted a new rule that does not allow the giving of donations or funding to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy had disqualified Planned Parenthood as a result of an inconclusive investigation into how Planned Parenthood's representative, Cliff Sterns, spent their money and reported what was done. In his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which falls under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee, Sterns investigates whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Die Madhya Pradesh Polisie het die gesteelde skootrekenaar en mobiele fone teruggekry. Adjunk Inspekteur Generaal D K Arya het gesê, ""Ons het vyf persone gearresteer wat die Switserse vrou verkrag het en haar mobiele foon en skootrekenaar teruggevind.” Die name van die beskuldigdes is Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar en Vishnu Kanjar. Polisie superintendent, Chandra Shekhar Solanki, het gesê dat die beskuldigdes in die hof verskyn het met bedekte gesigte."
mt: "The Madhya Pradesh Police have recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phones. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five people who raped the Swiss woman and found her mobile phone and laptop back." The names of the accused are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police Superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said that the accused appeared in court with covered faces."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, vroeër wêreldwyd gelanseer is vir koste-besparings- en funksionaliteitsfaktore, was 'n gewilde onderwerp op Taipei se 2007 IT Maand. Maar die verbruikersmark rakend skootrekenaars sal radikaal verskil en verander wees na ASUS die 2007 Taiwan Onderhoubare Toekenning ontvang het van die Uitvoerende Hoof Yuan van die Republiek van China.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, previously launched worldwide for cost-saving and functionality factors, was a popular topic at Taipei's 2007 IT Fair. But the consumer market for handheld computers will radically differ and change after ASUS received the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award from the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
