src: Die kwessie het begin op die 1e Jauarie toe dosyne plaaslike inwoners begin kla het by die Obanazawa Poskantoor dat hulle nie hul tradisionele en gereëlde Nuwejaarskaartjies ontvang het nie. Gister het die poskantoor hul verskoning aan die gemeenskapslede en die media vrygestel nadat hulle ontdek het dat die seun meer as 600 posdokumente, insluitend 429 Nuwejaarskaartjies weggesteek het, wat nie hul beoogde ontvangers bereik het nie.
mt: The issue began on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining at the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their traditional and scheduled New Year's cards. Yesterday the post office issued an apology to the community members and the media after they discovered that the son had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, which did not reach their intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Die kwessie het begin op die 1e Jauarie toe dosyne plaaslike inwoners begin kla het by die Obanazawa Poskantoor dat hulle nie hul tradisionele en gereëlde Nuwejaarskaartjies ontvang het nie. Gister het die poskantoor hul verskoning aan die gemeenskapslede en die media vrygestel nadat hulle ontdek het dat die seun meer as 600 posdokumente, insluitend 429 Nuwejaarskaartjies weggesteek het, wat nie hul beoogde ontvangers bereik het nie.
mt: The issue began on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining at the Obanazawa Post Office that they had not received their traditional and scheduled New Year's cards. Yesterday the post office issued an apology to the community members and the media after they discovered that the son had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, which did not reach their intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray het die eerste stel in ‘n gelykopspel verloor nadat beide manne ieder en elke dien in die stel gehou het. Del Potro het ‘n vroeë voordeel gehad in die tweede stel, maar dit was vereis nadat hy ‘n gelykopspel ontvang het van 6-6. Op hierdie punt het Potro behandeling vir sy skouer ontvang, maar het terug gekeer na die spel.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tiebreak after both men held serve in the set. Del Potro had an early advantage in the second set, but it was required after he received treatment for his shoulder, but returned to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Hy het Texas se burgerlikes verseker dat stappe geneem sou word om die publiek se veiligheid te beskerm, terwyl hy deur hierdie amptenare vergesel is. Perry het spesifiek genoem, “Daar is min plekke in die wêreld wat beter toegerus is om die uitdaging wat in hierdie geval bestaan, tegemoet te kom.” Die burgmeester het ook gemeld, ""Vandag het ons geleer dat daar sommige skool-ouderdom kinders geïdentifiseer is wat met die pasiënt kontak gehad het.” Hy het voortgegaan, “Hierdie geval is ernstig. Wees verseker dat ons sisteem so goed werk soos dit hoort.”"
mt: "He assured Texas' citizens that steps would be taken to protect the public's safety, while accompanied by these officials. Perry specifically mentioned, "There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that exists in this case." The mayor also stated, ""Today we learned that some school-aged children have been identified who had contact with the patient.” He continued, “This case is serious. Be assured that our system works as it should.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: In 1988 toe hul studente was by UW, lank voor The Daily Show en The Colbert Report, het Heck en Johnson ‘n parodieër’ beoog wat die nuus en nuus verslaggewing sou parodie. Sedert sy ontstaan, het The Onion ‘n ware nuusparodie-reus geword, met ‘n gedrukte weergawe, ‘n webtuiste wat 5 000 000 unieke besoekers in die maand van Oktober gelok het, persoonlike advertensies, ‘n 24-uur-nuusnetwerk, podsendings en ‘n wêreldatlas wat onlangs vrygestel is met die titel Our Dumb World (Ons dom wêreld). Al Gore en Generaal Tommy Franks het gemaklik hulle gunsteling hooflyne afgerammel (Gore s’n was toe Die Unie rapporteer het dat hy en Tipper die beste seks van hulle lewens gehad het na sy 2000 Elektorale Kollege nederlaag). Baie van hul skrywers het voortgegaan om ‘n groot invloed op Jon Stewart en Stephen Colbert se nuusparodie vertonings te hê.
mt: 1988, when they were students at UW, long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson had a parody in mind that would spoof the news and news reporting. Since its inception, The Onion has become a true news parody behemoth, with a printed edition, a website that attracted 5 million unique visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a world atlas recently released with the title Our Dumb World (Our dumb world). Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have easily had their favorite headlines lampooned (Gore’s was when The Onion reported that he and Tipper had the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to have a large influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert’s news parody performances.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Die protes het ongeveer 11:00 plaaslike tyd (GUT+1) op Whitehall oorkant die polisie-bewaakte ingang na Downing Straat, die Eerste Minister se offisiële tuiste, begin. Net na 11:00, het die betogers die verkeer geblokkeer op die noordwaartse pad in Whitehall. Om 11:20 het die polisie die betogers gevra om terug na die sypaadjie te beweeg, deur hulle in kennis te stel dat hulle die balans moet hou tussen die betoging en die opbounde verkeer. Om en by 11:29 het die protes met Whitehall opbeweeg, verby Trafalgar Vierkant, langs die Strand, en by Aldwych verbygegaan op met Kingsway in die rigting van Holborn waar die Konserwatiewe Party besig was om hul Lenteforum in die Grootse Connaught Kamers hotel te hou.
mt: 11:00 local time (GUT+1) the protest began on Whitehall across the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the official residence of the Prime Minister. Just after 11:00, the protesters blocked the traffic on the northbound road in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back to the pavement, informing them that they had to maintain the balance between the protest and the traffic. Around 11:29 the protest moved along Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, and past Aldwych onto Kingsway in the direction of Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding its Lent Forum in the Great Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: “Ons het nou 4-maand oue muise wat nie diabeties is, wat eenmaal diabeties was,” het hy bygevoeg. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor van medisyne by Dalhousie Universiteit in Halifax, Nova Scotia en voorsitter van die kliniese en wetenskaplike afdeling van die Kanadese Vereniging vir Diabetes, het gemaan dat die navorsing steeds in sy vroeë stadium is. Soos sommige ander deskundiges is hy skepties of diabetes genees kan word, let op dat hierdie vindings geen verwantskap het met mense wat alreeds Tipe 1 diabetes het nie.
mt: “We now have 4-month-old mice that are not diabetic, who were once diabetic,” he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Association for Diabetes, said the research is still in its early stages. Like some other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relationship to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Die Tweeling Otter het pogings aangewend om gister by Kokoda te land, soos Lugredery PNG Vlug CG4684 gedoen het, maar het alreeds eenmaal die aftog geblaas. Omtrend tien minute voor dit vanuit ‘n tweede aanloop sou moes land, het dit verdwyn. Die ongelukstoneel is vandag opgespoor en is so ontoeganklik dat twee polisiemanne in die oerwoud laat val is om tot by die toneel te stap en oorlewendes te soek. Die soektog is bemoeilik deur dieselfde slegte weer wat die geaborteerde landing veroorsaak het.
mt: The Twin Otter attempted to land at Kokoda yesterday, as did Airline PNG Flight CG4684, but had already blown one landing. About ten minutes before it was to make a second approach, it disappeared. The crash site was found today and is so inaccessible that two police officers were dropped in the jungle to walk to the site and look for survivors. The search was complicated by the same bad weather that caused the aborted landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: “Gelukkig het niks met my gebeur nie, maar ek het 'n makabere toneel gesien, waar mense vensters probeer breek het om uit te kom.” Mense het die vensterpanele met stoele geslaan, maar die vensters was onbreekbaar. Die oorlewende Franciszek Kowal se dat een van die panele het uiteindelik gebreek, en hulle het deur die venster begin uitkom.
mt: “Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene where people were trying to break windows to get out.” People were smashing the windowpanes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. The survivor Franciszek Kowal said that one of the panes eventually broke, and they started to come out through the window.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Die tropiese storm Danielle, die vierde genoemde storm van die 2010 Atlantiese orkaanseisoen, het in die oos Atlantiese Oseaan gevorm. Die storm is na benadering aangetref sowat 3 000 myl van Miami, Florida, en het maksimum volgehoue winde van 40 m.p.u (64 km/h). Wetenskaplikes by die Nasionale Orkaansentrum voorspel dat Danielle sal versterk tot ‘n orkaan teen Woensdag. Omdat die storm ver van die kus af is, bly dit moelik om die potensiële impak teen die Verenigde State of Karibië te assesseer.
mt: The tropical storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the east Atlantic Ocean. The storm was estimated to be about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, and had maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center forecast that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. Because the storm is far from the coast, it is difficult to assess the potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee het ook kommer uitgespreek oor verslae dat kinders in Turkye nou met die A(H5N1) voëlgriep virus geïnfekteer is sonder dat hulle siek geword het. Hy het opgemerk dat sommige studies voorstel dat die siekte eers minder fataal moet word voor dit ‘n globale epidemie kan veroorsaak. Daar is kommer oor dat pasiënte sal voortduur om meer mense te infekteer deur hul daaglikse roetines te gaan indien die griepsimptome lig bly.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports that children in Turkey are now infected with the A(H5N1) bird flu virus without becoming ill. He noted that some studies suggest that the disease will only become less fatal before it can cause a global epidemic. There is concern that patients will continue to spread the flu by going about their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Vanaf die aand van die 9e Augustus, was die oog van Morakot om en by sewentig kilometer weg van die Chinese provinsie Fujian. Die tifoon beweeg omtrent elf km/uur na China.
mt: From the evening of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometers away from the Chinese province Fujian. The typhoon was moving about eleven kilometers per hour towards China.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Die V.S. president George W. Bush het in Singapoer aangeland op die oggend van November 16, wat die begin was van 'n week-lange toer van Asië. Hy is begroet deur Singapoer se Adjunk Eerste Minister Wong Kan Seng en het handel en terrorisme kwessies met Singapoer se Eerste Minister Lee Hsien Loong bespreek. Na 'n week van verliese in die mid-termyn verkiesing, het Bush 'n gehoor vertel oor die uitbreiding van handel in Asië.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush landed in Singapore in the morning of November 16, which was the beginning of a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the mid-term election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Vandag se aankondiging verleng ook die regering se verbintenis wat in Maart hierdie jaar gemaak is om ekstra waens te befonds. n Addisionele 300 bring die totaal tot 1 300 trokke wat verwerf moet word om die oorlading te verlig.
mt: Today’s announcement also extends the government’s commitment made in March this year to fund additional trucks. An additional 300 will bring the total to 1,300 trucks that must be purchased to relieve the overloading.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Vandag se aankondiging verleng ook die regering se verbintenis wat in Maart hierdie jaar gemaak is om ekstra waens te befonds. n Addisionele 300 bring die totaal tot 1 300 trokke wat verwerf moet word om die oorlading te verlig.
mt: Today’s announcement also extends the government’s commitment made in March this year to fund additional trucks. An additional 300 will bring the total to 1,300 trucks that must be purchased to relieve the overloading.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Sy het gesê, “Daar is geen intelligensie wat voorstel dat ‘n aanval binnekort verwag word nie. Nietemin, die vermindering van die dreigingsvlak na ernstig beteken nie dat die hele bedreiging weg is nie.”
mt: She said, “There is no intelligence that suggests an attack is imminent. Nevertheless, the reduction in the threat level to serious does not mean the entire threat is gone.”
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly het ‘n nuwe Provinsiale Verkiesings Raad (CEP) van nege lede gister ingesweer. Dit is Martelly se vyfde CEP in vier jaar. Laas maand het ‘n presidensiële kommisie die vorige CEP se bedanking voorgestel as deel van ‘n maatreëlpakket om die land voort te beweeg na nuwe verkiesings. Die kommissie was Martelly se reaksie op wyd verspreide anti-regime proteste wat in Oktober begin het. Die soms geweldadige proteste was geaktiveer deur die gebrek aan verkiesings, party al verskuldig sedert 2011.
mt: Martelly swore in a new Provincial Elections Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly’s fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the resignation of the previous CEP as part of a roadmap package to move the country forward to new elections. The commission was Martelly’s response to widespread anti-regime protests that began in October. The sometimes violent protests were activated by the lack of elections, party all overdue since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: VSA Gimnastiek ondersteun die Verenigde State Olimpiese Kommittee se brief en aanvaar die absolute behoefte van die Olimpiese familie om 'n veilige omgewing vir al ons atlete te bevorder. Ons stem saam met die USOC se verklaring dat die belange van ons atlete en klubs, en hul sport, kan beter bedien word deur ‘n stap vorentoe met betekenisvolle verandering in ons organisasie, eerder as die ontneming van sertifikate. VSA Gimnastiek ondersteun ‘n onafhanklike ondersoek wat lig mag werp op die misbruik van die proporsie wat so heldhaftiglik beskryf is deur die oorlewendes van Larry Nassar wat so lank ongemerk gebly het en enige nodige en gepaste veranderinge behels. VSA Gimnastiek en die USOK het dieselfde doel – om die sport van gimnastiek, onder andere, as veilig moontlik te maak vir atlete om hulle drome te volg in ‘n veilige, positiewe en bemagtige omgewing.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee’s letter and recognizes the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all our athletes. We agree with the USOC’s statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, can be better served by moving forward with meaningful change in our organization, rather than the revocation of certifications. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shed light on the abuse of the proportion that so heroically described by the survivors of Larry Nassar who so long remained unreported and any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal – to make the sport of gymnastics, among others, as safe as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Die VS Vloot het ook gesê dat hulle die insident ondersoek. Hulle het ook gesê in ‘n verklaring, “Die bemanning is huidiglik besig om te werk aan die beste metode om die skip veilig te onttrek.” ń Avenger myn skip was op pad na Puerto Princesa in Palawan. Dit is toegewys aan die V.S. Vloot se Sewende Vloot en is gebaseer in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
mt: The U.S. Navy also said it is investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, “The crew is currently working on the best method to safely remove the ship.” An Avenger mine ship was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Laat Sondag het die Verenigde State se president Donald Trump in ‘n verklaring wat hy deur middel van die perssekretaris gelewer het, aangekondig dat die VSA se troepe Sirië sou verlaat. Die aankondiging is gemaak na Trump 'n telefoongesprek met die Turkse President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan gehad het. Turkye sal ook die plig oorneem om wag te hou oor gevange ISIS vegters wat, volgens die verklaring, Europese nasies wyer om te repatrieer.
mt: Last Sunday, the United States president Donald Trump announced in a statement released through the press secretary that U.S. troops would leave Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take the responsibility to guard captured ISIS fighters, who, according to the statement, European nations are eager to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalisie en Afghan troepe het in die area inbeweeg om die plek te beveilig en ande koalisie vliegtuie is gestuur om hulle te assisteer. Die ongeluk het hoog op in die bergagtige terrein gebeur, en dit word geglo dat dit die gevolg van vyandige brand was. Pogings om na die perseel van die ongeluk te soek, word deur slegte weer en rowwe terrein bemoeilik.
mt: Coalition and Afghan troops have moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been dispatched to assist them. The accident occurred high up in the mountainous terrain, and it is believed that it was the result of enemy fire. Efforts to search the area of the accident are hampered by bad weather and rough terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Nadat die dam in 1963 gebou is, is die seisoenale oorstromings gestop wat sediment deur die rivier versprei het. Hierdie afsaksels was nodig vir die skep van sandbanke en strande, wat as wildlewe habitats gedien het. As gevolg hiervan het twee visspesies uitgesterf, en twee ander het bedreig geraak, insluitend die Humpback Chub. Al sal die watervlak slegs ‘n paar voet styg na die vloed, hoop offisiere dat dit genoeg sal wees om die weggespoelde sandbanke stoomaf te herstel.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, seasonal overflows were stopped that spread sediment through the river. These sediments were needed to create sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species went extinct, and two others were threatened, including the Humpback Chub. All will only rise a few feet above flood stage, officials hope, enough to steam off the washed-away sandbars.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Die Amerikaanse ambassade in Nairobi, Kenia, het 'n waarskuwing uitgereik dat “ekstremiste uit Somalië” 'van plan is om selfmoordbomaanvalle in Kenia en Ethiopië te loods. Die V.S. sê dat dit informasie ontvang het van 'n onbekende bron wat spesifiek meld dat daar gebruik gemaak word van selfmoord-bommers om ""prominente bakens"" in Ethiopië en Kenia op te blaas."
mt: "The U.S. embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that "extremists from Somalia" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it received the information from an unknown source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to "blow up prominent targets" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Die beroemde Griekse prokureurs, Sakis Kechagioglou en George Nikolakopoulos is opgesluit in die Ateniese tronk van Korydallus, want hulle is skuldig bevind aan verduistering en korrupsie. As gevolg hiervan, is ‘n groot skandaal met die Griekse wettige gemeenskap aan die lig gebring deur die blootstelling van onwettige aksies deur regters, prokureurs, en wetsgeleerdes gedurende die vorige jare. n Paar weke gelede, nadat die informasie deur die joernalis Makis Triantafylopoulos in sy gewilde Televisieprogram ""Zoungla"" op Alfa TV gepubliseer is, is 'n lid van die parlement, en prokureur, Petros Mantouvalos, uit sy posisie onthef, aangesien lede van sy kabinet betrokke was in onwettige knoeiery en korrupsie. Verdermeer is die hoogste regter, Evangelos Kalousis, in die tronk opgesluit omdat hy skuldig bevind is van korrupsie en ontaarde gedrag."
mt: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos are imprisoned in the Athens prison of Korydallus, because they are found guilty of embezzlement and corruption. As a result, a great scandal with the Greek legal community has been brought to light by the exposure of illegal actions by judges, lawyers, and legal scholars during the past years. A few weeks ago, after the information was published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television program ""Zoungla"" on Alfa TV, a member of the parliament, and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos, was removed from his position, because members of his cabinet were involved in illegal shenanigans and corruption. Furthermore, the highest judge, Evangelos Kalousis, was imprisoned because he was found guilty of corruption and immoral behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa hed die kolfbeurt se hoogste punte aangeteken, 70 lopies in slegs 41 balle deur 11 viere en 2 sesse te slaan. Die midde orde kolwers, Sachin Tendulkar en Rahul Dravid het hulself goed gekwyt en ‘n honderdtal lopie vennootskap gevorm. Maar, nadat die kaptein sy kolfbeurt verloor het, het Indië slegs 36 lopies gemaak en 7 paaltjies verloor na die einde van die kolfbeurt toe.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest points in the innings, 70 runs in just 41 balls by 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, played themselves well and formed a century partnership. But, after the captain lost his wicket, India made only 36 runs and lost 7 wickets at the end of the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Commons Administrateur, Adam Cuerden het sy frustrasie uitgespreek oor die weglatings, toe hy laas maand met Wikinews gepraat het. “Hy [Wales] het basies van die begin af vir ons gelieg. Eerstens, deur voor te gee dat hierdie vir wettige redes was. Tweedens, deur voor te gee dat hy na ons luister, tot en met sy kuns vernietiging.” Die gemeenskap se irritasie het gelei tot die huidige pogings om ‘n beleid op te stel aangaande seksuele inhoud vir webwerf wat miljoene openlik-gelisensieerde media huisves.
mt: Commons Administrator, Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions, when he spoke to Wikinews last month. “He [Wales] has basically lied to us from the beginning. First, by claiming that this was for legal reasons. Second, by claiming that he listens to us, up to his art destruction.” The community's irritation led to the current efforts to establish a policy regarding sexual content for a website that houses millions of openly-licensed media.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Commons Administrateur, Adam Cuerden het sy frustrasie uitgespreek oor die weglatings, toe hy laas maand met Wikinews gepraat het. “Hy [Wales] het basies van die begin af vir ons gelieg. Eerstens, deur voor te gee dat hierdie vir wettige redes was. Tweedens, deur voor te gee dat hy na ons luister, tot en met sy kuns vernietiging.” Die gemeenskap se irritasie het gelei tot die huidige pogings om ‘n beleid op te stel aangaande seksuele inhoud vir webwerf wat miljoene openlik-gelisensieerde media huisves.
mt: Commons Administrator, Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions, when he spoke to Wikinews last month. “He [Wales] has basically lied to us from the beginning. First, by claiming that this was for legal reasons. Second, by claiming that he listens to us, up to his art destruction.” The community's irritation led to the current efforts to establish a policy regarding sexual content for a website that houses millions of openly-licensed media.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Nie almal was ondersteunend jeens die insluiting van die vrouerange nie. 2004 Olimpiese silwer medalje wenner Amir Khan het gesê, “Diep binne my dink ek nie vroue moet baklei nie. Dis my opinie.” Ten spyte van sy opmerkings het hy gesê dat hy die Britse kompetisie by die 2012 Olimpiese spele sal ondersteun wat in London gehou sal word.
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan was not supportive of the inclusion of women. “Deep within me I don’t think women should fight. It’s my opinion.” Despite his comments, he said he would support the British competition at the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, ‘n 13-jarige motorfiets jaer, is dood weens hy betrokke was in ‘n botsing by die Indianapolis Motorsnelweg. Terwyl hy besig was om sy opwarmings baan lopie te neem, val Lenz van sy fiets af, en is deur mede jaer, Xavier Zayat, geslaan. Hy is onmiddellik deur die bywonende mediese personeel versorg en na die plaaslike hospitaal vervoer waar hy later oorlede is. Zayat was nie beseer in die ongeluk nie.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lenz was killed after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While he was warming up his practice lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was hit by fellow racer, Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-site medical staff and transported to the local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Om per vliegtuig te reis kan ‘n vreesaanjaende ondervinding vir mense van alle ouderdomme en agtergronde wees, veral as hulle nog nie voorheen gevlieg het nie, of indien hulle voorheen ‘n traumatiese ondervinding gehad het. Dit is nie iets om voor skaam te wees nie: dit is geensins anders as die persoonlike vrese of afkeure van ander dinge wat vele mense het nie. Vir party, om te verstaan hoe iets oor ‘n vliegtuig werk en wat gedurende ‘n vlug gebeur, kan dit dalk help om die vrees te oorwin wat gebaseer is op die onbekende of om nie in beheer te wees nie.
mt: To travel by plane can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, especially if they have not flown before, or if they have had a traumatic experience before. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different than the personal fears or dislikes of other things that many people have. For some, understanding how something works over a plane and what happens during a flight can help overcome the fear based on the unknown or not being in control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Deesdae word lugreise selde direk deur die lugdiens geboek sonder dat daar eers gesoek en na kompeterende pryse gekyk word. Soms kan dieselfde vlug groot prys verskille hê met verskeie invloede end it is die moeite werd om soekresultate te vergelyk en ook om te kyk na die webblad van die lughawe self voor bespreking.
mt: Today, air travel is rarely booked directly with the airline without first searching and comparing competitive prices. Sometimes the same flight can have large price differences with various influences and it is worth the effort to compare search results and also to look at the airport's website itself before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Koeriermaatksappye word goed betaal om dinge vinnig af te lewer. Heel gereeld is tyd baie belangrik as dit kom by besigheidsdokumente, handelsware of vervangingsparte vir 'n dringende herstelwerk. Die groter maatskappye het op sommige roetes hulle eie vliegtuie gehad, maar vir die ander roetes en kleiner firmas was die ‘n probleem. As hulle hierdie goed met lugvrag’ stuur, kan die aflaai en doane op sommige roetes dae lank neem. Die enigste manier om vinniger hierdeur te kom was om dit as baggasie wat nagegaan is te stuur. Lugrederye se regulasies sal hulle nie toelaat om baggasie sonder ‘n passasier te stuur nie, so dit is waar jy inkom.
mt: Courier companies are well paid to deliver things quickly. Very often time is very important when it comes to business documents, merchandise or replacement parts for an urgent repair. The larger companies had their own planes on some routes, but for the other routes and smaller firms this was a problem. If they sent this stuff as air freight, the offload and unload on some routes can take days. The only way to get this done faster was to send it as checked baggage that is inspected. Airlines regulations will not allow them to send checked baggage without a passenger, so this is where you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Jy moet jou Gereelde Vliegpunte lugredery in ‘n alliansie versigtig kies. Alhoewel jy dink dat dit intuïtief is om by die lugredery wat jy die meeste vlieg aan te sluit, moet jy bewus wees dat die voorregte wat aangebied word dikwels anders is en dat gereelde vliegpunte ruimer onder ‘n ander lugredery in dieselfde alliansie mag wees.
mt: You should carefully choose your frequent flyer airline alliance. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly the most, you should be aware that the perks offered are often different and that frequent flyer miles may be broader under another airline in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Drink alkoholiese drankies met matigheid. Alkohol affekteer almal verskillend en dit is belangrik om jou perke te ken. Moontlike langtermyn gesondheidsrisikos van oormatige drankgebruik kan lewerskade, blindheid en selfs sterftes insluit. Die potensiële gevaar neem toe wanneer onwettig vervaardigde alkohol ingeneem word. Onwettige drank kan verskeie gevaarlike onsuiwerhede bevat insluitend metanol, wat blindheid of dood mag veroorsaak tot in klein mates.
mt: Drink alcoholic beverages in moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently and it is important to know your limits. Possible long-term health risks of excessive drinking can include liver damage, blindness and even death. The potential danger increases when illegal alcohol is consumed. Illegal drinks can contain several dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death in small amounts.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Die Kanaal Distrik (Nederlands: Grachtengordel) is die beroemde 17de-eeuse distrik wat die Binnestad van Amsterdam omring. Die hele distrik is ‘n aangewese UNESCO Wêreld-erfenis gebied vir die kulturele en historiese waarde, en die eiendomswaarde is van die hoogstes in die land.
mt: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district that surrounds the Inner City of Amsterdam. The entire district is a designated UNESCO World Heritage site for its cultural and historical value, and the property values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom is 12 km suidwes van Siem Reap. Hierdie heuweltempel is gebou teen die einde van die 9e eeu, tydens die regering van Koning Yasovarman. Die sombere atmosfeer van die tempel en die uitkyk oor Tonle Sap meer maak die klim van die heuwel die moete werd. ‘n Besoek aan die toneel kan heel maklik gekombineer word met ‘n bootrit na die meer. Die Ankor Pas word benodig om die tempel binne te gaan, so moenie vergeet om jou paspoort saam te bring wanneer jy in Tonle Sap se rigting beweeg nie.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap, Phnom Krom is a hill temple built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The somber atmosphere of the temple and the view over Tonle Sap lake make the climb up the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can easily be combined with a boat ride on the lake. The Angkor Pass is required to enter the temple, so don't forget to bring your passport when you head towards Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktika is die koudste plek op aarde, en omring die Suidpool. Toeristebesoeke is duur, vereis fisiese fiksheid en kan slegs plaasvind in Nov-Feb se somer, en is grootliks beperk tot die Skiereiland, Eilande en Ross See. ‘n Paar duisend personeel woon hier in somer in sommige vier dosyn basise meestal in daardie areas; ‘n klein nommer bly deur winter. Binnelandse Antartika is ‘n afgeleë plato wat bedek is deur 2-3 km ys. Sporadiese spesialis lug toere gaan binneland toe vir bergklim of om die Pool te bereik, wat ‘n groot basis het.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourism is expensive, requires physical fitness and can only take place in Nov-Feb summer, and is largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A few thousand personnel live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay through winter. Inland Antarctica is a remote plateau covered in 2-3 km ice. Sporadic specialist air tours go inland for mountain climbing or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Pre-moderne observatoriums is gewoonlik uitgedien deesdae, en bly in gebruik as museums, of onderrigterreine. Soos ligbesoedeling op hul hoogmode dae nie die tipe probleem was wat dit vandag is nie, word hulle nie gewoonlik in stede of in kampusse gevind nie, en is hulle makliker om te bereik as die wat in moderne tye gebou is. Meeste moderne navorsings teleskope is enorme fasiliteite in afgeleë areas met gunstige atmosferiese kondisies.
mt: Pre-modern observatories are usually decommissioned these days, and remain in use as museums, or training grounds. As light pollution was not the type of problem it is today, they are not usually found in cities or on campuses, and are easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Daar is vele strande, vanweë die feit dat Auckland oor twee hawens strek. Die mees gewildes is in drie areas. Noord Kus strande (in Noord Hawe distrik) is teen die Stille Oseaan en strek vanaf Langbaai in die noorde tot in Devonport in die suide. Hulle is bykans almal sanderige strande met veilige swemplekke, en die meeste het skaduplekke wat deur die pohutukawa bome verskaf word. Tamaki Rylaan strande is op die Waitemata Hawe, in die luukse voorstede van Missie Baai en St Heliers in Sentraal Auckland. Daar is soms stampvol familiestrande met ‘n goeie reeks winkels teen die rand van die strand af. Swem is veilig.
mt: There are many beaches, due to the fact that Auckland stretches over two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are mostly sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have sheltered areas provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. There are sometimes crowded family beaches with a good range of shops along the edge of the beach. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Onthou asseblief dat jy eintlik ‘n massa graf besoek, en dat die plek amper onskatbare waarde het vir ‘n groot deel van die wêreld se bevolking. Daar is steeds vele lewende mans en vroue wat hul tyd daar oorleef het, en vele meer wie se geliefdes wat daar vermoor is of hulself doodgewerk het, beide Jode en Nie-jode. Behandel asseblief die terrein met al die waardigheid, plegtigheid en respek wat dit verdien. Moet nie grappies maak oor die Holocaust of Nazi’s nie. Moenie die plek ontsier deur merke of graffiti in die strukture in te krap nie.
mt: Please remember that you are actually visiting a mass grave, and that the place has almost incalculable value for a large portion of the world's population. There are still many living men and women who survived it, and many more whose loved ones were murdered there or who worked themselves to death there, both Jews and non-Jews. Please treat the site with all the dignity, solemnity, and respect that it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the place by carving marks or graffiti into the structures.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Hulptale is kunsmatige of geskepte tale met die doel om kommunikasie te fasiliteer tussen mense wat dit andersins moeilik sou vind om te komminukeer. Hulle is apart van lingua francas, wat natuurlike of organiese tale is wat dominant geword het vir een of ander rede as ‘n manier van kommunikasie tussen sprekers van ander tale.
mt: Help languages are artificial or constructed languages with the purpose of facilitating communication between people who would otherwise find it difficult to communicate. They are distinct from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that have become dominant for one reason or another as a means of communication between speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Wanneer die Noordelike Baltiese streek in die winter oorkruis word, maak seker van die hut se ligging, aangesien dit ‘n groot geraas veroorsaak, vir diegene wat meeste geraak word, om deur die ys te gaan. Saint Petersburg bootritte sluit tyd in die dorp in. Ritpassasiers is vrygestel van visa vereistes (maak seker van die terme).
mt: When the Northern Baltic region is crossed in winter, make sure of the hut's location, as it causes a lot of noise, for those who are most affected, to go through the ice. Saint Petersburg boat rides include time in the village. Ride passengers are exempt from visa requirements (make sure of the terms).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Barcelona se amptelike tale is Katalaans en Spaans. Omtrent die helfte verkies om Katalaans te praat, en die oorgrootte meerderheid verstaan dit, en almal ken basiese Spaans. Hoeokal, is meeste tekens slegs in Katalaans aangedui, omdat dit volgens wet erken word as die eerste offisiële taal. Tog, Spaans word ook wyd gebruik in publieke transport en ander fasiliteite. Gereelde aankondigings in die Metro word net in Katalaans gemaak, maar onbeplande onderbrekings word deur ‘n outomatiese sisteem in ‘n wye verskeidenheid tale aangekondig wat Spaans, Engels, Frans, Arabies en Japanees insluit.
mt: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About half prefer to speak Catalan, and the overwhelming majority understand it, and everyone knows basic Spanish. However, most signs are only in Catalan, because it is recognized by law as the first official language. Nevertheless, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unscheduled interruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: In ontwikkelde lande vandag, word die voorsiening van luukse bed-en-ontbyt tot ‘n tipe kunsvorm verhef. Aan die bo-punt, B&B’s kompeteer natuurlik hoofsaaklik op twee hoofpunte: beddegoed en ontbyt. Gevolglik vind mens die mees luukse beddens by sulke ondernemings, miskien selfs 'n handgemaakte deken of 'n antieke bed. Oggendete mag seisoenale delikatessen van die streek of die gasheer se spesialiteitsdis inhou. Die instelling mag dalk 'n historiese ou gebou wees met antieke meubels, versorgde terrein en 'n swembad.
mt: In developed countries today, the provision of luxury bed-and-breakfast has been elevated to a form of art. At the top, B&B's compete primarily on two points: bedding and breakfast. Consequently, you will find the most luxurious beds at such establishments, perhaps even a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delicacies of the region or the host's specialty dish. The establishment may be a historic old building with antique furniture, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Die stad van Beijing in China sal die gasheerstad van die Olimpiese Winter Spele in 2022 wees, wat dit die eerste stad sal maak om beide somer en winter Olimpiese Spele te huisves. Beijing sal die opening en sluitings seremonies van die binnenshuise ys items aanbied. Ander ski gebeure sal by die Taizicheng ski omgewing in die Zhangjiakou wees, ongeveer 220 km (140 myl) vanaf Beijing.
mt: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both summer and winter Olympic Games. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies of the indoor ice events. Other ski events will be held at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: [] Voëlgriep beter bekend as Avianse griep besmet beide voëls en soogdiere. Minder as 'n duisend gevalle is al in mense gerapporteer, maar party van hulle was al noodlottig. Meeste het mense behels wat met pluimvee werk, maar daar is ook 'n gevaar vir voëlkykers.
mt: Bird flu, better known as Avian flu, infects both birds and mammals. Less than a thousand cases have been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also a risk for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikings het die Russiese waterweë gebruik om na die Swartsee en Kaspiese See te kom. Dele van hierdie roetes kan steeds gebruik word. Kyk na die moontlike behoefte aan spesiale permitte, wat moeilik kan wees om te verkry. Die Wit See–Baltiese Kanaal verbind die Arktiese Oseaan aan die Baltiese See, via die Onega Meer, die Ladoga Meer en Sint Petersburg, veral deur riviere en mere. Die Onega meer is ook verbind aan die Volga, en om dus van die Kaspiese See af deur Rusland te kom is steeds moontlik.
mt: Vikings used the Russian waterways to come to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Look at the possible needs for special permits, which can be difficult to obtain. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via the Onega Lake, the Ladoga Lake and Saint Petersburg, especially through rivers and lakes. The Onega lake is also connected to the Volga, and so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: ‘n Immigrasie kontrolpunt is gewoonlik die eerste stop wanneer jy van ‘n vliegtuig, ‘n skip of and voertuig af kom. In sommige oorgrense treine word inspeksies op lopende treine gehou en jy moet ‘n geldige ID by jou hê wanneer jy aan een van daardie treine aan boord gaan. Op oornag treine, kan paspoorte deur die kondukteur bymekaar gemaak word, sodat jou slaap nie onderbreek word nie.
mt: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when you get off a plane, a ship, or a vehicle. In some cross-border trains, inspections are held on moving trains and you must have a valid ID with you when you board one of those trains. On overnight trains, passports can be collected by the conductor so that your sleep is not interrupted.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapoer is oor die algemeen ‘n baie veilige plek om te wees, en maklik om te navigeer, en jy kan byna enigiets koop na jy aangekom het. Maar om geplaas te word in die “hoë trope” net ‘n paar grade noord van die ewenaar moet jy met beide hitte (altyd) en sterk son (wanneer die lug duideliker is, meer selde).
mt: Singapore is generally a very safe place to be, and easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything once you’ve arrived. But to be placed in the “high tropics” just a few degrees north of the equator you have to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the air is clearer, less often).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Duitse gebak is nogals lekker, en in Bavaria, is hulle nogal ryk en gevarieerd, soortgelyk aan die van hulle suidelike bure, Oostenryk. Vrugtepasteie is algemeen, met appels wat regdeur die jaar in pasteie gebak word, en kersies en pruime wat tydens somermaande hul verskyning maak. Vele Duitse gebakte goedere bevat ook amandels, haselneute, en ander boom neute. Gewilde koeke word dikwels goed gepaar met ‘n koppie sterk koffie. Indien jy klein maar ryk deegbeslae wil hê, probeer wat afhang van in watter streek jy is, die Berliner, Pfannkuchen of Krapfen genoem word.
mt: German baked goods are quite tasty, and in Bavaria, they are quite rich and varied, much like their southern neighbors, Austria. Fruit tarts are common, with apples baked into tarts year-round, and cherries and plums making their appearance during the summer months. Many German baked goods also contain almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Favorite cakes are often well paired with a cup of strong coffee. If you want small but rich doughy treats, try what is called the Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen depending on which region you are in.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: As jy die wêreld goedkoop wil sien, vir nood, leefstyl of uitdaging, is daar ‘n paar maniere om dit te doen. Basies, val hulle in twee kategorieë: Of jy werk terwyl jy reis of jy probeer jou uitgawes laag hou. Hierdie artikel is gebaseer op die latere. Vir die wat gewillig is om gemak, tyd en voorspelbaarheid prys te gee om kostes naby aan niks te kry, sien die minimum begroting reise. Die advies neem aan dat reisigers nie steel, oortree, deelneem aan die onwettige mark, bedel, of andersins ander mense uitbuit tot hulle eie voordeel nie.
mt: If you want to see the world cheaply, for need, lifestyle or challenge, there are a few ways to do it. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either you work while you travel or you try to keep your expenses low. This article is based on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability for costs near nothing, see the budget travel tips. The advice assumes travelers do not steal, break the law, beg, or otherwise exploit others to their own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Die stuk tussen Point Marion en Fairmont gee die mees uitdagende bestuurskondisies op die Buffalo-Pittsburgh Hoofweg, waar dit gereeld in verlate binnelandse terrein gaan. As u nie gewoond is om op landelike paaie te ry nie, hou u afstand: steil grade, smal bane, en skerp kurwes oorheers. Snelheidsbeperkings is opvallend laer as in vorige en daaropvolgende afdelings – gewoonlik35-40mph (56-64 km/h) - en streng gehoorsaamheid daaraan is selfs belangriker as andersins. Vreemd genoeg, is die selfoondiens hier beter as baie ander dele van die roete, bv. die Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont offers the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, where it frequently goes through rural terrain. If you are not used to driving on rural roads, keep your distance: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections – usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) - and strict adherence to them is even more important than otherwise. Oddly enough, cell service is better here than in many other parts of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. src: Kloofing handel om in die onderkant van ‘n kloof in te gaan, wat droog of vol water is. Klooftoer kombineer elemente van swem, klim en spring -- maar vereis relatief min opleiding of fisiese fiksheid om te begin (byvoorbeeld, soos in vergelyking met rotsklim, skubaduik of ski in die Alpe).
mt: Canyoning involves going into the bottom of a canyon, which may be dry or full of water. Canyoneering combines elements of swimming, climbing and jumping -- but requires relatively little training or physical fitness to get started (for example, compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or skiing in the Alps).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "Om in jou eie kar te klim en op ‘n lang padreis te vertrek het intrinsieke aanloklikheid in die eenvoud daarvan. In teenstelling met groter voertuie, staan u dalk reeds bekend met u voertuig bestuur en sy beperkings. Om ‘n tent op privaat eiendom of in ‘n dorp van enige grootte op te slaan kan maklik ongewenste aandrag trek. Kortliks is die gebruik van jou kar die beste manier om 'n padrit te ondergaan, maar is selde opsigself 'n manier om te ""kamp"". Motor kampering is moontlik as jy ‘n groot minibus, ‘n SUV, ‘n sedan of ‘n stasiewa het met sitplekke wat kan afslaan."
mt: "Getting in your own car and embarking on a long road trip has intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. In contrast to larger vehicles, you may already be familiar with your vehicle's driving and its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, the use of your car is the best way to undergo a road trip, but is rarely itself a way to ""camp"". Motor camping is possible if you have a large minibus, an SUV, a sedan or a station wagon with seats that can fold down."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Die moderne stad van Casablanca, is gestig deur Berber vissermanne in die 10de eeu vC en is gebruik deur die Fenisiërs, Romeine en die Merenids as ‘n stategiese hawe wat Anfa genoem is. Die Portugese het dit vernietig en herbou onder die naam Casa Branca, net om dit weer te verlaat na die aardbewing in 1755. Die Marokkaanse sultan het die stad herbou as Daru I-Badya en dit was die naam Casablanca gegee deur Spaanse handelaars wat handelsbasisse daar gevestig het. Casablanca is een van die minder interessante winkels om inkopies te doen in die hele Marokko. Om die ou Medina is dit maklik om plekke te vind wat tradisionele Morrokkaanse goedere, soos Marokkaanse kookpotte, pottebakkery, leergoedere, hookahs en ‘n hele spektrum van oortollighede, maar dis als vir die toeriste.
mt: The modern city of Casablanca, was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BC and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after the earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan Sultan rebuilt the city as Daru I-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the less interesting shops to do shopping in the whole of Morocco. Around the old Medina it is easy to find places to buy traditional Moroccan goods, such as Moroccan cooking pots, pottery, leather goods, hookahs and a whole spectrum of trinkets, but it is also for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Na die noorde en maklik toeganklik is die romantiese en fassinerende dorpie Sintra, wat die meeste roem verwerf het na ‘n gloeiende verhaal van die plek se prag soos opgeskryf deur Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 reis gereeld na Sinatra en stop by Cabo da Roca. Asook na die noorde besoek die wonderlike Sanctuary of our Lady of Fatima (Heiligdom), ‘n plek van wêreldwye beroemde Marian verskynings.
mt: To the north and easily accessible is the romantic and fascinating village of Sintra, which has gained the most fame for its glowing story of the place’s beauty as written by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra and stops at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the wonderful Sanctuary of our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: In 1994, het die etniese Armeense Nagorno-Karabakh streek van Azerbaijan oorlog gevoer teen die Aseris. Met Armeense ondersteuning is ‘n nuwe republiek gestig. Nietemin erken geen gevestigde nasie, nie eens Armenië, hierdie land nie. Diplomatiese argumente oor die streek gaan voort om verhoudinge tussen Armenië en Azerbaijan te bederf.
mt: 1994, the ethnic Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan fought a war against the Azeris. With Armenian support, a new republic was established. Nonetheless, no established nation, not even Armenia, recognizes this country. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to spoil relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Een van Charlotte, Noord Carolina se sterkpunte, is dat dit ‘n oorvloed van hoë kwaliteits opsies vir families het. Inwoners van ander areas benoem dikwels familie-vriendelikheid as ‘n hoofrede om daarheen te trek, en besoekers vind dit maklik om die stad met kinders om hulle te geniet. Die afgelope 20 jaar het die aantal kinder-vriendelike opsies eksponensieël in die noordelike voorstad van Charlotte vermeerder. Huurmotors word nie oor die algemeen deur families in Charlotte gebruik nie, al kan hulle van nut wees onder sekere omstandighede. Daar is ‘n toeslag wat gehef word daarop om meer as 2 passasiers te wees, so hierdie opsie mag dalk meer duur as nodig wees.
mt: One of Charlotte, North Carolina's strengths is that it has a plethora of high-quality options for families. Residents of other areas often cite family-friendliness as a main reason to move there, and visitors find it easy to enjoy the city with kids around. The past 20 years have seen the number of kid-friendly options exponentially increase in the northern suburb of Charlotte. Rental cars are not generally used by families in Charlotte, although they can be useful under certain circumstances. There is a surcharge that is added on top to have more than 2 passengers, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.
