src: Voor die Spaanse in die 16e eeu aangekom het, was noordelike Chile onder Inka oorheersing, terwyl die inheemse Araucaniërs (Mapuche) sentraal en suid-Chile bewoon het. Die Mapuche was ook een van die laaste onafhanklike Amerikaanse inheemse groepe, wat nie ten volle onder die Spaans-sprekende heerskappy geabsorbeer is tot na Chile se onhafhanklikheid nie. Alhoewel Chili onafhanklikheid verklaar het in 1810 (te midde van die Napoleoniese Oorloe wat Spanje sonder ‘n funksionerende sentrale regering gelos het vir ‘n paar jaar), beslissende oorwinning oor die Spaans was nie tot 1818 bereik nie.
mt: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule, while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, who were not fully absorbed into the Spanish-speaking hegemony until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (in the midst of the Napoleonic Wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a few years), the decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, wat Vyf Lande beteken, bestaan uit die vyf klein kusdorpies van Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza en Monterosso wat in die Italiaanse streek van Liguria geleë is. Hulle verskyn op die UNESCO Wêrelderfenislys. Oor die eeue het mense versigtig gebou aan terrasse op die ruwe, steil landskap reg tot op die afgronde wat oor die see uitkyk. Deel van die bekoring is die gebrek aan visiele korporatiewe ontwikkeling. Paaie, treine en bote verbind die dorpies en motors kan nie hul bereik van buite af nie.
mt: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, consists of the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso, located in the Italian region of Liguria. They appear on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have built carefully on terraces in the rough, steep landscape right up to the cliffs overlooking the sea. Part of the charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Roads, trains and boats connect the villages and cars cannot reach them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Die mees algemene oorsaak van ongelukke in die winter is gladde paaie, sypaadjies en veral trappe. Jy benodig skoene met gepaste sole, ten minimum. Somerskoene is gewoonlik baie glipperig op ys en sneeu, en party winterstewels is selfs onvanpas. Die patroon behoort diep genoeg te wees, ongeveer 5 mm (1/5 duim) of meer, en die material sag genoeg in koue temperature. Sommige stewels het kliknaels en daar is byvoegbare toerusting vir gladde toestande, gepas vir die meeste skoene en stewels, vir die hakke of die hakke en sole. Hakke moet laag en breed gedra word. Sand, gruis, of sout (calcium chloried) word gereeld gestrooi oor paaie of paadjies om traksie te verbeter.
mt: The most common cause of accidents in the winter is slippery roads, sidewalks and especially stairs. You need shoes with appropriate soles, at least. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, and some winter boots are even inappropriate. The tread should be deep enough, about 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have cleats and there is add-on traction for slippery conditions, fitted for most shoes and boots, for the heels or the heels and soles. Heels should be low and wide worn.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Die Cook Eilande is 'n eiland land in vrye assosiasie met Nieu-Seeland, gevind in Polinesië, in die middel van die Suid-Pasifiese Oseaan. Dit is ‘n argipel met 15 eilande, versprei oor 2.2 miljoen km2 van die see Met dieselfde tydsone as Hawaii, word die eilande soms aan gedink as “Hawaii down under” Alhoewel kleiner, herinner dit sommige ouer besoekers aan Hawaii voor die staatwording sonder al die groot toeriste hotelle en ander ontwikkeling. Die Cook Eilande het nie enige stede nie, maar is saamgestel uit 15 verskillende eilande. Die hoofeilande is Rarotonge en Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands are a country in free association with New Zealand, found in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands, spread over 2.2 million km2 of the sea With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as “Hawaii down under” Although smaller, some older visitors are reminded of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands have no cities, but are composed of 15 different islands. The main islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Die Cook Eilande is 'n eiland land in vrye assosiasie met Nieu-Seeland, gevind in Polinesië, in die middel van die Suid-Pasifiese Oseaan. Dit is ‘n argipel met 15 eilande, versprei oor 2.2 miljoen km2 van die see Met dieselfde tydsone as Hawaii, word die eilande soms aan gedink as “Hawaii down under” Alhoewel kleiner, herinner dit sommige ouer besoekers aan Hawaii voor die staatwording sonder al die groot toeriste hotelle en ander ontwikkeling. Die Cook Eilande het nie enige stede nie, maar is saamgestel uit 15 verskillende eilande. Die hoofeilande is Rarotonge en Aitutaki.
mt: The Cook Islands are a country in free association with New Zealand, found in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands, spread over 2.2 million km2 of the sea With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as “Hawaii down under” Although smaller, some older visitors are reminded of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands have no cities, but are composed of 15 different islands. The main islands are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Permitte moet vooruit gereserveer word. Jy moet 'n permit hê om te oornag in Sirena. Sirena is die enigste parkbewaardersstasie wat slaapsaal-behuising en warm etes aanbied tesame met kampering. La Leona, San Pedrillo en Los Patos bied slegs kampering met geen kosdienste aan. Dit is moontlik om parkeringspermitte direk van die Parkbewaarder se Stasie in Puerto Jiménez te kry, maar hulle aanvaar nie kredietkaarte nie. Die Park Dienste (MINAE) reik nie park permitte meer as een maand voor verwagte aankoms uit nie. CafeNet El Sol bied ‘n besprekingsdiens aan vir ‘n fooi van US$30, of $10 vir een-dag passe; besonderhede op hulle Corcovado blad.
mt: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to overnight in Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers sleeping hall lodging and hot meals along with camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos only offer camping with no food services. It is possible to get parking permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards. The Park Services (MINAE) no longer issues park permits more than one month before expected arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a consultation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado leaflet.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Ski toere: Hierdie aktiwiteit kan ook binnelandse ski, ski toer of ski stap genoem word. Dit is verwant daaraan, maar sluit nie alpynse skistyl toere of bergklim in nie, die laasgenoemdes wat gedoen word op steil terrein en wat stywer skis en stewels vereis. Dink aan ‘n ski-roete as soortgelyk aan ‘n stap roete. In goeie toestande sal u ietwat groter afstande bedek as met stap – maar slegs baie selde sal u die spoed van deurland ski bereik sonder ‘n swaar rugsak in netjiese spore.
mt: Ski tours: This activity can also be called a domestic ski, ski tour or ski hike. It is related to, but does not include alpine ski touring or mountaineering, the latter which is done on steep terrain and requires stiffer skis and boots. Think of a ski route as similar to a hiking route. In good conditions you will cover somewhat greater distances than with hiking – but only very rarely will you reach the speed of cross-country skiing without a heavy backpack in well-groomed tracks.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Hertoetrede skok kom vroeër aan as kultuurskok (daar is minder van ‘n wittebroodsfase), duur langer, en kan meer ernstig wees. Reisigers wat maklik by die nuwe kultuur aangepas het, vind dit moeilik om weer by hul inheemse kultuur aan te pas. Wanneer jy terugkeer nadat jy oorsee gebly het, het jy al by die nuwe kultuur aangepas en party van jou gewoontes van jou tuiskultuur verloor. Toe jy eers oorsee gaan, was mense seker geduldig en snap, wetende dat reisigers in ‘n nuwe land moet aanpas. Mense mag nie verwag dat geduld en ‘n verstandhouding ook baie nodig is vir reisigers wat huistoe keer nie.
mt: 1. Culture shock comes earlier than culture shock (there is less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more serious. Travelers who easily adapted to the new culture find it difficult to adapt back to their native culture. When you return after having lived abroad, you have already adapted to the new culture and have lost some of your customs from your home culture. When you first go abroad, people are sure to be patient and understanding, knowing that travelers in a new land must adapt. People should not expect that patience and understanding are also very necessary for travelers who return home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Die Amerikaanse eland (ook bekend as die Europese eland) is nie inheems aggressief nie, maar sal hulself beskerm indien hulle ‘n gevaar bemerk. Wanneer mense nie die elk as 'n potensieël gevaarlike dier sien nie, mag hulle te naby daaraan kom en hulself in gevaar stel.
mt: The American elk (also known as the European elk) is not naturally aggressive, but will defend itself if it perceives a threat. When people do not see the elk as a potentially dangerous animal, they may come too close and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: In die hitte van die dag kan reisigers lugspieëlings verwag wat die illusie van water (of ander dinge) skep. Hierdies kan gevaarlik wees as ‘n reisiger die lugspieëling navolg, en kosbare energie en oorblywende water mors. Selfs die warmste woestyne kan bitter koud word in die nag. Hipotermie is ‘n groot risiko sonder warm klere.
mt: In the heat of the day, travelers can expect mirages that create the illusion of water (or other things). This can be dangerous if a traveler follows the mirage, and wastes valuable energy and remaining water. Even the hottest deserts can get bitterly cold at night. Hypothermia is a big risk without warm clothes.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Die Dominikaanse Republiek (Spaans: República Dominicana) is ‘n Karribiese land wat die oostelike helfte van die eiland van Hispaniola beslaan, wat dit deel met Haiti. Buiten wit sand strande en berg landskappe is die land die tuiste van die oudste Europese stad in die Amerikas, wat nou deel is van Santo Domingo. Die eiland was eers deur die Taínos en Caribes bewoon. Die Caribes was Arawakan-sprekende mense wat ongeveer 10 000 v. C. aangekom het. Die populasie van Tainos is aansienlik verminder deur die Spaanse veroweraars, na sleg ‘n paar jaar na die aankoms van Europese verkenners. Gebaseer op Fray Bartolomé delas Casa (Tratado de las Indias) tussen 1492 en 1498 het die Spaanse oorwinnaars ongveer 100,000 Taínos doodgemaak.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean nation that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, sharing it with Haiti. Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, which is now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribs. The Caribs were Arawakan-speaking people who arrived around 10,000 BC. The population of Tainos was significantly reduced by the Spanish conquerors, after only a few years after the arrival of European explorers. Based on Fray Bartolomé delas Casa (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498, the Spanish conquerors killed about 100,000 Taínos.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Afwaartse heuwelsneeusporte, wat ski en sneeubord insluit, is populêre sporte wat behels dat 'n mens by 'n sneeu-bedekte terrein afgly met skis of 'n sneeubord aan jou voete vasgemaak is. Ski is 'n groot reisaktiwiteit met baie entoesiaste, per geleentheid bekend as ""ski boemelaars"" wat hele vakansies beplan om die ski by 'n besondere plek. Die idee van ski is baie oud — grotsskilderye van tot so ver terug as 5 000 v. C. beeld skieërs uit! Afdraende ski as ‘n sport gaan terug na ten minste die 17de eeu, en in 1861 is die eerste ontspanning ski klub oopgemaak deur Noorweërs in Australië."
mt: "Downhill skiing, which includes skiing and snowboarding, is a popular sport that involves gliding down a snow-covered slope with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major recreational activity with many enthusiasts, known as "ski bums," who plan entire vacations around skiing at a particular place. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings of skis date back as far as 5,000 B.C. Downhill skiing as a sport goes back at least to the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Die Oos-Afrika Eilande is in die Indiese Oseaan naby die ooskus van Afrika. Wanner dit by wild kom, is Madagascar by verre die grootste en’n kontinent op sy eie. Meeste van die kleiner eilande is onafhanklike nasies, of is geassosieer met Frankryk, en is geken as luukse strand oorde. Die Arabiere het ook Islam na die lande gebring, en dit het in die Comoros en Mayotte sterk posgevat. Europese invloed en kolonialisme het in die 15e eeu begin, soos die verkenner, Vasco da Gama die Kaapse roete van Europa na Indië gevind het.
mt: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean near the east coast of Africa. When it comes to wild, Madagascar is by far the largest and a continent on its own. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or are associated with France, and are known as luxury beach resorts. Arab influence and Islam have also been brought to the lands, and it has taken strong hold in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as the explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Daar is 'n tradisie daarvan om Paasnag te deurnag by die een of ander ontblote punt om die sonsopkoms te sien. Daar is natuurlik Christelike teologiese verduidelikings vir hierdie tradisie, maar dit is heel moontlik ‘n voor-Christelike Lente- en Vrugbaarheidsritueel. Meer tradisionele kerke hou meermale 'n Paasfees Deurnag op Saterdagaand tydens die Paas naweek, met die gemeentes wat gereeld in vieringe uitbreek met middernag om Christus se opstanding te vier.
mt: There is a tradition of staying up all night on Easter morning to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it is very likely a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking out into singing at midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ecuador vereis dat Kubaanse burgers ‘n uitnodigingsbrief kry voordat hulle Ecuador deur internasionale lughawens of grens toelatingspunte binnegaan. Hierdie brief moet deur die Ekuadoriaanse Ministerie van Buitelandse Sake gewettig word, en met sekere vereistes ooreenstem. Hierdie vereistes is ontwerp om georganiseerde beweging en vloei tussen beide lande te voorsien. Kubaanse burgers wat ook VS groen kaart houers is moet die Ecuardoriaanse Konsulaat besoek om ‘n uitsluiting vir hierdie vereiste te kry. Jou paspoort moet vir ten minste 6 maande na jou reisdatums geldig wees. ‘n Retoer/verdere rit kaartjie is nodig om die lengte van jou verblyf te bewys.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain an invitation letter before they enter Ecuador through international airports or border entry points. This letter must be approved by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and meet certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide organized movement and flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who also hold US green card holders must visit the Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption for this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after your travel dates. A return/extended stay ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Ecuador vereis dat Kubaanse burgers ‘n uitnodigingsbrief kry voordat hulle Ecuador deur internasionale lughawens of grens toelatingspunte binnegaan. Hierdie brief moet deur die Ekuadoriaanse Ministerie van Buitelandse Sake gewettig word, en met sekere vereistes ooreenstem. Hierdie vereistes is ontwerp om georganiseerde beweging en vloei tussen beide lande te voorsien. Kubaanse burgers wat ook VS groen kaart houers is moet die Ecuardoriaanse Konsulaat besoek om ‘n uitsluiting vir hierdie vereiste te kry. Jou paspoort moet vir ten minste 6 maande na jou reisdatums geldig wees. ‘n Retoer/verdere rit kaartjie is nodig om die lengte van jou verblyf te bewys.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain an invitation letter before they enter Ecuador through international airports or border entry points. This letter must be approved by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and meet certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide organized movement and flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who also hold US green card holders must visit the Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption for this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months after your travel dates. A return/extended stay ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Enkel-lensbrille kan goedkoper wees in die buiteland, veral in lae-inkomste lande waar arbeidskostes laer is. Besin daaroor om ‘n oogtoets by die huis te kry, veral as versekering dit dek, en bring die voorskrif om elders aangevul te word. Duursame handelsnaam rame wat beskikbaar is in sulke areas mag twee probleme hê; party mag vervalsings wees, en die regte ingevoerdes mag duurder wees as tuis.
mt: Single-lens glasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries where labor costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bring the prescription to fill elsewhere. Long-lasting brand names available in such areas may have two problems; some may be fakes, and the right imported ones may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Die offisiele Falkland geldeenheid is die Falkland pond (FKP) waarvan die waarde gelykstaande is aan een Britse pond (GBP). Geld kan geruil word by die enigste bank op die eilande wat geleë is in Stanley oorkand die FIC West winkel. Britse ponde sal algemeen orals aanvaar word in die eilande en binne word Stanley krediet kaarte en Verenigde Staat dollars ook gereeld aanvaar. In die afgeleë eilande sal kredietkaarte heel moontlik nie aanvaar word nie, al sal Britse en Verenigde State se geldeenhede geneem word; vra die eienaars vooruit om vas te stel wat die aanvaarde betalingsmetode sou wees. Dit is byna onmoontlik om Falkland geldeenheid buite die eilande te verwissel, so ruil geld uit voor jy die eilande verlaat.
mt: The official currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is equivalent to one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank on the islands, located in Stanley over the Falkland Islands Company West shop. British pounds will be generally accepted throughout the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also commonly accepted. In the remote islands credit cards will most likely not be accepted, but British and United States currency will be accepted; ask the owners beforehand to establish what the accepted payment methods would be. It is almost impossible to exchange Falkland currency outside the islands, so exchange money before you leave the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Meeste van die tempels het ‘n Jaarlikse fees wat begin einde November tot die Middel Mei, wat afwissel afhangende van elke tempel se jaarlikse kalender. Meeste van die tempel-feeste word gevier as deel van die tempel se herdenking of die presiderende godheid se verjaarsdag of enige ander groot gebeurtenis wat geassosieer word met die tempel. Kerala se tempelfeeste is baie interessant om te sien, met gereëlde optogte van versierde olifante, tempel orkeste en ander feestelikhede.
mt: Most of the temples have an annual festival that begins in late November to the Middle May, which alternates depending on each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's anniversary or the presiding deity's birthday or any other major event that is associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with parades of decorated elephants, temple orchestras and other festive events.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Die voor die hand liggende manier om eerste klas te vlieg is om n groot klomp geld te betaal vir die voorreg (of beter nog – jou maatskappy kry om dit vir jou te doen). Derhalwe is dit egter nie goedkoop nie: as 'n rowwe reël, kan u verwag dat u tot vier keer die normale tarief vir die ekonomie en elf keer vir die eerste klas moet betaal! Oor die algemeen is daar nie ‘n punt daarin om selfs te kyk vir afslae vir besigheids- of eersteklas-sitplekke op direkte vlugte van A na B nie. Lugrederye weet goed dat daar ‘n sekere kern groep passasiers is wat bereid is om top dollar te betaal vir die voorreg om vinnig en in gemak by ‘n bestemming te kom, en hul rekening is dienooreenkomstig.
mt: 1. The obvious way to fly first class is to pay a lot of money for the privilege (or better yet – your company gets to do it for you). As a rough rule, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal fare for economy and eleven times for first class! In general, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of passengers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting to a destination quickly and in comfort, and their account is accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Lughawens soos Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines het hul dienste op groot skaal uitgebrei na Afrika, en bied aansluitingsvlugte na baie groot Afrika stede teen meer mededingende tariewe as ander Europese lugrederye. Die Turkse Lugredery vlieg na 39 bestemmings in 30 Afrika lande van 2014 af. As jy addisionele reistyd het, kyk om te sien hoe jou totale kwotasie na Afrika vergelyk met ‘n om-die wêreld kwotasie. Moenie vergeet om die ekstra koste van addisionele visas, lughawe belasting, grond vervoer, ens. vir al daardie plekke buite Afrika by te voeg nie.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have expanded their services to Africa on a large scale, and offer connecting flights to many major African cities at more competitive rates than other European airlines. The Turkish airline flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries from 2014 onwards. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total cost to Africa compares to a round-the-world cost. Don't forget to add the additional costs of additional visas, airport taxes, ground transport, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Die aankoop van kos in supermarkte is gewoonlik die goedkoopste manier om voeding te verkry. Sonder kookgeleenthede, is keuses oor reeds-gemaakte kos beperk. Supermarkte kry toenemend 'n groter verskeidenheid klaargemaakte kosse. Party bied selfs 'n mikrogolfoond of ander maniere om kos te verhit. In party lande of tipes winkels is daar ten minste een restaurant op die perseel, baiemaal eerder ‘n informele een met bekostigbare pryse.
mt: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get nutrition. Without cooking time, choices are limited to ready-made foods. Supermarkets are increasingly offering a wider variety of prepared foods. Some even offer a microwave oven or other ways to heat food. In some countries or types of stores, there is at least one restaurant on the premises, even an informal one with affordable prices.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Die variëteite Fraans wat in Belgie en Switserland gepraat word verskil effens van die Fraans wat in Frankryk gepraat word, alhoewel hulle soortgelyk genoeg is om wedersyds verstaanbaar te wees. In besonder, die numeriese sisteem in Frans-sprekende België en Switzerland het sommige effense eienaardighede wat anders is as die Frans wat in Frankryk gepraat word, en die uitspraak van sommige woorde is effens anders. Nogtans sou alle Frans-sprekende Belge en Switsers standaard Frans op skool geleer het, so hulle sou jou verstaan selfs as jy die standaard Franse numeringstelsel gebruik het.
mt: The varieties of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, although they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numerical system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some quirky differences from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would understand you even if you used the standard French numerical system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Slegs ‘n paar lugrederye bied nog verlies tariewe, wat die laas-minuut kostes van ‘n begrafnis effens goedkoper maak. Lugrederye bied hierdie insluitend Air Kanada, Delta Lugredery, Lufthansa vir vlugte wat uit die V.S. of Kanada kom, en WestJet. In alle gevalle moet jy jou bespreking per telefoon regstreeks met die lugredery maak.
mt: Only a few airlines still offer loss fares, which include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In any case, you must make your reservation by phone directly with the airline.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Die gebruik van ‘n GPS navigasie toepe op jou slimfoon kan die maklikste en mees gerieflike manier wees om te navigeer wanneer jy uit jou tuisland is. Dit kan geld spaar eerder as om nuwe kaarte vir ‘n GPS te koop, of ‘n alleenstaande GPS of om een te huur van ‘n motorverhuringsmaatskappy. As jy nie ‘n data konneksie vir jou foon het nie, of as dit buite opvangs is, kan dit werking benadeel of onbeskikbaar maak.
mt: Using a GPS navigation app on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when you are out of your home country. It can save money instead of buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or if it is out of range, it can be impaired or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Die beste manier om die tonele en wildlewe van die Galapagos te besigtig, is ter boot, nes Charles Darwin dit in 1835 gedoen het. Meer as 60 passasierskepe deurseil die Galapagos waters – en wissel in groote van 8 tot 100 passasiers. Meeste mense bespreek hul plekke vooruit (as ‘n boot en soos gewoonlik vol tydens die hoogty.) Maak seker dat die agent waardeur jy die bespreking doen ‘n Galapagos-spesialis is met ‘n goeie kennis van ‘n wye verskeidenheid van skepe. Dit sal verseker dat jou bepaalde belangstellings en/of beperkinge gepas word by die skip mees versoenbaar daarmee.
mt: The best way to see the sights and wildlife of the Galapagos is by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. More than 60 passenger ships cruise the Galapagos waters—and range in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their trips in advance (as is usually the case during the high season.) Make sure that the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or limitations are matched with the ship most suitable for you.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Casinos doen gewoonlik baie moeite om ty den geld wat deur gaste spandeer is te maksimeer. Vensters en klokke is gewoonlik afwesig, en uitgange mag moeilik wees om te vind. Om by hul uitgangspunt te hou asook om gaste in ‘n goeie gemoedsstemming te hou het hul gewoonlik spesiale aanbiedings op kos, drank en vermaak. Sommige plekke bied gratis alkoholiese drankies aan. Dronkenskap beïnvloed egter jou oordeel, en alle goeie dobbelaars besef die belangrikheid daarvan om nugter te bly.
mt: Casinos usually go to great lengths to maximize the amount of money that is spent by their guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits may be difficult to find. To keep their guests in a good mood as well as to keep their guests in a good mood have usually special offers on food, drink and entertainment. Some places offer free alcoholic drinks. However, intoxication affects your judgment, and all good gamblers realize the importance of staying sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Casinos doen gewoonlik baie moeite om ty den geld wat deur gaste spandeer is te maksimeer. Vensters en klokke is gewoonlik afwesig, en uitgange mag moeilik wees om te vind. Om by hul uitgangspunt te hou asook om gaste in ‘n goeie gemoedsstemming te hou het hul gewoonlik spesiale aanbiedings op kos, drank en vermaak. Sommige plekke bied gratis alkoholiese drankies aan. Dronkenskap beïnvloed egter jou oordeel, en alle goeie dobbelaars besef die belangrikheid daarvan om nugter te bly.
mt: Casinos usually go to great lengths to maximize the amount of money that is spent by their guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits may be difficult to find. To keep their guests in a good mood as well as to keep their guests in a good mood have usually special offers on food, drink and entertainment. Some places offer free alcoholic drinks. However, intoxication affects your judgment, and all good gamblers realize the importance of staying sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Alle selfstandige naamwoorde, so ook die woord Sie vir ‘jy’, begin altyd met ‘n hoofletter, selfs in die middel van ‘n sin. Dit is 'n belangrike manier om te onderskei tussen sommige werkwoorde en voorwerpe. Dit maak lees waarskynlik makliker, al word skryf ietwat gekompliseerd deur die behoefte om uit te vind of ‘n werkwoord of ‘n byvoeglike naamwoord in ‘n verbuigde vorm gebruik word.
mt: All proper nouns, including the word Sie for "you", always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and nouns. It makes reading probably easier, although writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or an adjective in a conjugated form is used.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: In vele dele van die wêreld is waai ‘n vriendelike gebaar wat “hallo” beteken. Hoe dit okal se, in Maleisië, ten minste onder die Maleiers in landelike gebiede, beteken dit “kom kuier,” soortgelyk aan die indeksvinger wat in sekere Westerse lande gebruik word, en behoort slegs vir daardie doel gebruik te word. Eweneens, kan ‘n Britse reisiger in Spanje ‘n totsiens groet, met die hand palm na die waaier (eerder as na die person wat gegroet word), sien as ‘n teken om terug te kom.
mt: In many parts of the world, a wave is a friendly gesture that means “hello.” How it’s done, at least among the Malays in rural areas of Malaysia, means “come visit,” similar to the index finger that is used in certain Western countries, and should only be used for that purpose. Likewise, a British traveler in Spain may see a farewell greeting, with the palm of the hand toward the waver (rather than toward the person being greeted), as a sign to come back.
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Die gletsers is nie stabiel nie, maar vloei by die berg af. Dit sal krake en klowe vorm wat deur sneeubruë verskuil mag wees. Die mure en dakke van ysgrotte kan inmekaarval en skeure kan toegaan. Aan die rante van gletsers breek groot blokke af, val hulle af en dalk spring en rol hulle verder van die rant af.
mt: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. It will form cracks and crevasses that may be hidden by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can go through. At the edges of glaciers large blocks break off, fall off and may bounce and roll further from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma is 'n toeristestad van die Demokratiese Republiek van die Kongo in die verre-ooste naby Rwanda. In 2002 was Goma vernietig deur lava van die Nyiragongo volkaan wat die meeste van die dorp se strate begrawe het, veral die middestad. Terwyl Goma redelik veilig is, behoort enige besoek buite Goma nagevors te word om die staat van gevegte in die Noordelike Kivu provinsie voortduur te verstaan. Die stad is ook die wegspringplek om die Nyiragongo-vulkaan te bestyg, saam met die goedkoopste berg-gorilla-spore in Afrika. U kan boda-boda (motorfietstaxi) gebruik om Goma te verken. Die normale (plaaslike) prys is ~ 500 Kongolese Frank vir die kort rit.
mt: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of the Congo in the far east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town's streets, especially the downtown area. While Goma is relatively safe, any visit outside Goma should be researched to understand the state of ongoing fighting in the Northern Kivu province. The city is also the starting point to climb the Nyiragongo volcano, along with the cheapest gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to explore Goma. The normal (local) price is ~ 500 Congolese francs for the short ride.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Enige kampeering onder die rand van die Grand Canyon, benodig ń permit. Permitte is beperk om die kloof te beskerm, en is beskikbaar op die 1ste van die maand, vier maande voor die aanvangsmaand. Dus kan ‘n binnelandse permit vir enige begindatum in Mei beskikbaar word op die 1ste Jan. Spasie vir die mees populêre areas, soos die Helder Engel Kampgronde langsaan die Phantom Plaas, vul oor die algemeen op deur die versoeke ontvang op die eerste dag dat hulle oopgestel word vir besprekings. Daar is ‘n beperkte hoeveelheid permitte vir inloop gaste gereserveer wat op ‘n eerste kom eerste bedien basis beskikbaar sal wees.
mt: Any camping under the rim of the Grand Canyon requires a permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and are available on the first of the month, four months before the start month. So an interior permit for any start date in May can be available on the first of January. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campgrounds near Phantom Ranch, fills up generally by the requests received on the first day that they are opened for discussions. There is a limited number of permits reserved for walk-in guests that will be available on a first come first serve basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Party hotelle het ‘n erfenis uit die goue eeu van stoom, spoorlyne en passasierskepe; voor die Tweede Wêreldoorlog, in die 19e en vroeë 20e eeue. Daardie hotelle was waar die rykes en bekendes van die dag sou bly, en gereeld puik etes en die naglewe gehad het. Die outydse toebehore, die gebrek aan die nuutste geruwe en ‘n tipe grasieuse veroudering is ook deel van hul karakter. Alhoewel hulle normaalweg privaat besit word, akkommodeer hulle soms besoekende staathowe en en ander hooggeplaastes. n Reisiger met hope geld kan ‘n vlug rondom die wêreld oorweeg, met onderbrekings om in vele van hierdie hotele te bly.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy from the golden age of steam, railways and passenger ships; before the Second World War, in the 19th and early 20th centuries. Those hotels were where the rich and famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old-fashioned trappings, the lack of the latest conveniences and a kind of graceful aging are also part of their character. Although they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting state houses and other high-placed guests. A traveler with plenty of money can consider a flight around the world with stops to stay in many of these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Danksy ondersee se veseloptiese kabelskakels na Europa en breëband satellite, is Groenland goed verbind met 93% van die bevolking wat toegang het tot die internet. Jou hotel of gashere (indien in ‘n gastehuis of privaat woning gebly word) sal waarskynlik wifi of ‘n PR hê wat aan die internet gekoppel is, en alle nederstettings het ‘n internet kafee of een of ander plek met openbare wifi. Soos bo genoem, alhoewel die woord “Eskimo” aanvaarbaar bly in die Verenigde State, word dit ongunstig gestem deur nie-V.S. Arktiese mense, veral in Kanada. Terwyl jy dalk die woord mag hoor deur Groenlandse plaaslikes, moet dit vermy word deur buitelanders. Die inheemse inwoners van Groenland noem hulself Inuit in Kanada en Kalaalleq, (meervoud Kalaallit), ‘n Groenlander, in Groenland. Misdaad, en kwaadwilligheid teenoor immigrante oor die algemeen, is bykans onbekend in Groenland. Selfs in die dorpe, is daar geen “rowwe areas” nie. Koue weer is dalk die enigste gevaar wat onvoorbereides sal tegemoetkom. Indien jy Groenland tydens die koue maande besoek (inaggenome dat hoe verder noord jy reis, soveel kouer sal dit wees), is dit noodsaaklik om kleredrag te bring wat warm genoeg is. Die baie lange somer dae, kan ly tot probleme met te min slaap en geasosieerde gesondheids probleme. Tydens die somer moet daar uitgekyk word vir die Noordiese muskiete. Al dra hulle nie enige siektes oor nie, kan hulle irriterend wees.
mt: Thanks to undersea fiber-optic cables to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having access to the internet. Your hotel or host (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or a PR that is connected to the internet, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some place with public wifi. As mentioned above, although the word “Eskimo” is still acceptable in the United States, it is frowned upon by non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic locals, it should be avoided by foreigners. The indigenous inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq, (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and hostility towards immigrants in general, is almost unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no “rough areas”. Cold weather may be the only danger that the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during the cold months (inaggenome that the further north you travel, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring clothing that is warm enough. The very long summer days, can lead to problems with too little sleep and associated health problems. During the summer, watch out for the Northern mosquitoes. Although they do not carry any diseases, they can be irritating.
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Hierdie ruimte is gebou as die atrium vir die 17de-eeuse klooster, waarvan die Templo de San Diego die enigste oorblywende’ gebou is. Dit funksioneer nou as die sentrale plaza, en het altyd baie dinge wat aan die gang is, dag en nag. Daar is 'n aantal restaurante wat die tuin omring, en in die middae en aande word daar verniet konserte aangebied vanaf die sentrale gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Stegie van die Soen). Twee balkonne wat deur slegs 69 sentimeter geskei word is die tuiste van ‘n ou liefdes-verhaal. Vir ‘n paar pennies sal kinders vir jou die storie vertel.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for the 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the only remaining building. It now functions as the central plaza, and has always been full of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants that surround the garden, and in the afternoons and evenings concerts are held from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Stairway of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters are the home of an old love story. For a few pennies, children will tell you the story.

src: Stap is ‘n buitelug aktiwiteit wat bestaan uit loop in natuurlike omgewings, meestal op staproetes. Dag-staptogte behels afstande van minder as ‘n myl tot langer afstande wat in ‘n enkele dag afgelê kan word. Min voorbereiding is nodig vir ‘n dag stap op ‘n maklike roete en enige taamlike fiks persoon kan die geniet. Families met klein kindertjies mag meer voorbereiding nodig hê, maar ‘n dag in die buitelig is maklik moontlik selfs met babas en kleuters.
mt: Day hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, usually on hiking trails. Day hikes range in length from less than a mile to longer distances which can be completed in a single day. Little preparation is needed for a day hike on an easy trail and any reasonably fit person can enjoy it. Families with small children may need more preparation, but a day in the outdoors is easily possible even with babies and toddlers.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Tipies vir Noorweë is styl fjords en valleie wat skielik plek maak vir ‘n hoë, min of meer egalige plato. Daar word dikwels na hierdie plato verwys as ‘n “vidde”, ‘n wye, oop boomlose ruimte, ‘n oneindige uitspansel. In Rogaland en Agder word hulle meestal ""hei"" genoem, wat verwys na 'n boomlose moerasland wat in heide bedek is."
mt: "Typical for Norway are fjords and valleys that suddenly make way for a high, more or less flat plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as "heaths", a wide, open treeless area, an endless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called "hei", which refers to a treeless marshland covered in heath."
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Die toeriste seisoen vir die heuwelstasies bereik normaalweg die hoogtepunt gedurende die Indiese somer. Nietemin het hulle ‘n verskillende tipe skoonheid en sjarme tydens die winter, met baie heuwelstasies wat gesonde hoeveelhede sneeu ontvang, en aktiwiteite soos ski en sneeuplankry aanbied.
mt: The tourist season for the hill stations usually peaks during the Indian summer. Nevertheless, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during the winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow, and activities such as skiing and snowboarding on offer.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Wees versekerd dat wanneer jy die marinas bereik het, sal alles nogal voor die hand liggend wees. Jy sal ander boot-stapryers ontmoet en hulle sal hul informasie met jou deel. Basies sal jy kennisgewings opsit waar jy jou hulp aanbied, op en af stap op die dokke, mense benader en hul seiljagte skoon maak, probeer om kontak te maak met matrose in die kroeë, ens. Probeer om met soveel mense moontlik te praat. Na ‘n ruk sal almal you ken en vir jou kan sê watter boot is opsoek na iemand.
mt: Be sure that when you reach the marinas, everything will be pretty straightforward. You will meet other boat-handlers and they will share their information with you. Basically you will post notices where you offer your help, step on and off the docks, approach people and clean their sailboats, try to make contact with sailors in the bars, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and can tell you which boat is looking for someone.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Hong Kong Eiland gee die gebied van Hong Kong sy naam en dit is die plek wat baie toeriste beskou as die hooffokus. Die parade van geboue wat die horison van Hongkong uitmaak, is al met 'n skitterende kolomgrafiek vergelyk wat geaksentueer word deur die teenwoordigheid van die waters van Victoria Harbour. Om die beste tonelee van Hong Kong te sien, verlaat die eiland en reis na die Kowloon waterfront aan die oorkant. Die oorgrote meerderheid van Hong Kong Eiland se landelike ontwikkeling is dig gepak op herwonne land langs die noordelike strand. Hierdie is die plek wat die Britse koloniseerders vir hulself gevat het en so as jy vir bewyse soek van die gebied se koloniale verlede, is hierdie ‘n goeie plek om te begin.
mt: Hong Kong Island gives the area of Hong Kong its name and it is the place that many tourists consider the main focus. The parade of buildings that make up the skyline of Hong Kong are all compared to a glittering column graph that is accentuated by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To see the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and travel to the Kowloon waterfront on the other side. The overwhelming majority of Hong Kong Island's land development is tightly packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place that the British colonizers took for themselves and so if you are looking for evidence of the area's colonial past, this is a good place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Beuels is vir die ondersteuning van die ruiter se voete wat aan weerskante van die saal afhang. Hulle bied groter stabiliteit vir die ruiter, maar kan veiligheidsrisiko’s inhou as gevolg van die moontlikheid dat die ruiter se voete in hul kan vassit. As ‘n perd die ruiter afgooi en sy voet sit vas in die stiebeuel, kan hy saam gesleep word as die perd weg hardloop. Om die risiko ter verminder is daar verskeie veiligheids maatreëls wat getref kan word. Eerstens, die meeste ruiters dra rystewels met ‘n hak en ‘n gladde, taamlike smal sool. Volgende, party saals, veral Engelse saals, het veiligheids stawe wat 'n stiebeul se riem toelaat om van die saal af te val indien dit agtertoe getrek word deur 'n vallende ruiter.
mt: Stirrups are for the support of the rider's feet which hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider, but can pose safety risks due to the possibility that the rider's feet can get caught in them. As a horse throws off a rider and his foot gets caught in the stirrup, he can be dragged along as the horse runs away. To reduce the risk, there are several safety measures that can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, relatively narrow sole. Next, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety stirrups which allow a stirrup's strap to fall off the saddle if it is pulled back by a falling rider.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: ‘n Gasvryheidsuitruilnetwerk is ‘n organisasie wat reisigers verbind met plaaslike mense in die stede wat hulle gaan besoek. Om lid te word van so ‘n netwerk, vereis gewoonlik net dat jy ‘n aanlyn vorm invul, maar sommige ander netwerke bied of vereis addisionele verifikasie. n Lys van beskikbare gashere word dan verskaf, of gedruk of aanlyn, soms met verwysings en resensies deur ander reisegers. Couchsurfing is gestig in Januarie 2004 nadat die rekenaarprogrammeerder Casey Fenton ‘n goedkoop vlug na Ysland gekry het, maar nie ‘n plek gehad het om te bly nie. Hy het aan studente by die plaaslike universiteit eposse geskryf en 'n oorweldigende aantal aanbiedings van verniet akkommodasie ontvang.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local people in the cities they are visiting. To become a member of such a network, usually all that is required is that you fill out an online form, but some other networks offer or require additional verification. A list of available hosts is then provided, either printed or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton got a cheap flight to Iceland, but had nowhere to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Koshuise maak hoofsaaklik voorsiening vir jonger mense – ‘n tipiese gas is in hulle twintigs – maar jy kan gereëld ouer reisigers ook daar vind. Families met kinders is nie ‘n algemene verskynsel nie, maar party koshuise laat hulle in privaat kamers toe.
mt: Homestays primarily cater to younger travelers – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can also find older travelers there. Families with children are not a common sight, but some homestays allow them in private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Die gooi van ‘n boemerang is ‘n gewilde vaardigheid wat vele toeriste wil aanleer. Indien jy wil leer hoe om ‘n boemerang te gooi wat terug na jou hand toe kom, moet jy seker maak dat jy ‘n gepaste boemerang vir ‘n terugvlug het. Meeste boemerange wat beskikbaar is in Australië is feitlik nie-wederkerend nie. Dit is beste vir beginners om nie te probeer om in winderige weer te gooi nie.
mt: The throw of a boomerang is a popular skill that many tourists want to learn. If you want to learn how to throw a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for a return flight. Most boomerangs available in Australia are almost non-returnable. It is best for beginners not to try to throw in windy weather.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Met 17 000 eilande om van te kies, is Indonesiese kos n oorkoepelende term wat n wye verskeidenheid van plaaslike disse van regoor die nasie insluit. Maar, indien gebruik word met verdere kwalifiseerders, neig die term om kos oorspronklik van sentrale en oostelike dele van hoofland Java te beteken. Javanese kos wat nou vrylik beskikbaar is oor die argipel, is kenmerkend aan eenvoudig gegeurde disse, die prominente geurmiddel vir Javanese kos is grondboontjies, brandrissies, suiker (spesifiek Javanese klapper suiker) en verskeie aromatiese speserye.
mt: 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian cuisine is an overarching term that includes a wide variety of local dishes from all over the archipelago. But, if used with further qualifiers, the term tends to mean food originally from central and eastern parts of the main island of Java. Javanese food that is now freely available across the archipelago is characterized by simply seasoned dishes, the prominent flavoring agent for Javanese food is ground beans, peanuts, sugar (specifically Javanese palm sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Vir diegene wat onbekend is met mediese terminologie, het die woorde besmet en aansteeklik het onderskeibare betekenisse. ‘n Oordraagbare siekte is een wat deur ‘n patogeen, soos ‘n virus, bakterieë, fungi of ander parasiete veroorsaak kan word.. ‘n Aansteeklike siekte is ‘n siekte wat maklik oorgedra word deur in die omgewing van ‘n besmette persoon te wees. Vele goewermente vereis dat besoekers wat inkom, of burgers wat uit hul lande gaan, ingeënt word teen ‘n verskeidenheid siektes. Die vereistes hang dikwels af van watter lande die reisiger besoek het of wil besoek.
mt: For those who are unfamiliar with medical terminology, the words contagious and infectious have distinct meanings. A transmissible disease is one that can be caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungi or other parasites. An infectious disease is a disease that is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering or citizens leaving their countries to be vaccinated against a variety of diseases. The requirements often depend on which countries the traveler has visited or will visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Vir diegene wat onbekend is met mediese terminologie, het die woorde besmet en aansteeklik het onderskeibare betekenisse. ‘n Oordraagbare siekte is een wat deur ‘n patogeen, soos ‘n virus, bakterieë, fungi of ander parasiete veroorsaak kan word.. ‘n Aansteeklike siekte is ‘n siekte wat maklik oorgedra word deur in die omgewing van ‘n besmette persoon te wees. Vele goewermente vereis dat besoekers wat inkom, of burgers wat uit hul lande gaan, ingeënt word teen ‘n verskeidenheid siektes. Die vereistes hang dikwels af van watter lande die reisiger besoek het of wil besoek.
mt: For those who are unfamiliar with medical terminology, the words contagious and infectious have distinct meanings. A transmissible disease is one that can be caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacteria, fungi or other parasites. An infectious disease is a disease that is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering or citizens leaving their countries to be vaccinated against a variety of diseases. The requirements often depend on which countries the traveler has visited or will visit.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Persoonlike VPN (virtuele private netwerk) voorsieners ‘n uitstekende manier is om beide politiese sensorskap en kommersiële IP-geofiltrering vry te spring. Hulle is beter as webinstaanbedieners vir verskeie redes: Hulle herlei alle Internetverkeer, nie net http nie. Hulle bied normaalweg hoër bandwydte en beter dienskwaliteit aan. Hulle is geïnkripteer en daarom moeiliker om in te breek.
mt: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers offer an excellent way to both evade political surveillance and commercial IP geofiltering. They are better than web proxies for several reasons: They route all Internet traffic, not just http. They usually offer higher bandwidth and better service quality. They are encrypted and therefore harder to break.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Aangesien oproepe oor die Internet verbind word, het jy nie nodig om ‘n foon maatskappy wat naby jou geleë is te gebruik waar jy woon of wanneer jy reis nie. Daar is ook geen vereiste dat jy ‘n plaaslike nommer moet kry van die gemeenskap waarin jy leef nie; jy kan ‘n satelliet internet konneksie kry in wilde Chicken, Alaska en ‘n nommer kies wat aandui dat jy in sonnige Arizona is. Gewoonlik, moet jy ‘n globale nommer apart koop wat PSTN fone sal toelaat om jou te bel. Waar die nommer vandaan is maak ‘n verskil vir die mense wat jou bel.
mt: Since calls are routed over the Internet, you don't need to use a phone company that is located near where you live or when you travel. There is also no requirement that you get a local number that indicates where you live; you can get a satellite Internet connection in Wild Chicken, Alaska and choose a number that indicates that you are in sunny Arizona. Usually, you have to buy a separate global number that will allow PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for the people who call you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
