src: Uitspraak is relatief maklik in Italiaans, aangesien meeste woorde presies uitgespreek word soos hulle geskryf word. Die hoof letters om voor uit te kyk is c en g, aangesien hulle uitspreeking wissel afhangend die volgende vokaal. Daarby, maak seker dat jy die r en rr verskillend uitspreek: caro beteken liewe en carro beteken strydwa.
mt: Italians pronounce words relatively easily, as most words are pronounced exactly as they are written. The main letters to look out for are c and g, as their pronunciation depends on the following vowel. Also, make sure you distinguish between r and rr: caro means dear and carro means car.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: İzmir is die derde grootste stad in Turkye met 'n bevolking van om en by 3.7 miljoen, die tweede grootste hawe na Istanbul, en 'n baie goeie vervoer sentrum. Die moderne, ontwikkelde en besige kommersiele sentrum wat om die massiewe baai gebou is en met berge omring word, was eens op ‘n tyd die antieke stad Smyrna. Die breë wandelpaaie, glas-fasade geboue en moderne inkopiesentrums wat met tradisionele rooi-teël dakke toegerus is, die 18e eeuse mark, en ou moskees en kerke wat aan die stad meer 'n atmosfeer van Mediterreense Europa as tradisionele Turkye verleen.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of about 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport center. The modern, developed and busy commercial center built around the massive bay and surrounded by mountains was once the ancient city of Smyrna. The wide pedestrian streets, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers equipped with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches that give the city more an atmosphere of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Kersiebloeisel besigtiging, bekend as hanami, is vanaf die 8de eeu ‘n deel van Japanese kultuur. Die konsep het gekom van China waar pruimbloeisels die keurblom was. In Japan is die eerste kersiebloeiselpartytjies gehou deur die keiser slegs vir homself en ander lede van die aristokrasie om die Imperiële Hof.
mt: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the favored bloom. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were held by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy to the Imperial Court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jerusalem is die hoofstad en grootste stad van Israel, al herken meeste ander lande en die Verenigde Nasies dit nie as Israel se hoofstad nie. Die antieke stad in die Jodeaanse Heuwels het ‘n fassinerende geskiedenis wat oor duisende jare strek. Die stad is heilig aan die drie monoteïstiese godsdienste - Judaïsme, Christendom en Islam, en dien as ‘n geestelike, godsdienstige en kulturele sentrum. Vanweë die godsdienstige belang van die stad, en in besonder die vele persele van die Ou Stad area, is Jerusalem een van die hoof toeristebestemmings in Israel. Jerusalem het baie historiese, argeologiese en kulturele plekke, tesame met lewendige en oorvol inkopiesentrums, kafees, en restaurante.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as such. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history that stretches over thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious and cultural center. Because of the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological and cultural sites, along with lively and crowded shopping centers, cafes, and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Die Kruger Nasionale Park (KNP) is in die noord-oostelike deel van Suid-Afrika en volg die grens van Mosambiek in die ooste, Zimbabwe in die noorde, en die suidelike grens is die Krokodilrivier. Die park bedek 19,500 km² en is opgedeel in 14 verskillende eko sones, elkeen ondersteun verskillende wildslewe. Dit is een van die hoof attraksies van Suid Afrika en dit word beskou as die vlagskip van Suid Afrikaanse Nasionale Parke (SANParks). Soos met alle Suid-Afrikaanse Nasionale Parke, is daar daaglikse bewarings- en toegangsfooie vir die park. Dit mag ook voordelig wees om ‘n “Wild Card” te koop wat toegang verleen tot ‘n seleksie van parke in Suid-Afrika of tot al die Suid-Afrikaanse Nasionale Parke.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is in the north-eastern part of South Africa and follows the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 different eco zones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and access fees for the park. It may also be beneficial to buy a "Wild Card" which grants access to a selection of parks in South Africa or to all South African National Parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Die steil berg toring oor die noordelike einde van Machu Picchu wat gewoonlik die agtergrond van vele fotos van die ruϊnes is. Dit lyk baie uitdagend van onder af, en dit het ‘n styl en moeilike opgang, maar meeste redelike fikse mense behoort dit in omtrent 45-minute te maak. Kliptrappe is uitgelê op meeste van die pad, en in die steiler seksies verskaf staal kabels ‘n ondersteunende handreling. Dit gesê, verwag om uit asem te wees en wees versigtig in die steiler dele, veral’ wanneer dit nat is, aangesien dit vinnig gevaarlik word. Daar is 'n klein grot naby die bopunt waardeur gegaan moet word, dit is redelik laag en smal om deur te beweeg.
mt: The steep mountain tower over the northern end of Machu Picchu which is usually the background of many photos of the ruins. It looks very challenging from below, and it has a style and difficult ascent, but most reasonable fit people should make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid out on most of the path, and in the steeper sections provide steel cables a supporting handrail. Said, expect to be out of breath and be careful in the steeper parts, especially when it is wet, as it quickly becomes dangerous. There is a small cave near the top which must be gone through, it is fairly low and narrow to move through.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Majorkaanse kookwyse, soortgelyk aan dieselfde sones in die Mediterreen, is gebaseer op brood, groente en vleis (veral varkvleis), en gebruik olyfolie regdeur. ‘n Eenvoudige gewilde aandete, veral gedurende die somer, is die Pa amb Oli: Brood met olyfolie, tamatie, en enige ander beskikbare bestandele soos kaas, tunavis, ens.
mt: Majorcan cooking styles, similar to those in the same zone in the Mediterranean, are based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and use olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any other available ingredients such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: ‘n Hangi Maaltyd word gekook in ‘n warm put in die grond. Die put word of met warm klippe van ‘n vuur verhit, of in sommige plekke maak geotermiese hitte areas van die grond natuurlik warm. Die Hangi word gereeld gebruik om ‘n tradisionele geroosterde styl ete te kook. Verskeie plekke in Rotorua bied geotermiese hangi, terwyl ander hangi geproef kan word in Christchurch, Wellington en op ander plekke.
mt: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a heated pit in the ground. The pit is heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places, geothermal heat areas of the ground naturally warm. The Hangi is often used to cook a traditional roasted style meal. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Gedurende besoeke aan die kloosters, word vroue vereis om rompe te dra wat hul knieë bedek en hul skouers moet ook bedek wees. Meeste van die kloosters bied bekleedsel aan vroue wat onvoorbereid kom, maar as jy jou eie bring, veral een met helder kleure, sal jy ‘n glimlag van die monnik of non by die ingang kry. Binne dieselfde riglyne word dit van mans verwag om broeke te dra wat hul knieë bedek. Dit kan ook geleen word van die voorraad by die ingang maar daardie klere word nie gewas nie elke gebruiker nie, so jy mag dalk nie gemaklik voel om die rompe te dra nie. Een grootte pas alle mans!
mt: During visits to the monasteries, women are required to wear robes that cover their knees and their shoulders must also be covered. Most of the monasteries offer clothing to women who are unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you will get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Within the same guidelines, it is expected of men to wear shorts that cover their knees. It can also be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing is not washed after each user, so you may not feel comfortable wearing the robes. One size fits all!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Gedurende besoeke aan die kloosters, word vroue vereis om rompe te dra wat hul knieë bedek en hul skouers moet ook bedek wees. Meeste van die kloosters bied bekleedsel aan vroue wat onvoorbereid kom, maar as jy jou eie bring, veral een met helder kleure, sal jy ‘n glimlag van die monnik of non by die ingang kry. Binne dieselfde riglyne word dit van mans verwag om broeke te dra wat hul knieë bedek. Dit kan ook geleen word van die voorraad by die ingang maar daardie klere word nie gewas nie elke gebruiker nie, so jy mag dalk nie gemaklik voel om die rompe te dra nie. Een grootte pas alle mans!
mt: During visits to the monasteries, women are required to wear robes that cover their knees and their shoulders must also be covered. Most of the monasteries offer clothing to women who are unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you will get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Within the same guidelines, it is expected of men to wear shorts that cover their knees. It can also be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing is not washed after each user, so you may not feel comfortable wearing the robes. One size fits all!

Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: As jy die Arktiese of Antarktiese areas in die winter besoek, sal jy die polêre nag ervaar, wat beteken dat die son nie bo die horison rys nie. Dit bied 'n goeie geleentheid om die Aurora borealis te sien, aangesien die lug byna die heeltyd donker is. Aangesien die areas yl bevolk is, en lig besoedeling daarom nie dikwels ‘n problem is nie, sal jy ook in staat wees om die sterre te geniet.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter, you will experience the polar night, which means the sun does not rise above the horizon. This provides a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, since the sky is almost always dark. Since the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution is not often a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: In afgeleë plekke, sonder selfoon opvangs, mag ‘n sattelietfoon jou enigste opsie wees. ‘n Satelietfoon is nie ‘n algemene vervanging vir ‘n selfoon, want jy moet buite wees met ‘n duidelike lyn van sig na die sateliet hê om ‘n oproep te maak. Die diens word gereeld deur skeepslui gebruik, insluitend plesiertuie, sowel as ekspedisies wat afgeleë data en stem behoeftes het. Jou plaaslike telefoon-diensverskaffer behoort jou meer inligting te kan gee aangaande die aansluiting by die diens.
mt: In remote places, without cell phone reception, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not a general replacement for a cell phone, because you must be outside with a clear line of sight to the satellite to make a call. The service is often used by ship crews, including pleasure boats, as well as expeditions that have data and voice needs in remote areas. Your local phone service provider should be able to give you more information about connecting to the service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Die hoofstad van Maldova is Chişinău. Die plaaslike taal is Romeens, maar Russies word ook wyd gebruik. Moldova is ‘n multi-etniese republiek wat onder etniese konflik gelei het. In 1994 het hierdie konflik gelei tot die skepping van die self-geproklameerde Transnistria Republiek in oos Moldova, wat sy eie goewernment en geldeenheid het, maar nie deur enige ander VN-lidland erken word nie. Ekonomiese skakels is weer tussen hierdie twee dele van Moldova ingestel ten spyte van die mislukking in politieke samesprekinge. Ortodokse Christengodsdiens is die hoofgodsdiens in Moldawië.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is also widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has been plagued by ethnic conflict. In 1994 this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency, but is not recognized by any other UN member state. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. Orthodox Christianity is the main religion in Moldova.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Sedert Montevideo suid van die Ewenaar is, is dit somer daar wanneer dit winter in die Noordelike halfrond is, en so ook andersom. Montevideo is in ‘n subtropiese streek; in die somermaande is temperature van bo +30°C algemeen. Die winter kan misleidend koel wees: temperature gaan skaars onder vriespunt, maar die wind en humiditeit saam laat dit kouer voel as wat die termometer sê. Daar is geen spesifieke “reënerige” en “droë” seisoene nie: die hoeveelheid reën bly rofweg dieselfde deur die jaar.
mt: Since Montevideo south of the Equator, it is summer there when it is winter in the Northern Hemisphere, and vice versa. Montevideo is in a subtropical region; in the summer months temperatures of over +30°C are common. The winter can be misleadingly cool: temperatures rarely drop below freezing point, but the wind and humidity together make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no specific “rainy” and “dry” seasons: the amount of rain remains roughly the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Ongewensde muurskilderye of krabbels staan bekend as graffitti. Terwyl dit ver van ‘n moderne verskynsel is, sal die meeste mense dit moontlik assosieer met die jeug wat openbare en privaat eiendom vandaliseer deur spuitverf te gebruik. Nietemin is daar vandag gevestigde graffiti kunstenaars, graffiti geleenthede en “wettige” mure. Graffiti skilderye in hierdie konteks stel baiemaal kunswerke voor eerder as onwettige onleesbare handtekeninge.
mt: Unwanted wall paintings or scribbles are known as graffiti. While it is far from a modern phenomenon, most people would likely associate it with the youth who vandalize public and private property by using spray paint. Nevertheless, there are today established graffiti artists, graffiti opportunities and “legal” walls. Graffiti paintings in this context present biaemal artworks rather than illegal illegible signatures.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Vir sommige musiekfeeste besluit die grootste hoeveelheid van die bywoners om op die terrein te kampeer, en die meeste sien dit as ‘n noodsaaklike deel van die ondervinding. Indien jy naby die aksie wil wees gaan jy vroeg moet inkom om ‘n kampeerplek naby die musiek te kry. Onthou dat alhoewel musiek op die hoof stadiums dalk tot ‘n end mag kom, mag daar dalk afdelings van die fees wees wat sal aanhou musiek speel tot laat in die nag. Sommige feeste het spesiale kamp areas vir families met jong kinders.
mt: For some music festivals the majority of the attendees decide to camp on the grounds, and most see it as a necessary part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you will need to arrive early to get a camping spot near the music. Remember that while the main stages may stop playing music at a certain time, there may be sections of the festival that will continue to play music late into the night. Some festivals have special camp areas for families with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Gegewend hoe afgelee baie van die pueblos is, sal jy nie in staat wees om ‘n beduidende naglewe te kry sonder om na Albuquerque of Sante Fe toe te reis nie. Byna al die kasino’s wat hierbo genoem word, bedien egter drankies, en verskeie van hulle bring groot naam vermaak in (hoofsaaklik die grotes wat in die nabye omgewing van Albuquerque en Santa Fe is). Wees gewaarsku: klein-dorpie kroeë is nie altyd goeie plekke vir die besoekers uit ander state om hul vrye tyd te spandeer nie. Vir eens het Noord-Mexiko 'n merkwaardige probleem met dronkbestuur, en die konsentrasie van bedwelmde bestuurders is hoër hoe nader aan klein dorpies se kroeë 'n mens is.
mt: Given how far away many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to get a significant nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Almost all of the casinos mentioned above serve alcohol, and several of them bring big-name entertainment (mostly the casinos in the vicinity of Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Be warned: small-town bars are not always good places for out-of-state visitors to spend their free time. For once, New Mexico has a remarkable problem with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is higher the closer you get to small towns' bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Die hoof plaaslike bier is ‘Number One’, dit is nie ‘n komplekse bier nie, maar aangenaam en verfrissend. Die ander plaaslike bier word “Manta” genoem. Daar is baie Franse wyne beskikbaar, maar Nieu-Seelandse en Australiese wyne kan dalk beter vervoer word. Die plaaslike kraanwater is heel veilig om te drink, maar gebottelde water is maklik om te vind as jy bang is. Vir Australiërs is die idee van 'plat wit' koffie uitheems. 'n Kort swart is 'espresso', cappuccino word met room opgehoop voorgesit (nie skuim nie), en tee word sonder melk bedien. Die warm sjokolade is gelykstaande aan Belgiese standaarde. Vrugtesappe is duur maar uitstekend.
mt: The main local beer is “Number One”, it is not a complex beer but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called “Manta”. There are many French wines available, but New Zealand and Australian wines may be better transported. The local tap water is very safe to drink, but bottled water is easily found if you are afraid. For Australians, the idea of “flat white” coffee is foreign. A short black is “espresso”, cappuccino is served with whipped cream (not foam), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is on par with Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive but excellent.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Die Guaraní was die mees merkwaardige inboorlingegroep wat in die area nou bekend as Oostelike Paraguay bewoon het, en hulle het die area bewoon as semi-nomadiese jagters wat ook bestaansboerdery toegepas het. Die Chaco streek was die tuiste van ander inboorling-stamme, soos die Guaycurú en die Payaguá wat oorleef het deur te jag, kos te versamel en vis te vang. In die 16de eeu is Paraguay, voorheen bekend as “Die Groot Provinsie van die Indies”, gebore as gevolg van ‘n resultaat van die skermutseling van Spaanse oorwinnaars met die plaaslike inheemse groepe. Die Spanjaarde het die kolonisasieperiode begin wat vir drie eeue geduur het. Sedert die skepping van Asunción in 1537, het Paraguy daarin geslaag om baie van sy inheemse karakter en identiteit te behou.
mt: The Guaraní were the most remarkable indigenous group that inhabited the area now known as Eastern Paraguay, and they inhabited the area as semi-nomadic hunters who also practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was the home of other indigenous tribes, such as the Guaycurú and the Payaguá who survived by hunting, gathering food and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, formerly known as “The Great Province of the Indies”, was born as a result of the skirmish of Spanish conquerors with the local indigenous groups. The Spanish began the colonization period that lasted for three centuries. Since the creation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has succeeded in preserving much of its indigenous character and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Parysenare het ‘n reputasie daarvoor om egosentries, onbeskof en verwaand te wees. Terwyl hierdie gewoonlik slegs ‘n onakkurate stereotipe is, is die beste manier om in Parys oor die weg te kom om op jou beste gedrag te wees, deur soos iemand op te tree wat “bien élevé"" (goed grootgemaak) is. Dit sal dit aansienlik makliker maak om oor die weg te kom. Parysenaars se houding sal drasties verander wanneer jy hoflik teenoor hulle optree."
mt: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, ungrateful and arrogant. While this is usually only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). This will make it much easier to get along. Parisians' attitude will change drastically when you act politely towards them."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail het twee klasse op passasierstreine in en om Kaapstad: MetroPlus (ook genoem Eerste Klas) en Metro (genoem Derde klas). MetroPlus is meer gemaklik en minder oorlaai, maar ‘n bietjie duurder, al is dit steeds goedkoper as normale metro kaartjies in Europa. Elke trein het sowel MetroPlus- en Metro-waens; die MetroPlus-waens is altyd aan die einde van die trein naaste Kaapstad.
mt: MetroRail has two classes on passenger trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded, but a bit more expensive, but still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Each train has both MetroPlus and Metro cars; the MetroPlus cars are always at the end of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Reisigers mag dierepeste aantref waarmee hulle nie in hul tuisstreke bekend is nie. Peste kan kos bederf, irritasie veroorsaak, of in die ergste geval, allergiese reaksies veroorsaak, gif versprei, of infeksies oordra. Aansteeklike siektes self, of gevaarlike diere wat mense kan beseer of doodmaak met geweld, kwalifiseer nie gewoonlik as peste nie.
mt: Travelers may encounter pests with which they are not familiar in their home regions. Pests can contaminate food, cause irritation, or in the worst case, cause allergic reactions, spread toxins, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people with violence, usually do not qualify as pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Elke hoekwinkel is gevul met 'n deurmekaar reeks vooraf-betaalde foonkaarte wat gebruik kan word vanaf betaaltelefone of gewone telefone. Terwyl die meeste kaarte goed is om na enige plek te bel, spesialiseer sommiges met meer gunstige oproepkoste na spesifieke groepe lande. Toegang tot hierdie dienste is meestal deur 'n tol-vrye telefoonnommer wat sonder koste van meeste fone af geskakel kan word.
mt: Every corner store is filled with a jumbled series of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or regular phones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialize with more favorable calling costs to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is usually through a toll-free phone number that can be dialed for free from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Die Plitvice Lakes nationale park is dig-bebos, meestal met Beuk-, Spar- en Sipresbome en is kenmerkend vir die Berg en Mediterreense plantegroei. Dit het 'n merkwaardige wye verskeidenheid plantgemeenskappe vanweë die reeks mikroklimate, verskillende tipes gronde en verskillende hoogtevlakke. Die area is ook ‘n tuiste vir ‘n ongelooflike wye verskeidenheid van dier en voëlspesies. Skaars fauna, soos die Europese bruin beer, wolf, arend, uil, Europese rooikat, wilde kat en heidehaan kan daar gevind word, tesame met baie ander meer algemene spesies.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is densely forested, mostly with Beech-, Oak- and Spruce-trees and is characterized by the Mountain and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a remarkable wide variety of plant communities due to the series of microclimates, different types of soil and different altitude levels. The area is also a home for an unbelievable wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna, such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, European roe deer, wild cat and heath sheep can be found there, together with many other more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: "Die media maatskappye lieg gereeld oor die doel hiervan, en meld dat dit is om ""kaping te voorkom"". In werklikheid het streekskodes absoluut geen effek op onwettige kopiëring nie; 'n kopie van 'n skyf wat stukkie-vir-stukkie gedoen is, sal goed speel op enige toestel waar die oorspronklike sal. Die eintlike doel is om hierdie maatskappye meer beheer oor hul markte te gee; dit gaan als daaroor om die geld te draai."
mt: "Media companies lie regularly about the purpose of this, and report that it is to ""prevent hijacking"". In reality, regional codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a copy of a disc that is ripped piece-by-piece will play on any device that the original will. The real purpose is to give these companies more control over their markets; it's all about the money."
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Terwyl immigrasie-toetse gewoonlik afwesig is of slegs 'n formaliteit is wanneer jy terugkeer na jou tuisland, kan doanebeheer steeds onnodige moeite wees. Verseker dat jy weet wat jy kan en nie kan bring nie en verklaar enigiets wat oor die wettige limiete is.
mt: While immigration inspections are usually absent or only a formality when you return to your home country, customs control can still be unnecessary hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring and declare anything that exceeds the legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamó-vallei - die grootste klimbestemming van Chili, bekend as die Yosemite van Suid-Amerika, met 'n verskeidenheid groot graniet mure en rotse. Bergkruine sluit asemrowende uitsigte in van pieke. Klimmers van regoor die wêreld soek aanhoudend nuwe roetes tussen die eindelose rotswande.
mt: Cochamó Valley - the largest climbing destination in Chile, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of large granite walls and cliffs. Climbers from around the world seek out new routes between the endless rock faces.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: As jy heeltemal rondom die wêreld in die Suidelike Hemisfeer wil vlieg, is die vlugte en bestemmings beperk as gevolg van die tekort aan trans-oseaniese roetes. Geen lugdiens alliansie dek al drie oseaan kruisings in die Suidelike Halfrond (en SkyTeam dek geen kruisings). Nietemin dek Star Alliance alles behalwe die oos Suid Stille oseaan van Santiago de Chile tot Tahiti, wat ‘n LATAM Oneworld vlug is. Hierdie vlug is nie die enigste opsie as jy die Suidelike Stille Oseaan en die weskus van Suid-Amerika wil mis nie. (sien onder)
mt: If you want to fly around the world in the Southern Hemisphere, your flights and destinations are limited due to the lack of trans-oceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none). Nevertheless, Star Alliance covers everything except the east South Pacific Ocean from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to miss the South Pacific Ocean and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Internasionaal is daar amper 200 werkende toer organisasies. Die meeste van hulle funksioneer onafhanklik. Die Global Running Tours se opvolger, Go Running Tours netwerk duisende oefen vakansie verskaffers op vier kontinente. Met konneksies in Barselona se Hardlooptoere Barselona en Kopenhagen se Hardlopende Kopenhagen, is dit vinnig deur Hardlooptoere Praag wat in Praag en elders gebaseerd is, aangesluit.
mt: Internationally there are almost 200 working tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours network thousands of training vacation providers on four continents. With connections in Barcelona's Hardlooptoere Barcelona and Copenhagen's Hardlopende Copenhagen, it is quickly joined by Hardlooptoere Prague, which is based in Prague and elsewhere.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Safaris is miskien die grootste toeristetrek in Afrika en die hoogtepunt vir baie besoekers. Die gewilde term safari wat populêr gebruik word verwys na oorland reis om die pragtige Afrika wildslewe, veral op savanne te sien. Party diere, soos olifante en kameelperde neig daartoe om te naby aan karre te kom en standaard toerusting sal goeie besigtiging toelaat. Leeus, jagluiperds en luiperds is soms skaam en jy sal hulle beter sien met verkykers. ‘n Stapsafari (ook genaamd ‘n “bosstap”, “loopsafari”, of gaan “stap”) bestaan uit ‘n wandeling van ‘n paar uur tot ‘n paar dae.
mt: Safaris are perhaps the biggest tourist draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The popular term safari which is widely used refers to overland travel to see the beautiful African wildlife, especially on savannahs. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes tend to come close to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a “bush walk”, “game walk”, or go “walking”) consists of a walk of a few hours to a few days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Toere is goedkoper vir groter groepe so as jy alleen is of saam met slegs een vriend is, probeer om ander mense te ontmoet en vorm ‘n groep van vier tot ses vir ‘n beter per persoon tarief. Nietemin behoort jy nie daarmee gemoeid wees nie, omdat toeriste gereeld rondgeskuif word om die karre te vul. Dit lyk of dit eintlik ‘n manier is om mense te flous om hulle te laat glo dat hulle meer moet betaal.
mt: Trips are cheaper for larger groups as if you are alone or with only one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per person rate. Nevertheless, you should not be tied to this, as tourists are often shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems to be a way to fool people into thinking they should pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Terwyl San Francisco se ekonomie gekoppel word aan ‘n wêreldklas toeruste-aantrekking, is die ekonomie afwisselend. Die grootste werksverskaffing sektore is professionele dienste, regering, finansiering, ambag, en toerisme. Die gereëlde uitbeelding daarvan in musiek, films, literatuur en populêre kultuur het gehelp om die stad en sy besienswaardighede wêreldwyd bekend te maak. San Francisco het 'n groot toerisme infrastruktuur met vele hotelle, restaurante en vergaderingsfasiliteite van die hoogste gehalte, ontwikkel. San Francisco is ook een van die beste plekke in die nasie vir ander Asiatiese Kookkuns: Koreaans, Thai, Indies en Japanees.
mt: While San Francisco's economy is tied to a world-class tourist attraction, the economy has been mixed. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, manufacturing, and tourism. The planned representation of this in music, films, literature, and popular culture has helped to make the city and its attractions known worldwide. San Francisco has developed a large tourism infrastructure with many high-quality hotels, restaurants, and meeting facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian Cuisines: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Vooraf bespreek gee die reiser gemoedsrus dat hulle êrens sal hê om te slap wanneer hulle by hul bestemming aankom. Reisagente het dikwels ooreenkomste met spesifieke hotelle al mag jy dit onmoontlik vind om ander tipes akkommodasie, soos kampgronde te bespreek, deur ‘n reisagent. Reisagente bied gewoonlik pakkette aan wat oggendete, transportreëlings na/van die lughawe en selfs gekombineerde vlug en hotelpakkette insluit. Hulle kan ook die besprekings hou vir jou indien jy tyd nodig het om te dink oor die aanbod of om ander dokumente te kry vir jou bestemming (bv visa). Enige veranderinge of navrae moet egter deur die reisagent gaan en nie direk deur die hotel nie.
mt: Before you book, you can be assured that you will have a place to sleep when you arrive at your destination. Travel agents often have agreements with specific hotels, even though you may find it impossible to book other types of accommodations, such as campgrounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, airport transfers, and even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservations for you if you need time to think about the offer or to get other documents for your destination (e.g. visas). However, any changes or inquiries must go through the travel agent and not directly through the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Vooraf bespreek gee die reiser gemoedsrus dat hulle êrens sal hê om te slap wanneer hulle by hul bestemming aankom. Reisagente het dikwels ooreenkomste met spesifieke hotelle al mag jy dit onmoontlik vind om ander tipes akkommodasie, soos kampgronde te bespreek, deur ‘n reisagent. Reisagente bied gewoonlik pakkette aan wat oggendete, transportreëlings na/van die lughawe en selfs gekombineerde vlug en hotelpakkette insluit. Hulle kan ook die besprekings hou vir jou indien jy tyd nodig het om te dink oor die aanbod of om ander dokumente te kry vir jou bestemming (bv visa). Enige veranderinge of navrae moet egter deur die reisagent gaan en nie direk deur die hotel nie.

src: Ware-tyd teks vertaler toeps – toepassings wat in staat is om outomaties hele segmente van teks te vertaal van een taal na n ander. Party van die toepassings in die kategorie kan selfs vreemde tale vertaal op tekens of ander voorwerpe in die regte wêreld wanneer die gebruiker hul slimfoon op hierdie voorwerpe rig. Die vertalings enjins het drasties verbeter en gee nou meestal min of meer die korrekte vertalings (en minder selde brabbertaal), maar nasorg is nodig aangesien hulle dit soms nog steeds heeltemal verkeerd kry. Een van die mees prominente toeps in hierdie kategorie is Google Translate, wat aflyn vertaling toelaat na die aflaai van verkose taal data.
mt: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are able to automatically translate entire segments of text from one language to another. Some of the apps in this category can even translate foreign languages onto signs or other objects in the real world when the user points their smartphone at these objects. The translation engines have dramatically improved and now usually give mostly the correct translations (and less often gibberish), but post-editing is needed as they still sometimes get it completely wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading selected language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Sneeustortings is nie ‘n abnormaliteit nie; steil hellings kan net soveel sneeu hou, en die oortollige volumes sal neerkom as sneeustortings. Die probleem is dat sneeu taai is, so dit het 'n bietjie van 'n hupstoot nodig om af te kom, en net ‘n bietjie sneeu wat afkom kan die res aan die gang sit. Soms is die oorspronklike kataliserende gebeurtenis die son wat die sneeu opwarm, soms is dit meer sneeuval, soms is dit ander natuurlike gebeurtenisse, baiemaal ‘n mens.
mt: Snow avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold just as much snow, and the excess volumes will come down as snow avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs a little push to come off, and just a little snow that comes off can get the rest going. Sometimes the original catalyzing event is the sun that warms the snow, sometimes it is more snowfall, sometimes it is other natural events, sometimes a person.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: ‘n Kerrie is ‘n geregwat gebaseer is op kruie en speserye tesame met vleis of groente. ‘n Kerrie kan óf “droog” of “nat” wees, afhangend van die hoeveelheid vloeistof. In binnelandse streke van Noordelike Indië en Pakistan, is joghurt algemeen in kerries; in Suidelike Indië en sommige ander kusstreke van die subcontinent, word klapperneutmelk algemeen gebruik.
mt: A curry is a dish based on spices, typically consisting of a sauce, hot spices and meat or vegetables. A curry can either be “dry” or “wet”, depending on the amount of liquid. In the interior regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Die Suid Pool Deurpad (Of Hoofweg) is 'n 1600 km pad van McMurdo Stasie aan die Ross See na die Pool. Dis gekompakteerde sneeu met spelonke wat ingevul is en deur vlaggies gemerk is. Dit kan slegs deur spesiale trekkers bereik word, wat sleë sleep met brandstof en voorraade. Hierdies is nie baie rats nie, dus sal die roete ‘n lang ompad oor die Transantarktiese Berge moet neem om op die plato te kom.
mt: The South Pole Traverse (Main Highway) is a 1600 km road from McMurdo Station at the Ross Sea to the Pole. It is compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked with flagpoles. It can only be reached by special tractors, which pull sleds with fuel and supplies. This is not very fast, so the route will have to take a long detour over the Transantarctic Mountains to get to the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Om Suid-Afrika per motor binne te gaan is 'n verbasende manier om al die streek se skoonheid te sien sowel as om die plekke wat buite normale toeristeroetes val, te besoek. Dit kan gedoen word in ‘n normale kar met versigtige beplanning maar ‘n 4x4 word aanbeveel en baie plekke is slegs bereikbaar met ‘n hoë wiel basis 4x4. Hou in gedagte terwyl jy beplan dat al is Suid-Afrika stabiel, nie al die naburige lande is nie. Visa vereistes en kostes verskil van nasie tot nasie en word deur die land waarvandaan jy kom, geaffekteer. Elke land het ook unieke wette wat vereis dat daar spesifieke nood-items in die motor moet wees.
mt: 4x4ing in South Africa is a great way to see all the country's beauty as well as to visit places that are off the beaten tourist track. It can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is recommended and many places are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while you plan that while South Africa is stable, not all the neighbouring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from country to country and are affected by the country you are coming from. Each country also has unique laws that require that there are specific emergency items in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Dra vir ander – Moet nooit jou sakke buite jou sig laat gaan, veral as jy internasionale grense oorsteek nie. Sonder u medewete kan u as 'n dwelmhandelaar gebruik word, wat u in groot moeilikheid kan beland. Dit sluit in om in lyn te wag, aangesien dwelm-snuifende honde enige tyd gebruik kan word sonder kennisgewing. Sommige lande het baie drakoniese strawwe, selfs vir eerste oortreders; hierdie kan tronkstraf van oor die 10 jaar of dood straf insluit. Verlate sakke word dikwels 'n teiken van diefstal en kan ook die owerhede wat versigtig is vir bomdreigemente, se aandag lok.
mt: 1. Carry on for others – Never leave your bags out of sight, especially when crossing international borders. Without your knowledge, you could be used as a drug mule, which could land you in serious trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs can be used at any time without notice. Some countries have very draconian penalties, even for first-time offenders; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death sentences. Abandoned bags are often targets of theft and can also attract the attention of authorities who are wary of bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Vul u huis met ‘n lekker koffie in die oggend en ‘n koppie ontspannende kamilletee in die aand. Wanneer jy op 'n tuis-vakansie is, het jy die tyd om jouself te bederf en 'n paar ekstra minute te neem om iets spesiaals op te kook. Indien jy meer avontuurlustig voel, gebruik die geleentheid om te versap of om gladdejantjies te meng: dalk ontdek jy ‘n eenvoudige drankie wat jy vir ontbyt kan maak wanneer jy terug is in jou daaglikse roetine. Indien jy in ‘n stad bly met ‘n afgewisselde drinkkultuur, gaan na kroeë of kuierplekke in buurte wat jy nie gewoonlik besoek nie.
mt: Fill your home with a nice cup of coffee in the morning and a cup of relaxing chamomile tea in the evening. When you are on a staycation, you have the time to spoil yourself and take a few extra minutes to cook something special. If you feel more adventurous, use the opportunity to steep or to mix cocktails: you may discover a simple drink that you can make for breakfast when you are back in your daily routine. If you live in a city with a diverse drinking culture, go to bars or hangouts in neighborhoods that you don't usually visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Die dorp van Haldarsvík bied uitsig oor die nabygeleë eiland Eysturoy en het ‘n ongewone agthoekige kerk. In die kerkhof is daar interessante marmer beeldhouwerke van duiwe oor party grafte. Dis ‘n halfuur werd om deur die interessante dorpie te drentel.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík offers views of the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some graves. It’s a half-hour walk through the interesting village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Terwyl jy nie ‘n visa nodig het vir kort besoeke aan sekere lande as toeris of vir besigheid nie, vereis dit ‘n langer verblyf wanneer jy daarheen gaan as internasionale student, as wat dit sou neem om slegs as ‘n gemaklike toeris te gaan. In die algemeen, word ‘n visa vooraf benodig indien jy vir ‘n uitgebreide tyd in enige land gaan bly. Studente visums het gewoonlik ander vereistes en aansoek prosedures as normale toeriste of besigheids visums. Vir die meeste lande, sal jy ‘n aanbodbrief benodig van die instansie waar jy wil studeer, asook bewys van genoegsame vondse om jouself vir ten minste die eerste jaar van jou kursus te onderhou. Raadpleeg die instansie, sowel as die immigrasie departement vir die land waarin jy graag wil studeer vir die gedetaileerde vereistes.
mt: While you do not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, it requires a longer stay when you go there as an international student, as what it would take to simply as a comfortable tourist. In general, a visa is required in advance if you are going to stay for an extended time in any country. Student visas usually have other requirements and application procedures than normal tourists or business visas. For most countries, you will need a letter of offer from the institution where you want to study, as well as proof of sufficient funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Consult the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country in which you wish to study for the detailed requirements.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Veral in die somer moet jy oppas vir muskiete as jy besluit om deur die reënwoud te stap. Selfs wanneer jy deur die subtropiese reënwoud ry, ‘n paar sekondes met die deure oop terwyl jy inklim, is genoeg tyd vir muskiete om in jou voertuig saam met jou te kom.
mt: Especially in the summer, you need to watch out for mosquitoes when you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even when you drive through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you climb in is enough time for mosquitoes to come along with you in your vehicle.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Die Sundarbans is die grootste kus mangrove gordel in die wêreld en strek 80 km (50 myl) na die binneland van die Bangladesj en Indiese hinterland vanaf die kus. Die Sundarbans is verklaar as ‘n UNESCO Wêreld-erfenis gebied. Die deel van die woud wat in Indiese grondgebied val word die Sundarbans Nationale Park genoem. Die woude is nie slegs halofiet-moerasse nie - hulle sluit sommige van die laaste oorblywende stande van magtige woude in wat eens die Gangetiese vlakte bedek het. Die Sundarbans bedek ‘n area van 3 850 km², waarvan omtrend een-derde bedek is in water/ moerasareas. Die Sundarbanië is sedert 1966 ‘n wildlewe heilgdom, en daar word geskat dat daar nou ongeveer 400 Koninklike Bengaalse tiere en ongeveer 30,000 gevlekte bokke in die area is.
mt: The Sundarbans is the largest coastal mangrove belt in the world and stretches 80 km (50 miles) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. The Sundarbans is declared as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest that falls in Indian territory is called the Sundarbans National Park. The forests are not only halophytic swamps - they include some of the last surviving stands of mighty forests that once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans covers an area of 3 850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/swamp areas. The Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary since 1966, and it is estimated that there are now about 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Die wêreld het meer as 5000 verskillende tale, insluitend meer as twintig wat meer as 50 miljoen sprekers het. Geskrewe woorde is ook baiemaal makliker om te verstaan as gesproke woorde. Dit is veral waar van adresse, wat baiemaal moeilik is om verstaanbaar uit te spreek. Vele nasies is geheel en al heeltemal vlot in Engels, en in meer kan jy selfs ‘n beperkte kennis verwag - veral onder jonger mense. Verbeel jou, as jy kan, ‘n Mancuniaan, ‘n Bostoniaan, ‘n Jamaikaner en ‘n Sydnieër wat om ‘n tafel sit en aandete eet by ‘n restaurant in Toronto. Hulle vermaak mekaar met stories uit hul tuisdorpe, in hul eiesoortige aksente en plaaslike sleng.
mt: The world has more than 5000 different languages, including more than twenty that have more than 50 million speakers. Written words are also much easier to understand than spoken words. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce clearly. Many nations are entirely fluent in English, and in more you can even expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you can, a Mancunian, a Bostonian, a Jamaican and a Sydnean sitting around a table and eating dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They entertain each other with stories from their hometowns, in their own accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Busse vertrek van die inter-distrik busstasie (oorkant die rivier) regdeur die dag, alhoewel meeste, veral die wat in ‘n oostelike rigting gaan en tussen 06:30 en 07:30 na Jakar/Bumthang vertrek. Aangesien inter-distrik busse gereeld vol is, word dit voorgestel dat ‘n mens ‘n kaartjie ‘n paar dae vooruit koop. Meeste distrikte word bedien deur Japannese Coaster Busse, wat betroubaar en stewig is. Gedeelde huurmotors is ‘n vinnige en gemaklike manier om na nabygeleë plekke te reis, soos byvoorbeeld Paru (Nu 150) en Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses depart from the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, although most, especially those heading east and departing between 06:30 and 07:30 to Jakar/Bumthang. Since inter-district buses are often full, it is recommended that you buy a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by Japanese Coaster Buses, which are reliable and sturdy. Shared hire cars are a quick and convenient way to travel to nearby places, such as Paru (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Gekombineer met sy relatiewe ontoeganklikheid, “Timbuktu” word nou gebruik as ‘n metafoor vir eksotiese, ver lande. Vandag is Timbuktu ‘n verarmde dorp, al maak sy reputasie van ‘n toeriste aantreklikheid, en dit het‘n lughawe. In 1990 is dit gevoeg tot die lys van wêrelderfenisplekke wat in gevaar is, vanweë die gevare van die woestyn sande. Dit was een van die vernaamste stilhou punte gedurende Henry Louis Gates se spesiale PBS program, Wonders of the African World. Die stad is in skrille kontras met die res van die land se stede, want dit het meer van n Arabiese flair as die van n Afrikaan.
mt: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, “Timbuktu” is now used as a metaphor for exotic, faraway lands. Today, Timbuktu is a poor village, though its reputation as a tourist attraction makes it attractive, and it has an airport. In 1990 it was added to the list of World Heritage sites in danger, due to the dangers of the desert sands. It was one of the main stopping points during Henry Louis Gates’ special PBS program, Wonders of the African World. The city is in sharp contrast with the rest of the country’s cities, because it has more of an Arab flair than an African one.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Die Paralimpiese spele sal plaasvind vanaf 24 Augustus tot 5 September 2021. Party geleenthede sal in ander plekke in Japan aangebied word. Tokyo sal die enigste Asiatiese stad wees wat twee somer Olimpiese Spele gehuisves het, na hulle die spele in 1964 gehuisves het. Indien jy jou vlugte en akkommodasie bespreek het vir 2020 voor die uitstelling aangekondig is, mag jy ‘n moeilike situasie hê. Kansellasie polisse verskil, maar vanaf laat Maart verleng die meeste coronavirus-gebaseerde kansellasie polisse nie tot Junie 2020 vir wanneer die Olimpiese Spele geskeduleer is nie. Dit word verwag dat die meeste geleentheidskaartjies tussen ¥2 500 en ¥130 000 sal kos met tipiese kaartjies wat om en by ¥7 000 kos.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other places in Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympic Games, having hosted the games in 1964. If you have booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a difficult situation. Most coronavirus-based cancellation policies do not extend until June 2020 for when the Olympic Games are scheduled. It is expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000 with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: ‘n Tornado is ‘n spinnende kolom van lae-druk lug, wat die omringende lug inwaarts en opwaarts suig. Hulle skep winde (baiemaal 100-200 myl/uur) en kan swaar voorwerpe in die lug optel en dit soos die tornado beweeg, saamdra. Hulle begin neerdaal as tregters uit storm wolke en word tornadoes wanneer hulle die grond raak.
mt: A tornado is a spinning column of low-pressure air, which sucks in the surrounding air inward and upward. They create winds (up to 100-200 mph) and can pick up heavy objects in the air and move them along with the tornado. They begin as funnels from storm clouds and become tornadoes when they touch the ground.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Indien die land wat jy wil besoek onderwerp is aan ‘n reiswaarskuwing, mag jou reis gesondheidsversekering of jou kansellasie versekering geaffekteer word. Jy mag ook graag die advies van state anders as jou eie te raadpleeg, maar hul advies is ontwerp vir hul burgers. As een voorbeeld mag Amerikaanse burgers in die Middeooste ander situasies van Europeërs of Arabiere tegemoetkom. Adviserings is slegs ‘n kort opsomming van die politieke situasie in een land. Die menings aangebied is baiekeer oppervlakkig, breed en oorvereenvoudig in vergelyking met die meer uitgebreide inligting wat elders beskikbaar is.
mt: If the country you wish to visit is under a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to seek advice from states other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may encounter different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are only a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The opinions offered are often superficial, broad and oversimplified in comparison to the more extensive information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Reisagentskappe is al daar sedert die 19e eeu. ‘n Reisagent is gewoonlik ‘n goeie opsie vir ‘n reis wat buite die reisiger se vorige ervaring van die natuur, kultuur, taal of lae-inkomste lande strek. Al is meeste agentskappe gewillig om meeste gereëlde besprekings te hanteer, spesialiseer baie agente in besondere tipes reis, begrotingsgroottes of bestemmings. Dit kan beter wees om 'n agent te gebruik wat gereeld toere reël wat soortgelyk is aan joune. Kyk na watter reise die agent bevorder, of op ‘n webtuiste of in a winkelvenster.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a trip that falls outside the traveler's previous experience of the natural, cultural, language or low-income countries. While most agencies are willing to handle most booked discussions, many agents specialize in particular types of travel, budget sizes or destinations. It may be better to use an agent who regularly toer reël that is similar to yours. Look at what travels the agent promotes, or on a website or in a window.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.
