src: "Daar is baie sake wat jy in gedagte moet hou voor en wanneer jy erens heen reis. Wanneer jy reis, moenie verwag dat dinge gaan wees soos hulle ""by die huis"" is nie. Maniere, wette, kos, verkeer, verblyf, standaarde, taal en so voorts sal tot 'n mate verskil van waar jy bly. Dit is iets wat jy altyd in gedagte wil hou, om teleurstelling te vermy of dalk tot afkeer oor plaaslike maniere om dinge te doen."
mt: "There are many things you need to keep in mind before and when you travel. When you travel, don't expect things to be like they are ""at home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so forth will vary to some extent from where you live. It is something you always want to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps disgust over local ways of doing things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: "Daar is baie sake wat jy in gedagte moet hou voor en wanneer jy erens heen reis. Wanneer jy reis, moenie verwag dat dinge gaan wees soos hulle ""by die huis"" is nie. Maniere, wette, kos, verkeer, verblyf, standaarde, taal en so voorts sal tot 'n mate verskil van waar jy bly. Dit is iets wat jy altyd in gedagte wil hou, om teleurstelling te vermy of dalk tot afkeer oor plaaslike maniere om dinge te doen."
mt: "There are many things you need to keep in mind before and when you travel. When you travel, don't expect things to be like they are ""at home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so forth will vary to some extent from where you live. It is something you always want to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps disgust over local ways of doing things."
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Indien jy reis in ‘n ontwikkelende land vir die eerste keer - of in ‘n nuwe deel van die wêreld - moenie die potensiële kultuurskok onderskat nie. Vele stabiele, bevoeglike reisiger is al oorkom deur die nuutheid van ontwikkellinde wêreld reis, waar menigte klein kultuur aanpassings vinnig kan ophoop. Om jouself aanvanklik te help akklimatiseer, oorweeg oorbesteding aan Westerse-styl en –gehalte hotelle, voedsel en dienste. Moenie slaap op ‘n matras of palet op die grond in areas waar jy nie die plaaslike fauna ken nie. As jy gaan kampeer, bring ‘n kampbed of hangmat om jou weg te hou van slange, skerpioene en sulke goed.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country for the first time - or to a new part of the world - don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many stable, experienced travelers have been overwhelmed by the newness of developing world travel, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly pile up. To help yourself acclimate initially, consider spending time at Western-style and -standard hotels, food and services. Don't sleep on a mattress or pallet on the ground in areas where you don't know the local fauna. If you are going to camp, bring a camping bed or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Maak en dra kopieë van jou polis en jou versekeraar se kontakbesonderhede met jou saam. Hulle het nodig om die versekeraar se e-pos adres en internasionale telefoon nommers te wys vir advies/goedkeuring en eise instel. Hou nog 'n kopie in jou baggasie en aanlyn (e-pos dit aan jouself met 'n aanhegsel, of stoor dit in die ""wolk""). Indien jy met ‘n skootrekenaar of tablet reis, stoor ‘n kopie in die hardeskyf of op ‘n skyfie (toeganklik sonder die internet). Gee ook beleid-/kontakkopieë aan reisgenote en familie of vriende by die huis wat bereid is om te help."
mt: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international telephone numbers for advice/authorization and claims. Keep a copy in your luggage and online (e-mail it to yourself with an attachment, or store it in the "cloud"). If you travel with a laptop or tablet, store a copy on the hard drive or on a disk (accessible without the Internet). Also give policy/contact copies to travel companions and family or friends at home who are willing to help."
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Daar is baie verskillende film formate deur die jare gebruik. Standaard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negatief) is die mees algemeenste. Dit kan gewoonlik taamlik maklik aangevul word as dit klaar is, en verskaf ‘n resolusie, rofweg vergelykbaar met ‘n huidige DELR. Party medium-formaat film kameras gebruik 'n 6 by 6 cm formaat, meer spesifiek 'n 56 by 56 mm negatief. Dit gee 'n resolusie van byna vier keer van dit van 'n 35 mm negatief (3136mm2 tenoor 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is the most common standard. It can usually be easily refilled once it is finished, and provides a resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more specifically a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives a resolution of nearly four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136mm2 versus 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Die maklikste manier vir jou om te begin in die besigheid van reis joernalistiek is om jou vaardighede op ‘n gestigte reis blog webtuiste te slyp. Nadat jy gemaklik geraak het met die formaat en redigering op die webwerf, mag jy later jou eie webwerf skep.
mt: The easiest way for you to start in the business of travel journalism is to hone your skills on a established travel blog website. After you get comfortable with the format and editing on the website, you may later create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Met die konstante blootstelling aan die plaaslike kieme by die huis, is kanse baie goed dat jy reeds immuun is teen die kieme. Maar in ander dele van die wêreld, waar die bakteriële fauna nuut is vir jou, is jy baie meer geneig om probleme om te tel. In warmer klimate groei bakteria ook beide vinniger en oorleef langer buite die liggaam. So is die gissing van die Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, en hul vele vriende. Soos met asemhalingsprobleme in kouer klimate, is ingewandeprobleme in warmer klimate taamlik algemeen en in meeste gevalle is dit kenmerkend irriterend, maar nie regtig gevaarlik nie.
mt: With constant exposure to the local fauna at home, chances are you are already immune to the fauna. But in other parts of the world, where the bacterial fauna is new to you, you are much more likely to have problems. In warmer climates bacteria also grow both faster and live longer outside the body. So is the guess of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with breathing problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in warmer climates are quite common and in most cases are characteristically irritating, but not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Europa is ‘n kontinent wat relatief klein is maar met baie onafhanklike lande. Onder normale omstandighede sou, om deur veelvuldige lande te reis beteken het dat daar veelvuldige kere deur visa aansoeke en paspoort beheer punte gegaan moes word. Die Schengen-sone, werk nietemin ietwat soos een land in hierdie opsig. Solank as wat jy in hierdie sone bly, kan jy oor die algemeen oor grense gaan sonder om weer deur paspoortbeheer kontrolepunte te gaan. Deur ‘n Schengen-visum te hê, hoef jy nie aansoek te doen vir elk van die Schengen-lidlande afsonderlik nie, en so doende spaar jy tyd, geld en papierwerk.
mt: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, to travel through many countries would mean going through many visa applications and passport control points. The Schengen area, however, works somewhat like one country in this regard. As long as you stay in this area, you can generally cross borders without having to go through passport control points again. By having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for each of the Schengen member states separately, and thus you save time, money and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Die tombe van Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 mag die mees beroemde van die grafte in die Valleie wees, dit is die toneel van Howard Carter se 1922 ontdekking van die byna ongerepte koninklikge begrafnis van die jong koning. In vergelyking met die ander koninklike grafte, is dit skaars die moeite werd om die graf van Tutankhamun te besoek, aangesien dit baie kleiner is en beperkte versierings het. Enigeen wat belang stel daarin om die bewyse van die skade wat aan die mummie gedoen is ten tyde wat daar pogings aangewend is om dit uit die doodskis te verwyder, te sien, sal teleurgesteld wees, aangesien slegs die kop en skouers sigbaar is. Die fantastiese rykdom van die graf is nie meer daarin nie, maar dit is verskuif na die Egiptiese Museum in Kaïro. Vir besoekers met beperkte tyd sal dit die beste wees om hul tyd elders deur te bring.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, it was the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. In comparison with the other royal tombs, it is scarcely worth the effort to visit the tomb of Tutankhamun, as it is much smaller and has limited decorations. Anyone who is interested in seeing the evidence of the damage done to the mummy at the time that efforts were made to remove it from the coffin, will be disappointed, as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fantastic wealth of the tomb is not there, but it has been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. For visitors with limited time, it will be best to spend their time elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Bowen-eiland is populêr vir ‘n dag- of naweek-uitstappie en bied kajak-ritte, staproetes, winkels, restaurante en meer. Hierdie outentieke gemeenskap is geleë in Howe Sound net buite Vancouver, en word maklik toeganklik gemaak deur geskeduleerde taksies wat uit Granville Eiland vertrek in die onderdorp van Vancouver. Vir diegene wat buitelugaktiwiteite geniet, is 'n trek deur ‘Sea to Sky’ noodsaaklik. Whistler (1.5 uur rit van Vancouver af) is duur maar wel-bekend as gevolg van die 2010 Winter Olimpiese spele. Geniet sommige van die beste ski in Noord Amerika in die winter, en geniet van die mees outentieke berg-fietsry in die somer.
mt: Bowen Island is popular for a day or weekend getaway and offers kayaking trips, hiking trails, shops, restaurants and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just outside Vancouver, and is easily accessible by scheduled taxis that depart from Granville Island in the downtown of Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a drive through ‘Sea to Sky’ is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is pricey but well-known as a result of the 2010 Winter Olympic games. Enjoy some of the best skiing in North America in the winter, and enjoy the most authentic mountain biking in the summer.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Waterval is ‘n dorp in die westerlike deel van Zimbabwe, oor die grens van Livingstone, Zambië, en naby Botswana. Die dorp le regs langs die val, en dit is die grootse aantrekking, maar die bekende toeriste bestemming bied aan vele geleenthede vir ‘n verlengde verblyf vir beide avontuursoekers en toeriste. In die reën seisoen (November tot Maart), is die water volume hoër en die Valle sal meer dramaties wees. Jy gaan gewaarborgd nat raak indien jy oor die brug gaan of langs die kronkelende paadjies wat naby die Waterval is, loop. Aan die ander kant, dit is juis omdat die volume van die water so hoog is, dat jou visie van die Valle verduister sal wees – deur al die water!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the western part of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies right next to the falls, and it is the major tourist attraction, but the famous tourist destination offers many opportunities for an extended stay for both adventure seekers and tourists. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume is higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You will be guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the winding paths near the Falls. On the other hand, it is just because the volume of the water is so high that your view of the Falls will be obscured – by all the water!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Reëls rakende gereëlde fotografie is ook van toepassing op video opnames, selfs meer. Indien om slegs ‘n foto van iets te neem nie toegelaat word nie, dan moes jy nie eers daaroor dink om ‘n video te neem nie. Indien ‘n hommeltuig gebruik word, moet daar vooraf bevestig word wat jy toegelaat is om te verfilm en watse permitte of addisionele lisensies benodig word. Om ‘n hommeltuig oor ‘n lughawe of skare te vlieg is amper altyd ‘n slegte idee, al is dit nie onwettig in u area nie.
mt: Rules regarding arranged photography also apply to video recordings, even more so. If you are not allowed to take a picture of something, you should not even think about filming it. If a drone is used, it must be confirmed beforehand what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licenses are required. Flying a drone over an airport or crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Reëls rakende gereëlde fotografie is ook van toepassing op video opnames, selfs meer. Indien om slegs ‘n foto van iets te neem nie toegelaat word nie, dan moes jy nie eers daaroor dink om ‘n video te neem nie. Indien ‘n hommeltuig gebruik word, moet daar vooraf bevestig word wat jy toegelaat is om te verfilm en watse permitte of addisionele lisensies benodig word. Om ‘n hommeltuig oor ‘n lughawe of skare te vlieg is amper altyd ‘n slegte idee, al is dit nie onwettig in u area nie.
mt: Rules regarding arranged photography also apply to video recordings, even more so. If you are not allowed to take a picture of something, you should not even think about filming it. If a drone is used, it must be confirmed beforehand what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licenses are required. Flying a drone over an airport or crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Registrasie is ‘n addisionele vereiste vir die visa proses. In party lande moet jy jou teenwoordigheid en waar jy gaan bly met die plaaslike owerhede registreer. Dit mag die invul van ‘n vorm by die plaaslike polisie of ‘n besoek aan die immigrasie kantoor vereis. In vele lande met sulke wette, hanteer plaaslike hotelle die registrasie (maak ‘n punt daarvan om te vra). In ander gevalle het slegs die wat buite toeriste akkommodasies bly, nodig om te registreer. Alhoewel, dit maak die wet baie meer obskuur, so vind voor die tyd uit.
mt: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries you must register your presence and where you will stay with local authorities. This may require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration office. In many countries with such laws, local hotels handle the registration (make a point of asking). In other cases, only those staying outside tourist accommodations need to register. Although, it makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Terwyl jy op reis is, is vrywilligerswerk ‘n goeie manier om ‘n verskil te maak, maar dit gaan nie net oor gee nie. Om in ‘n ander land te woon en vrywilligerswerk te doen is ‘n wonderlike manier om ‘n ander kultuur te leer ken, nuwe mense te ontmoet, jouself te leer ken, ‘n gevoel van perspektief te kry en selfs nuwe vaardighede te leer. Dit kan ook ‘n goeie manier wees om ‘n begroting te rek om ‘n langer verblyftydperk iewers te kry want baie vrywilliger werke verskaf blykplek en etes en ‘n paar betaal ‘n klein salaris.
mt: While you are traveling, volunteering is a good way to make a difference, but it’s not just about giving. Living in another country and volunteering is a wonderful way to learn about another culture, meet new people, get to know yourself, gain a sense of perspective, and even learn new skills. It can also be a good way to fund a longer stay somewhere because many volunteers are provided lodging and meals and some pay a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Om te reis na Walt Disney World verteenwoordig ‘n groot pelgrimsreis vir baie Amerikaanse families. Die “tipiese” besoek behels die vlug na Orlando Internasionale Lughawe, bus-ry na ‘n hotel op die Disney perseel, spandeer ‘n week daar, sonder om die Disney perseel te verlaat en dan die terugkeer huis toe. Daar is oneindige variasies moontlik, maar dié bly wat die meeste mense bedoel wanneer hulle praat van “om Disney Wêreld heen te gaan”. Vele kaartjies word aanlyn verkoop deur ‘n veilingwebtuiste soos eBay of Craigslist en is hoofsaaklik deels gebruikte vele-dae “park-hopper” kaartjies. Terwyl hierdie ‘n baie algemene aktiwiteit is, is dit verbied deur Disney: die kaartjies is nie-oordraagbaar.
mt: To travel to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The “typical” visit involves the flight to Orlando International Airport, bus ride to a hotel on the Disney property, spend a week there, without leaving the Disney property, and then return home. There are endless variations possible, but this is what most people mean when they talk about “going to Disney World”. Many tickets are sold online through an auction site such as eBay or Craigslist and are mostly partially used multi-day “park-hopper” tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Enige een wat ‘n besoek aan ‘n land wat as oorlogsone beskou word beplan, behoort professionele opleiding te kry. ‘n Soektog op die Internet vir “vyandige omgewings kursus” sal heel waarskynlik die adres van ‘n plaaslike maatskappy opbring. ‘n Kursus sal normaalweg al die kwessies wat hier bespreek word in dieper detail behandel, gewoonlik met praktiese ondervinding. ‘n Kursus is gewoonlik tussen 2 tot 5 dae en sal ‘n rolspel, baie eerstehulp en soms wapenopleiding insluit. Boeke en tydskrifte wat handel oor wildernisoorlewing is algemeen, maar publikasies wat handel oor oorlogsones is min.
mt: Anyone planning a visit to a country considered a war zone should receive professional training. A search on the Internet for “hostile environments course” will likely bring up the address of a local company. A course will usually cover all the issues discussed here in greater detail, often with practical experience. A course is usually between 2 and 5 days and will include a role play, first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Daar is velerlei maniere om water te suiwer, party is meer effektief teen spesifieke bedreigings. In sommige gebiede is die kook van water vir 'n minuut genoeg, in ander is 'n paar minute nodig. Filters wissel in effektiwiteit, en as u bekommernis het, moet u dit oorweeg om u water in 'n verseëlde bottel te koop by 'n bekende maatskappy.
mt: There are many ways to purify water, some are more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others a few minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and if you are concerned, you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Ryp strome is die terugkeering van die vloei van golwe wat van die strand af breek, gewoonlik by ‘n rif of soortgelyk. Vanweë die onderwater-topologie is die terugvloei meer gekonsentreer by ‘n paar dieper dele, en ‘n vinnige rukstroom na dieper water mag daar gevorm word. Meeste sterftes gebeur as ‘n gevolg van moegheid wanneer een terug probeer swem teen die stroom, wat onmoontlik mag wees. Sodra jy uit die stroom is, is terugswem niks moeiliker as gewoonlik nie. Probeer iewers heen beweeg waar jy nie weer vasgevang sal word nie, afhangende van jou vaardighede en of jy opgemerk was, en dalk wag tot redding.
mt: Rip currents are the return flow of waves breaking off the beach, usually at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topography, the return flow is more concentrated at a few deeper areas, and a fast rip current to deeper water may form. Most deaths occur as a result of exhaustion when one tries to swim against the current, which may be impossible. Once you are out of the current, swimming back is no harder than usual. Try to move somewhere you will not be trapped again, depending on your skills and whether you were noticed, and perhaps wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Binnelandse waterweë kan ‘n goeie tema wees om ‘n vakansie rondom te bou. Byvoorbeeld, besoek kastele in die Loire Vallei, die Rhine Vallei of neem ‘n bootrit na interessante stede op die Danube of ‘n bootrit op die Erie kanaal. Hulle definieër ook roetes vir gewilde stap – en fiets roetes.
mt: Domestic waterways can be a good theme to build a vacation around. For example, visit castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or take a boat ride to interesting cities on the Danube or a boat ride on the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and biking routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: In die noorde is die streek begrens deur die Sahel, en in die suide en weste deur die Atlantiese Oseaan. Vroue: Dit word aanbeveel dat enige vroue reisigers sê dat hulle getroud is, afgesien van hul eintlike huwelikstatus. Dit help ook om ‘n ring te dra (solank dit een is wat nie duur lyk nie). Vroue moet besef dat kulturele verskille dalk sal veroorsaak dat hulle geteister voel, en dat dit nie ongewoon is om agtervolg te word, aan die arm gegryp te word nie, ens. Wees ferm wanneer jy mans wegwys, en moenie bang wees om op jou regte te staan nie (Kulturele verskille of te nie, dit maak dit nie reg nie!).
mt: In the north, the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any female travelers say that they are married, regardless of their actual marital status. It also helps to wear a ring (as long as it doesn't look expensive). Women should be aware that cultural differences may cause them to feel harassed, and that it is not uncommon to be grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm when you tell men to leave you alone, and do not be afraid to stand up for your rights (Cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it right!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Wild is van die mees uitdagende motiewe vir ‘n fotograaf, en dit benodig ‘n kombinasie van goeie geluk, geduld, ervaring en goeie gereedskap. Natuurfotografie word dikwels vanselfsprekend aanvaar, maar soos fotografie in die algemeen, ‘n prent is ‘n duisend woorde werd. Wilde lewe-fotografie vereis dikwels ‘n lang telefoto lens, alhoewel goed soos ‘n swerm voëls of ‘n piepklein kreatuurtjie ander lense benodig. Baie eksotiese diere is moeilik om te vind, en parke het soms reels rakende fotos neem vir kommersiële doeleindes. Wilde diere kan skaam of aggressief wees. Die ongewing kan koud, warm of andersins vyandig wees.
mt: Wildlife is one of the most challenging subjects for a photographer, and it requires a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but as photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, although good as a flock of birds or a tiny creature other lenses are needed. Many exotic animals are difficult to find, and parks have sometimes reels of fence line photos taken for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or otherwise hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Enigeen wat oor bergpasse gaan bestuur teen hoë breedtegrade behoort die moontlikheid van sneeu, ys of temperature onder vriespunt te oorweeg. Wrywing op ysige en sneeu paaie is baie laag, en jy kan nie bestuur asof jy op ‘n kaal teerpad is nie. Gedurende sneeustorms, kan genoeg sneeu vinnig in ‘n kort tydjie val om jou vas te keer. Sig mag ook beperk word deur vallende of winddraende sneeu of deur kondensasie van ys op voertuigvensters. Aan die ander kant, ys en sneeu toestande is normaal in baie lande, en verkeer gaan ononderbroke regdeur die jaar voort.
mt: Anyone who is going to drive over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice or temperatures below freezing. Friction on icy and snowy roads is very low, and you cannot drive as if you are on a bare asphalt road. During snowstorms, enough snow can fall quickly in a short time to stop you. Power may also be limited by falling or windblown snow or by condensation of ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, ice and snow conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic continues uninterrupted throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Tensy jy ‘n diplomaat is, wat gereeld oorsee werk beteken dit dat jy inkomstebelasting moet indien in die land waar jy gebaseer is. Inkomstebelasting word verskillende in verskillende lande gestruktureer, en die belastingkoerse en vlakke verskil wyd van een land na 'n ander. In sommige federale lande, soos die Verenigde State en Kanada, word inkomstebelasting gehef op federale vlak sowel as op plaaslike vlak, so die pryse en hakies kan wissel van streek tot streek.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, which means you work overseas frequently, you will have to file income tax in the country where you are based. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the federal level as well as at the local level, so the prices and brackets can vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Tensy jy ‘n diplomaat is, wat gereeld oorsee werk beteken dit dat jy inkomstebelasting moet indien in die land waar jy gebaseer is. Inkomstebelasting word verskillende in verskillende lande gestruktureer, en die belastingkoerse en vlakke verskil wyd van een land na 'n ander. In sommige federale lande, soos die Verenigde State en Kanada, word inkomstebelasting gehef op federale vlak sowel as op plaaslike vlak, so die pryse en hakies kan wissel van streek tot streek.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, which means you work overseas frequently, you will have to file income tax in the country where you are based. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied at the federal level as well as at the local level, so the prices and brackets can vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: 'n Wêreldbeurs (gewoonlik' Expo 'genoem) is 'n groot internasionale kunst- en wetenskapsfees. Deelnemende lande bied kunstige en opvoedkundige tentoonstellings in nasionale pawiljoene aan om die aandag op wêreldkwessies of hul land se kultuur en geskiedenis te vestig. Internasionale Tuinbou-uitstallings is gespesialiseerde gebeurtenisse wat blommerangskikkings, botaniese tuine en enige iets anders wat met plante te doen het, uitstal. Al kan dit in teorie jaarliks plaasvind (solank as wat hulle in verskillende lande is), in die praktyk is hulle nie. Hierdie gebeure duur gewoonlik enige iets tussen drie en ses maande, en word gehou op gebiede niks kleiner as 50 hektaar.
mt: A World's Fair (usually called an Expo) is a large international art and science festival. Participating countries offer artistic and educational exhibits in national pavilions to focus attention on world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Exhibitions are specialized events that exhibit flower arrangements, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although they can theoretically be held annually (as long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events usually last any length between three and six months, and are held on areas no smaller than 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Alhoewel baie van die diere in die park gewoond is om mense te sien, die natuur is nietemin wild en moenie gevoed of versteur word nie. Volgens die parkowerhede, bly ten minste 100 meter weg van bere, wolwe, en 25 meter van alle ander wilde diere. Dit maak nie saak hoe mak hulle voorkom nie, buffels, takbokke, Amerikaanse takbokke, bere en amper alle groot diere kan aanval. Elke jaar word duisende besoekers beseer omdat hulle nie n behoorlike afstand gehou het nie. Hierdie diere is groot, wild en potensieel gevaarlik, so gee hulle hul spasie. Wees hierby bewus daarvan dat reuke bere en ander wildelewe lok, so vermy die ronddra of kook van welriekende kos en hou die kamp skoon.
mt: Although many of the animals in the park are used to seeing people, nature is still wild and do not feed or disturb them. According to park officials, stay at least 100 meters away from bears, wolves, and 25 meters from all other wild animals. It does not matter how tame they look, buffaloes, takbokke, American takbokke, bears and almost all large animals can attack. Every year thousands of visitors are injured because they did not keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. Be aware that cooking and burning of aromatic food attracts bears and other wildlife, so avoid the camp or cooking of aromatic food and keep the camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
